story:
About

Two successful KickStarters. Thousands of customers. 50 years of science. Stay cool anywhere. Burn calories anywhere.

Here's what existing users are saying about The Cold Shoulder Calorie Burning Vest.

  • "Love this thing. I recently competed in an 8 week body transformation challenge and came third out of over 1000, in a large part thanks to the additional fat burning from the Cold Shoulder. Really appreciate what you've done here Wayne. I usually wear it just before bed, the coolness helps me get to sleep -- another awesome benefit. In the summer when it's hot out, I find myself pulling it on during the day as well so that I'm less of sweaty." - Evan W
  • "I'm shocked at how well this thing works. I've been using it for just over a week and I can literally "feel" my metabolism spinning while wearing the vest. Additionally, as a side affect of it I feel better so I feel like I am making better eating choices. It's a win/win across the board." - Dan Skweres, KickStarter backer
  • "The vest is more comfortable than I thought." - David Clark
  • "I shrank out of it! Can I get a second vest one size smaller?" - Mariza Valdez, KickStarter backer.
  • "Easiest weight loss I've ever seen. Customer service was great. The product arrived quickly and was easy to adjust to my body. I have a chest style freezer and it's very easy to put the whole vest laying flat on one side. It's easy to wear and while I do feel the cold it's not unbearable.... All in all it's a great product and does what they say." Amazon customer
  • "Certainly a "cool" idea that's working for me. Since adding The Cold Shoulder to my overall fitness/diet plan for about 2 hrs daily, I've lost about 1.2% or 3.5 lbs. of body fat in the last 90 days! I'm very pleased, because it took me a little more than 365 days to drop the previous 5% body fat before I discovered The Cold Shoulder. At 63, I have some issues from manual labor and sports injuries that limit some physical activity, but this "cool tool" is enabling me to break through a bit of a "plateau" I'd reached in my progress. I just enter the extra 500 calorie deduction in my fitness/nutrition calculator daily and can not only monitor, but plan my success. The Cold Shoulder is a simple, safe, effective and easy to use quality made product!" - Bruce Higgins
  • "Helped me get over my weight loss plateau. This is the first cold vest I've tried. I like the ice packs they use they retain cold for quite awhile. When I use this consistently two times during the day for an hour each time I've noticed weight loss of .5-1lbs per week.... I'd been at a plateau for several months and this helped me get over my weight-loss plateau." - Amazon customer
  • "Cool solution. I live in a hot climate and I thought this would be perfect for those long hours spent outside in the heat... and this works really well. I haven't changed my eating habits but I have lost a couple pounds in the process as well so I think it helps there too. I highly recommend it." - TexasRed, Amazon Customer
  • "I wear it for 2 hours everyday and have had no issues with getting it on or in and out of the freezer. You can defiantly feel how ice chillingly cold it is while wearing it. But on the other hand it's not an uncomfortable cold. The product really works. I used the vest along with some minimal cardio and have seen significant improvement in my energy and fat loss goals. The vest literally stays cold for hours." - Amazon Customer Veteran_68w
  • "The vest is really solid and well-made. It fits in with my weightloss process and works great. I highly recommend The Cold Shoulder!" - Amazon Customer Lee_Gunby
  • "It is very comfortable. The design is easy to work with and after a minute or two feeling the initial cold of the packs, you can actually forget you are wearing it. Looking forward to using it many more times." - Amazon customer toonist.
  • "I was 206lbs at the beginning of my experiment of the Cold Shoulder vest. I've been carb loading the last 3 days for the competition and today I weighed in at 200 lbs! I am very excited about my results and have pictures of me wearing the vest after the competition; I found it's also great for immediate muscle recovery." - Dan Weecks, The Talk Around Town Show
  • "Excellent to assist with weight loss. I've been wearing the vest twice a day since it arrived and I've been losing approximately 1lb a week with no changes to my diet or exercise habits. The vest is very comfortable. On warmer days the cold is very refreshing and on the colder nights it's never cold enough to make you shiver or feel uncomfortable. Huge positive." Shawn S.
  • "I've been using this vest daily since it arrived. I wear it twice a day for an hour to an hour and a half. I actually really enjoy the cold, and it has done a good job of accelerating my weight loss. A really worthwhile investment!" - Andrew Clinton
  • "I suffer from a medical condition that causes skin to feel hot no matter the environmental temperature. For this purpose, the cold shoulder vest is an absolute dream for me. I can wear it for hours, and it helps, it really helps." - Anonymous KickStarter user.
  • "I drank the Kool Aid. I was very skeptical when purchasing this product. It seemed too good to be true but the inventor, Wayne Hayes, makes it very clear that this system is not meant to be the "end all, be all" to weight loss. There's no magic solution, it's meant to help you burn calories and works effectively with regular exercise and proper diet (no brainer). The vest is comfortable, wearing it over my clothes for twice a day (morning and evening) makes the cold very tolerable and it doesn't impede my daily activities. Furthermore, the vest is stylish enough (I have the black version) to wear in public and not have people stare at you." -Amazon user MightyTiki

Our Story

The Cold Shoulder is a time-saving, comfortable, scientifically-proven way to burn calories without exercise, sold directly to you at a wholesale price. We have thousands of users seeing great results. Our vest uses mild, comfortable cold exposure to extract calories directly from your body. You simply take it out fo the freezer, put it on, and go about your daily activities.

The idea has appeared in numerous places:

The Cold Shoulder turns the idea into a convenient product.

Why You’ll Love The Cold Shoulder

1. Backed by 50 years of science. Scientists have studied how mild cold exposure can burn calories since the 1960s.

2. Burns calories without exercise. Whether you’re a gym rat or a couch potato, our ice vest will burn excess calories for you – the equivalent of up to 500 calories a day. This can more than double the calorie deficit you'd get from dieting alone.

3. Saves time. It takes about 30 seconds to get the vest out of the freezer and put it on. Compare that to the same calories burned in a gym workout, especially including travel, change, and shower time.

4. It’s comfortable. No shivering! After trying it a few times, you’ll hardly notice you’re wearing it.

5. It gets more effective the more you use it. Your body adapts to the idea of turning on your internal furnace to burn calories, making the vest more effective the more you use it.

6.We listened to our successful users and gave them what they wanted! The new Classic 2.0 combines the style of the original Classic vest (which was our first KickStarter campaign) with the longer-lasting CryoMAX(tm) ice of our PRO vest (which was our second KickStarter campaign).

Some background

I sell a vest full of ice that's designed to burn calories.

I'm a professor and former NASA scientist. What you're about to read is going to sound like science fiction, but it's not. Scientists have spent decades studying how mild cold exposure can enhance calorie burn. Quietly, and without fuss, the evidence for cold exposure induced calorie burn has been accumulating. It's time to bring the science to the public. That's what I'm here to do: to explain to you what is probably the most novel, evidence-based calorie-burning idea that's come out of the scientific community in many years, and to tell you how you can take advantage of it without pain, without discomfort, and without taking more than 2 minutes of time out of your busy day. With KickStarter's help, we'll be able to bring this vest to the masses at a reasonable price.

Radio Health Journal interview:

Let's be blunt: there is no magic pill for weight loss, and The Cold Shoulder Calorie Burning Vest is no exception to that rule. The cold, hard truth is that the foundation of weight control is your diet. In order to maintain a healthy weight, do what grandma told you: eat your veggies, cut the fat off your steak, and avoid junk food, especially sweets. If you continue to eat junk, then no amount of exercise, cold exposure, or weirdly named supplements or powders will help you lose weight. The vest can burn up to 500 calories per day if used as directed, but you can easily nullify the effect by eating an extra 500 extra calories. So don't expect that you can continue to eat junk food, wear the vest, and lose weight. You can't. But if you are already eating well and getting moderate exercise and want to accelerate your calorie-burning efforts by burning excess calories while at rest, there's no simpler, easier, or more time-efficient way than wearing our vest.

Good Moring Dallas:

 

Whether you're an athlete, an actor/model, or a couch potato, almost everybody today could benefit from burning a few more calories without expending time or effort. Note that The Cold Shoulder Calorie Burning Vest cannot claim to diagnose, treat, prevent, or cure any disease, illness or condition.

The Problem - Exercise is not the only way to burn calories

The first thing I always hear when I say I’m touting the fat loss benefits of a “cold vest” is, “I don’t like being cold.” But think of all the other crazy things people do in order to try to lose excess fat. Starving themselves? Eating zero-calorie clay just to feel full, which carries a risk of arsenic poising? Exhausting themselves in the gym? Ingesting questionable supplements that, if they work at all, have side effects like insomnia or over‐stimulation? How about wearing a corset just to appear thinner? Drug injections? Liposuction? Freezing fat cells? Gastro‐intestinal surgery? Considering these options, wearing a cool, calorie-burning vest is pretty tame in comparison. The Cold Shoulder has no known side effects. Users who start skeptical end up wearing it routinely, and even find they look forward to putting it on at the end of a long day.

There is an aspect of the calorie equation that has been largely neglected for too long. There is a huge hole in our collective knowledge. Although exercise is definitely good, most people think that exercise is the only way to burn excess calories. But it's not.

The Solution - Burn excess calories using mild cold exposure

In addition to exercise, there’s another, much less well-known but scientifically well-established way to burn calories. It’s called mild cold exposure. Basically, if you extract heat from your body, even if you’re sitting on your couch in front of the T.V., your body will need to burn calories to stay warm. This is a scientific fact – and I should know, since I worked at NASA with a group of scientists that study ice. The trick is to figure out how to harness mild cold exposure without being uncomfortable.

The idea of using mild cold exposure to burn calories has slowly started to percolate into the popular media. Articles on the subject have appeared in many places, including the venues mentioned at the top of this page. The problem is that they often recommend painful or impractical methods of cold exposure, like cold showers or ice baths. Very few people have the courage to try that.

I was studying the science of how cold exposure burns calories, when I had a light-bulb moment. I thought, "If cold exposure burns calories, there’s got to be a way I can harness its power to help ordinary people increase their calorie burn." That’s when I began the work that eventually led me to develop The Cold Shoulder. It's a vest that drapes ice over the shoulder and back, and extracts calories while you wear it.

Now Powered With CryoMAX 8-hour Gel!

We are proud to announce that The Cold Shoulder has entered into an exclusive partnership with CryoMAX in the calorie burning vest market. CryoMAX gel is a patented, food-grade glycerin (which basically means it's so safe you could drink it without any ill-effects). CryoMAX gel is flexible even when frozen and can stay cold up to 8 hours, as their own scientific tests have shown:

How does it work?

Considering all the crazy things that people do to burn excess fat, from starvation diets to liposuction, a vest that burns calories while you continue about your day seems pretty tame, don't you think?

You don't need to be a scientist to understand that too much cold exposure – such as, say, floating in the North Atlantic after the Titanic sank – can extract so many calories so quickly that it can kill you. On the other hand, mild cold exposure is perfectly healthy, and has been studied by scientists for decades as a way to burn calories.

For example, Olympic swimmers burn many more calories per day than other Olympic athletes, and it has nothing to do with the exercise. It’s the water. They spend their day in water that’s 20 degrees (F) below their body temperature, and this temperature difference makes them burn way more calories than the exercise alone.

Any mild cold exposure causes your body to burn extra calories, whether it’s a cold day outside, air conditioning set too high, or your skin being in contact with a cold object. Scientists have been studying the effects of mild cold exposure for decades, and it’s a well documented fact that mild cold exposure induces calorie burn.

Our vest, The Cold Shoulder, has ice draped over the shoulder and across the back:

These are the most comfortable places to put the ice because that's where your body has the fewest nerve endings. It's also the most scientifically valid place to put the ice because, just under the skin of the shoulders and back, there's a type of tissue called Brown Adipose Tissue (BAT). BAT burns calories when you encounter mild cold. Our clinical trials show that wearing our vest twice a day for about an hour burns up to 500 calories more per day than you'd burn without it.

How to maximize effectiveness of The Cold Shoulder

We'd like to emphasize exactly under what conditions The Cold Shoulder can induce the burning of excess calories. Basically, you need to be in an environment where you are otherwise at a comfortable temperature, and you are not exercising. If you are sitting down at rest in a room (or your car, or whatever) that is at a comfortable temperature, then wearing The Cold Shoulder directly from the freezer, and with a shirt underneath, will extract heat from your body and cause you to burn extra calories in order to stay warm.

If you are in a hot environment, the The Cold Shoulder will help you stay cool, but it won't burn excess calories, because you're not cold. If you are working out in the gym, then The Cold Shoulder can help you stay cool, and can even help you cool down after a workout, but will not enhance your calorie burn, because you're not cold in that environment. If the vest is not cold, or if the ice has all melted, it will not induce excess calorie burn. Remember that the goal of The Cold Shoulder is to force you to burn calories at a time when you otherwise would not: sitting down, at rest, in a comfortable environment at room temperature.

So, to burn excess calories, wear The Cold Shoulder sitting on the couch watching the game, or in front of your computer, or in your car during your commute. Any time you'd normally just be sitting around comfortable---that's the time to don The Cold Shoulder Calorie Burning Vest and enhance your calorie burn.

Example trial result - Nick Hamilton

Below is a graph of the body fat of Nick Hamilton over a 16-week period. Nick was one of our early testers of The Cold Shoulder. He was on a 16 week, tightly controlled diet and exercise regimen. The only change Nick made in the last 2 weeks was to start using The Cold Shoulder ice vest. You can see how much it accelerated his fat loss.

Evidence from independent scientists

For more info on cold exposure and calorie burn, see this page. Note that some of it is rather technical---definitely not light reading. But if you want some of the cold, hard scientific facts from independent researchers, this is the place to start. Most of the research was done even before I conceived of The Cold Shoulder, so you know it's independent and objective.

Our Mission

We want to bring the most functional, comfortable, and stylish clothing-based calorie-burning aid to the global market. We want to spread the word that burning calories doesn’t have to require time-consuming gym visits, sweaty exercise, crazy calorie-restricted diet fads, or taking untested, questionable supplements with unknown side effects. Instead, we advocate that a healthy lifestyle must contain not only a healthy diet and moderate exercise, but also a regular dose of mild cold exposure.

Why We Need You!

We already have the vests made, but the CryoMAX ice is cheaper to buy in bulk, so we need to create a bulk order to CryoMAX so we can offer KickStarter folks a discount---and to have enough ice to continue selling them at a reasonable price.

Will It Fit Me?

We have tried The Cold Shoulder Classic 2.0 vest on people with chest sizes ranging from 36 inches up to 60 inches, and it fits no problem. It's a finely tailored vest with side straps that allow flexibility. We'll ask your exact size once the campaign funds.

Production Plan

We have 1,000 Classic 2.0 vests on hand right here in California, and another 5,000 waiting in the wings in our manufacturing facility in China. The vests are already made. What we still need to do is to order the CryoMAX ice; we'll know how much ice to order once the campaign finishes. The ice takes about 1-2 months to be delivered to our California warehouse, and then we'll start shipping. We also have a limited amount of ice available immediately; those willing to pay extra for immediate shipping will have their vest shipped, with ice, as soon as we get the funds from KickStarter.

So, to burn excess calories, wear The Cold Shoulder sitting on the couch watching the game, or in front of your computer, or in your car during your commute. Any time you'd normally just be sitting around comfortable---that's the time to don The Cold Shoulder Calorie Burning Vest and enhance your calorie burn.
Example trial result - Nick Hamilton

Below is a graph of the body fat of Nick Hamilton over a 16-week period. Nick was one of our early testers of The Cold Shoulder. He was on a 16 week, tightly controlled diet and exercise regimen. The only change Nick made in the last 2 weeks was to start using The Cold Shoulder ice vest. You can see how much it accelerated his fat loss.
Nick Hamilton greatly accelerated his fat loss just by wearing The Cold Shoulder for an hour each morning and evening, for the last 2 weeks of his 16-week diet + exercise regimen.
Evidence from independent scientists
For more info on cold exposure and calorie burn, see this page. Note that some of it is rather technical---definitely not light reading. But if you want some of the cold, hard scientific facts from independent researchers, this is the place to start. Most of the research was done even before I conceived of The Cold Shoulder, so you know it's independent and objective.
Our Mission
We want to bring the most functional, comfortable, and stylish clothing-based calorie-burning aid to the global market. We want to spread the word that burning calories doesn’t have to require time-consuming gym visits, sweaty exercise, crazy calorie-restricted diet fads, or taking untested, questionable supplements with unknown side effects. Instead, we advocate that a healthy lifestyle must contain not only a healthy diet and moderate exercise, but also a regular dose of mild cold exposure.
Why We Need You!
We already have the vests made, but the CryoMAX ice is cheaper to buy in bulk, so we need to create a bulk order to CryoMAX so we can offer KickStarter folks a discount---and to have enough ice to continue selling them at a reasonable price.
Will It Fit Me?
We have tried The Cold Shoulder Classic 2.0 vest on people with chest sizes ranging from 36 inches up to 60 inches, and it fits no problem. It's a finely tailored vest with side straps that allow flexibility. We'll ask your exact size once the campaign funds.
Production Plan
We have 1,000 Classic 2.0 vests on hand right here in California, and another 5,000 waiting in the wings in our manufacturing facility in China. The vests are already made. What we still need to do is to order the CryoMAX ice; we'll know how much ice to order once the campaign finishes. The ice takes about 1-2 months to be delivered to our California warehouse, and then we'll start shipping. We also have a limited amount of ice available immediately; those willing to pay extra for immediate shipping will have their vest shipped, with ice, as soon as we get the funds from KickStarter.
 Get Your Project Funded Today! 
 Get Cash Back on the Projects You Love!

story:
Xnowmate boots provide a lightweight, waterproof and packable solution to the long-standing problem of versatility in outdoor footwear.

They are perfect to use after skiing or snowboarding, when navigating the urban sprawl of the city or for exploring the great outdoors. 

The key things to know about Xnowmate boots are:

  •  Warm & Insulated - Inner thermal insulating tested 3M Thinsulate B200, tested down to -25ºC.
  •  Packable - Materials are lightweight and flexible.  Includes carrying sack.
  •  Super Grippy - Hypergrip and Ice Lock technology ensure maximum stability.
  •  Waterproof - Thermosealed, 10K full body breathable membrane.
  •  Wind Resistant - Windproof 100% PES membrane.
  •  Comfortable - Unisex bio mechanical shape, cushioned insole.

 

  •  Outer Layer - Flexible fabric specially created for technical outdoor equipment.  External seams stitched with special waterproofed thread to prevent the passage of water and cold.  Carefully designed overlays provide stability and protection.
  •  Intermediate Layer - B200 3M Thinsulate insulation, lightweight, warm, and compact.  Moisture resistant, hypoallergenic and breathable.  Proved down to -25ºC.
  •  Waterproof Membrane - Lightweight membrane that ensures high impermeability, breathability, flexibility, and resistance to wind.  Composed of hydrophilic and hydrophobic fibers has heat sealed seams to ensure waterproofness.

Xnoxmate boots are lightweight and flexible enough to be folded and packed into a very manageable size, making them portable and convenient, wherever you plan on taking them.

  •  Insole - Cushioned and breathable insole for maximum comfort.Lightweight and breathable, this high quality mesh lining offers improved comfort and flexibility.
  •  Lining - Lightweight and breathable, this high quality mesh lining offers improved comfort and flexibility.
  •  IceLock 3S - Glass fiber pads electrostatic-ally aligned in the rubber create anti-slip surface tension, providing six-times stronger slip resistance than normal outsoles on wet and icy surfaces.
  •  SnowLock - The only outsole in the world fitted with snow tires. A special compound that does not stiffen, keeps soles soft and provides a strong grip on snow and cold surfaces.

Road to Xnowmate 1.0

After 5 series of prototypes and the help of many people Xnowmate was born. A new concept of footwear, waterproof, warm, comfortable, very light, unisex ... and foldable. Almost unbelievable, but it worked. 

The first Xnowmate were manufactured in Spain in the 2014-2015 season and won an award at the prestigious ISPO Munich for its innovation and quality. It was the first time that such a young Spanish company got this award. We were not so crazy after all.  

 

The second generation: Xnowmate 2.0 ...

Our first model was very innovative but the outsole was too flat for snow and watery surfaces, so in the 2017-18 season we reinvented ourselves by incorporating a sole with high end technology to improve grip on ice and snow, and we incorporated a high boot model. 

 

Soon we began to receive incredible feedback from people all around the globe, people love to wear Xnowmate. So lightweight, so warm, so comfortable, so convenient. They wear them not only for skiing, also to go outdoors, to photograph the forest at night, to go sailing, even mushing or riding horses, or in cities when snow makes it difficult to walk.

We realized that there was an opportunity beyond ski slopes - a new generation was born. 

Xnowmate 3.0

We knew our boots were great for outdoors but honestly, not too nice for cities. Therefore we decided to combine the technology we already had with modern design to create stylish outdoor boots that not only look and feel great, but offer unparalleled performance. This is Xnowmate 3.0, Hybrid Outdoor Footwear

We have developed this new model in London, with a top footwear design consultancy and results are amazing: 

What is new about Xnowmate 3.0

  • Improved design and materials
  • Colors, except for black, are all NEW. For the past models, we only had 2 colors
  • Youth size are also NEW

story:
No more adjusting, chafing, odor, or sweat. Just comfort. 

Life can be unpredictable, sweaty, and uncomfortable, but you don’t need to be. Never adjust, chafe, or stink again. Go hiking and get lost. Go to the gym and then back to the board room. Go to the airport and have your flight canceled. We’ve got you.

 

Whether you’re a backpacker, businessman, homebody, or anything in between, life is full of unexpected adventures. That’s why it’s important to have comfortable and reliable clothing. One Nova was designed for the ultimate comfort experience so you can feel and move confidently. Underwear may be the first thing you put on in the morning, but it should be the last thing you worry about. We thought of all the problems that underwear may cause so that you don’t have to! Look at all of the things you don’t have to worry about when you wear One Nova underwear:

Let's dig into the details...

 

 

 

 

 

On top of all this, One Nova underwear is silky smooth, resistant to shrinkage and pilling, and comes in rich colors. A pair of One Nova underwear can be worn comfortably for up to three days as well!

 

It's not magic, it's our exclusive fabric blend...

The reason we are able to make such awesome underwear is thanks to the revolutionary material we use. Our team spent a year traveling around Asia searching for the perfect materials for One Nova. The time was well spent because we found the ultimate textile combination: Merino Wool and Modal.

Modal wood fibers are created by spinning cellulose from beech trees. The result is a fabric that is breathable and silky smooth. Their properties resist both shrinkage and pilling. They also absorb dye, so the fabric keeps its rich color even after being washed.

 

Merino Wool is made from a particular breed of Australian sheep. The wool is made of very fine fibers allowing it to act as a natural temperature regulator as well as being odor-resistant, moisture-wicking, breathable, and soft to the touch. 

Together we blend these two textiles to make the ultimate fabric for our underwear. One Nova underwear has the benefits of both textiles. Super soft, breathable, moisture-wicking, and durable. This underwear can survive anything.

At One Nova we believe in transparency about where our materials come from and how our products are made. We are committed to producing products efficiently to not harm the planet. Our underwear is made from 100% eco-friendly and sustainable materials. 

 

We don't use any plastic material. All of our products and shipping packagings are made from recycled papers and cardboards. In order to minimize waste generation, we always look for ways to use the least packaging possible.

 

We only use natural materials in our products. Merino wool and modal from beech tree fibers are biodegradable.  We also make sure that the manufacturing process is earth-friendly. Our boxer briefs are made in an eco-friendly process. The merino wool comes from Australia. The Modal is produced by a company, Lenzing in Austria. From wood sourcing to factory gate, Lenzing modal fibers' sustainability has been scientifically proven in a life cycle assessment done by Utrecht University. 

 

 

To meet the anticipated demands of our backers, we have spent months looking for new partners around Asia. We have finally found one in Qingdao, China. The labor condition is the most crucial element for us when it comes to choosing factories. Over the course of our preparation period, we have visited our factory to get to know the team behind the production of our underwear and to make sure that these employees are working under good conditions. We can assure you that they work under healthy conditions within well-organized factories. They also produce high-quality products. We, One Nova only become partners with those who we can count on. 

 

 

 




*Survey = Those who place 12-packs and 24-packs, please communicate your choices with us through messages to ensure speedy delivery. Those who choose other perk tiers should be able to select the sizes and the colors during the checkout process. If you'd like personalized stitching let us know by messages. Missing information will be checked at the end of the month. Thanks!


 

 

 

Hi, we’re Taiga and Lilian, the team behind One Nova. We started One Nova as business students, with a strong mission: to create the perfect pair of underwear. We were fed up with the solvable every-day problems caused by poor design and cheap fabrics. We were sick of scratchy fabric that makes you uncomfortable all day long and poor construction that doesn’t give you proper support. We traveled around Asia in search of solutions to these problems and somewhere along the way, One Nova was born. We as a community deserve better from the clothes we wear. We deserve better quality, better comfort, better support, and better production practices. We are proud to deliver you all of those things with One Nova underwear. 

Thanks for reading, and let the adventure begin!

Introducing One Nova Underwear, the only underwear that is so comfortable, you’ll forget you’re wearing it! At One Nova, we believe in the simple power of basics. Underwear is something that we think about way more than we should. Whether it’s “Ugh, the tag of my underwear is irritating” or the constant feeling that you need to adjust them. At One Nova, we’re working to change that. We want the only thought you have about your underwear to be “These are so soft” when you first put them on. After that, it shouldn’t cross your mind again. Something that we put on every day should be a pleasant experience! 
We reinvented our underwear from the ground up, starting by producing our own exclusive fabric blend: a unique blend of eco-friendly merino wool and beech tree fiber. Merino wool is what makes our underwear unbelievably soft. It also naturally wicks away sweat and other moisture, for odor protection. The beech tree fiber gives our underwear their durability, and most importantly, their breathability. We didn’t forget the construction either, our boxer briefs have no tag and a 3D pouch that allows for extra room in the front so your sperm count is protected and you never feel squished. No more adjusting, chafing, odor, or sweat. story:
Blano

Blano is an Amsterdam based luxury handbag label founded by me, Lisa Eggen, in 2019. With the help of my sister Nynke (who is specialized in sustainable product development), I started Blano. Blano delivers a line of timeless bags for the modern woman who; 

  • Aims for sheer quality
  • Wants to minimize their carbon footprint
  • Is not looking to make concessions on style/design

Dedicated to delivering quality Blano bags are handmade in Italy, as well as most of the materials that are used.

Our love for design and for the planet is the base of this brand. We feel that products should never be the cause of harm to anyone or anything. 

We have selected the materials carefully by looking for a balance of quality, style and environmental impact. Working only with vegan materials, we have created a line of high-end timeless bags.

What We Need & What You Get

I already put all of my savings in Blano, the sampling, 'leather', hardware and everything we need in order to do the production is already paid for. We now need additional funding of 6700 EUR in order to finance the first production. You can pre-order your Blano bag now and get:

  • A high-end bag that is vegan and sustainable so you don't have to make concessions 
  • An attractive discount of up to 30%
  • You get to make an impact towards a better fashion industry 

Apple leather

In the search for a vegan leather that is both high in quality and low in enviremental impact we touched upon apple leather. A new “leather” innovation that is made from apple fibers that are leftover from the food processing industry. We love the concept of turning waste into high-quality new materials. This material though is still in development and very hard to access. However, when we came to Italy in 2019 to visit our suppliers they had a surprise for us. They have created a material made from apple fiber waste, PU, polyester, and cotton. But also, not unimportantly, it has a high-quality appeal and looks like leather. We are very happy to be able to use this material for our first collection. The next steps are to develop this material further to become even cleaner and have even less impact. But even if a material is not perfect yet it is already worth investing in to drive change and innovation.

Risks & Challenges

I will do my utmost best to collect the money in time to deliver the products in February. However, of course, there is a risk we won't make it. The worst-case scenario is that the production will be delayed. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you dont realy need a bag right now or or bags are not your thing but you do want to help, please share our story.

  • Like / repost us on Instagram
  • Like / Share us on Facebook
  • Share the crowdfunding by using the Indigogo share tools
  • Tell your friends about us at the next birthday party!

 

I would like to leave you with this; With every purchase we make, we cast a vote. Vote for a greener future! For more info about us visit Blano at: www.blano-amsterdam.com

story:
About

Origin: Germanic

Adjective

1.   having or showing a lack of awareness about the proper way to behave : socially awkward

2.   not planar

Noun

1.      left

‘GAUCHE’ comes from the idea that our imperfections do not dictate our status in life. Others may look at us in disgust because of the way we speak or the way we do certain things. In a way, it's a label that is placed on us for not meeting the social expectations of society. Having certain things about us deemed as unsophisticated or not "classy" does not reflect who we truly are. The word ‘gauche’ also stems from the French word ‘gauchier’, meaning to deviate away from the line or path. Overall, the idea behind ‘Gauche’ is to drop the idea of social norms and to create one’s own path, despite social pressures, to better ourselves and spread good into the world around us.

 

What We Need & What You Get

What we need

The funding from this campaign will primarily be used for:

  • Apparel production costs
  • Screen printing set-up fees (For designs featured and not featured in this campaign)
  • Embroidery digitisation fees
  • Samples
  • Hosting for the online store

 

What you get:
 
For the time being, as 'GAUCHE' is just starting, this campaign will feature three of our t-shirt designs - the staple of any good outfit. After building some momentum, other products such as jumpers, hoodies, hats, and jackets will begin rolling out. If you contribute at least $25 to this campaign, you will receive one of the three t-shirts available of your choice. These shirts will be $5 less than the retail price. The mock-ups for the designs may be found below:
 
4 July, 2016 Update (To be added by 2:00pm EST): 
  • 'ONI I' Tee

  • 'ONI II' Tee

 
  • GAUCHE Tee
  • ORACLE Tee
  • INSECURE INSECURITIES Tee

  • GAUCHE Melt Stickers

If the response is great enough, it might be possible to throw in some of the other t-shirt designs before the campaign comes to a close.
 

Risks & Challenges

The main concern that is involved with this campaign is meeting expectations for delivering your perks on time. To ensure everyone is "in the know", updates will be given on this page frequently to update all backers on the status of the t-shirts. During the campaign, we will be in contact with print houses in Toronto to get quotes in order to be able to start production as soon as possible. A decision of which production house to go with should be made close to the end of the campaign.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone is able to help out through this crowdfunding venture.  There are still other ways you can help us get off the ground:

  • Spread the word about 'GAUCHE' to your friends, family, and complete strangers - but doing it through social media is probably the easiest way to do that!

Thank you for checking the project out and supporting us!

To ensure everyone is "in the know", updates will be given on this page frequently to update all backers on the status of the t-shirts. During the campaign, we will be in contact with print houses in Toronto to get quotes in order to be able to start production as soon as possible. A decision of which production house to go with should be made close to the end of the campaign.
 

Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that not everyone is able to help out through this crowdfunding venture.  There are still other ways you can help us get off the ground:
Spread the word about 'GAUCHE' to your friends, family, and complete strangers - but doing it through social media is probably the easiest way to do that!
Thank you for checking the project out and supporting us!

story:
If you missed the campaign, you can now...

PRE-ORDER ON CURECOLLECTION.COM


As seen on...

Hello, before I introduce myself, I would like to start with a shocking statistic.. 1 out of 8 women in the US will develop some form of cancer in her lifetime. Now, my name is Mason Watson and I am here to try to change this. You may see the nice cars and ask, why breast cancer? In 2008, my amazing mother Sharon, passed away after years of battling breast cancer. With a passion for cars and determined to make a difference in the fight against breast cancer, I am excited to introduce Cure Collection®.

That's the simple part- Make awesome automotive apparel and prints, while 20% goes directly to The Breast Cancer Research Foundation®. Feel good about rocking your favorite ride while you are helping find a cure for breast cancer.


With your support, we can make Cure Collection the next premium automotive lifestyle brand. Your support will help fund the initial t-shirts and poster prints. You will be the first to rock stylish tees that are made from the highest quality available. From designing, printing and shipping, everything is locally fulfilled here in Southern California, USA.

Printed on premium, 100% ringspun cotton. Each shirt is soft and comfortable and in a unisex style that looks and feels great on both men and women.


CLASSIC COLLECTION



BLACK COLLECTION


SKETCH COLLECTION

NOW UNLOCKED!!

CLASSIC COLLECTION


BLACK COLLECTION


LOGO TEE

Support the new brand with a Logo Tee! Front pocket with logo and text on the back! Comes on white tee.


STICKER PACKS

3x2 inch gloss stickers you can put anywhere! 

CLASSIC COLLECTION STICKERS

BLACK COLLECTION STICKERS

SKETCH COLLECTION STICKERS- UNLOCKED AT $5,000

VINYL LOGO DECAL

Approximate size- 7x2in. White only.


Started in 2013 as Cars For A Cure Apparel, I wanted to reimagine what the brand could be from 2016 onwards. Cure Collection isn't just awesome automotive shirts... Each design belongs to a specific 'Collection'. Each Collection consists of 4 shirts with a related theme and graphic style. These collections each provoke different stories and help you share your love of cars. Whether it's the classic 917 you fantasize about, or the classic 2002 that has been sitting in your garage waiting to get started up again, these collections have history unique to those who own them. To assure that 20% is going to the cause, I have partnered with the Breast Cancer Research Foundation. BCRF's mission is to advance the world's most promising research to eradicate breast cancer. Visit www.bcrfcure.org to learn more.

Future plans- I will continue to promote the brand and raise awareness. Don't see a car you like? Well, new collections will be added throughout the year. I plan on doing sweaters, hats, and other accessories to further expand Cure Collection's product line. Stay tuned and feel free to offer suggestions on what cars you would like to see next! 


THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT! IF YOU LIKE MY PROJECT, PLEASE SHARE  :)


Cure Collection ® All rights reserved, 2016.

story:
Background 

I am a professional stuntwoman and was granted a United States UTILITY PATENT (www.USPTO.gov), on a sports bra that promotes weight loss in the waistline, offers excellent back support, and actually secures the bust.  

Review our video "Inventing Success"  located on the gallery tab (for mobile devices use this link ( http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EEVnc0GvNT8 ), this explains our patenting process.

Below are pictures of REAL Capo-Nata Lean Body Users.

Jerri

Mary


My parents and I have funded our Lean Body Sports Bra enterprise thus far. Our success has been restricted, due to limited productions. With your assistance we can continue to grow as a company.

We are asking for funding in the amount of $10,000. This amount will be reserved for :

1)  Materials (the neoprene fabric is the most expensive)

2)  Manufacturing costs for minimums orders required

3)  Shipping and packaging supplies

4)  Cost of campaign  perks

5)  Booth at the 2014 IDEA World Fitness Convention  Expo (Anaheim, CA in     August)

If our Capo Nata Lean Body Sports Bra Campaign gets overfunded

First of all, yay !!!!! We would use the funding to :

1)  Manufacture larger quantities of  Lean Body Sports Bras

2)  Hire additional staff

3)  Purchase Infusionsoft software to merge our inventory and customer base         to produce more sales 

4)  Continue to office 

5)  Continue to exhibit at major Expos and Trade Shows

6)  Travel expenses to present the Lean Body Sports Bra to buyers for                       department stores, sporting goods stores, gyms, spas and chiropractors, as       well as equipment buyers for schools and universities around the country 

Ready to check out some perks..........

We appreciate all our supporters and are offering some awesome gifts!!!!

Perks are located to the right side of screen. Choose which perk you are interested in and include your email address if you would like to receive information on future Capo-Nata events. If your perk requires your email address, email us info@Capo-Nata.com to ensure delivery.

Our Successful Track Record

We have exhibited our Lean Body Sports Bra at numerous expos and our sales continue to increase as our product is introduced. We have also gained media and press due to the "unique story behind the Lean Body Sports Bra" and the United States approved Utility Patent. 

Why Your Donation Is Imperative

1)  The Lean Body Sports Bra is designed to include full figured women

2)  You will be contributing to the health and fitness for the individual

3)  Fills a void of injury prevention benefits that currently exists in the     sports bra industry

4)  Creates United States employment opportunities 


Not all contributions have to be cash, if you email a friend we will be forever grateful!!  

If you are interested in our perks and need international shipping or any questions please email us info@Capo-Nata.com or call us at 1 (855) 99 – CAPO-NATA (22766). 

Interested in our website, or our Media please click below. 

Official Capo-Nata Website 

Capo-Nata Press Page

Don't forget to check out our gallery page so you can learn more about us. 

Please share this Indiegogo campaign with anyone you think would be interested. Thank you so much. 


Capo-Nata supports the Diamond in the Raw Foundation

Diamond In The Raw Foundation

story:
Short Summary

Hi everyone! My Name is Taylor and I've been making jewelry as a hobby for years. After I made the jewelry for my friends bridal party, I received such positive feedback about my work, I decided that my passion could be more than just a hobby. That's why I'm here today!

I've already started a website, Lemon-cove.com, where my handmade jewelry can be bought. I'm here today so that I can expand the site. I have so many wonderful designs, but I can only display a limited amount on my site. Also, most of my designs are available in different colors and different materials, however right now I can only show one picture per item. This really limits my creativity :(

By contributing to my campaign you'll help me to expand my site so that i can display all of my creative Ideas. Thanks a bunch!

What We Need & What You Get 

In order to expand the site we need to raise $1000. $600 of this amount will go to godaddy.com, who hosts my website. This will allow me to display an unlimited amount of items, with an unlimited amount of pictures. The other $400 will help purchase the materials I need to continue making jewelry and, of course, to fund fund the perks that I'll give to my lovely contributors.  

Perks

All perks will be sent out immediately after contribution. 

Speaking of perks, here's what you'll get if you're a sweetheart and contribute to my campaign:

  • If you contribute $1 you'll get a certificate of thanks. Now frame it and hang it on your wall.
  • $5 and I will send you a wire ring like the one pictured bellow

Because I heart You :)

  • $10 and I'll send my Rose Stud Earrings
  • $15 coupon for 15% off entire purchase on Lemon-Cove.com
  • $25 single pearl drop earrings
  • $40 double pearl drop earrings
  • $50 pearl or crystal bracelet
  • $75 Earring/bracelet set
  • $100 first five Contributors receive 50% off entire purchase on Lemon-Cove.com.

If it becomes the case that our $1000 goal is not reached, that's OK! Thanks for all your support. We can still use the contributions to expand the site just to a smaller degree, allowing for 50 or 100 items and 2 to 5 pictures per item. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Love Lemon Cove? Can't contribute? Don't worry if you would like to support us just tell your friends about Lemon-Cove.com and use the Indiegogo share tools to share it on facebook, twitter, google+, etc.

Thank You Very Much!

story:
Introduction

Kaiteki is a Japanese word meaning “comfortable”. Kaiteki Sandals are designed to be the most comfortable sandal you’ll ever wear. But our mission goes beyond comfort for the feet. We are also a social-good venture with a mission-based strategic focus on helping others and making a significant contribution to improve the lives of others.

Through our partnership with AmeriCares, we will donate a portion of all net sales to help support children and families in Latin America. We believe we can make a difference and give comfort to those who truly stand in need of comfort. That is why we chose Kaiteki as the name of our company.

Our fundraising goal for our initial production run is $15,000 USD. This will help us build our opening inventory and cover the cost of materials, labor, shipping, and customs/duties.

About our product

Kaiteki Sandals are made from real yoga mat material! Our sandals are designed to be the most comfortable sandal you’ll ever wear. Our goal is to manufacture the highest quality product with the most affordable price tag. With our mission-driven strategic focus of benefiting consumers as well as our partnership with AmeriCares, we will never sacrifice quality or service in order to make a buck. The initial Kaiteki flip-flop sandals are made from ultra-soft EVA material for the in-sole and durable TPR for the out-sole. The strap is made of PU synthetic leather. The product is shipped in a poly bag with the Kaiteki logo.

Our initial product run will be available in three strap colors (black, white, red) and in U.S. women’s sizes 6, 7, 8, 9, and 10. Once the initial product run is delivered, future sizes, colors, and designs will be determined by consumer demand, industry trends, and customer input.

About our manufacturing process

The sandals are manufactured by a company located in Southeast China. As founder and owner, I have personally visited the family-owned business in China. I spent time with the staff and built a strong relationship of trust with the management team. We talked through the specifics of the product line in great detail and established a strong friendship that will benefit both companies for many years to come. This relationship is especially important in doing business with Chinese companies. This concept is known as “guanxi” which literally means “relationship”. But it goes beyond that. It is the connection between individuals that allow business to be conducted. Many business relationships do not succeed if “guanxi” is not established first.

I plan to visit my Chinese partners on a regular basis to ensure the highest quality materials and processes continue to be used in our products. We will discuss product demand, new design concepts, quality assurance steps, and production service levels. 

About our logo

Our logo was designed with a dual-purpose. The “K” at the beginning of the name obviously represents the first letter of our company. However, if you flip the “K” on its side, it depicts a child with outstretched arms in praise and thanksgiving. Each time a pair of sandals is purchased, Kaiteki will make a donation through our partnership with AmeriCares to help children and families in Latin America. You can help make this vision a reality through your support of our company now and in the future.

About our owner/founder

My name is Lance Bradshaw. I founded Kaiteki Sandals in 2014. As an experienced business owner, I’ve always been interested in social-good entrepreneurism. As an MBA student at the University of Utah, I learned from others the importance of having a higher purpose than simply turning a profit. Those organizations who are mission-driven tend to reach higher, stretch themselves further, and realize sustainable success. On a personal note, I am a husband and father and live with my family in the Salt Lake City, Utah area.

How can you help?

There are many ways to help! The easiest and most effective way is to become a contributor on IndieGoGo. Your funds will be used to secure inventory and allow our company to move forward with our mission. If you can’t contribute monetarily, you can still play a huge supporting role by sharing information about our mission with friends, family, and anyone else you come in contact with. You can visit any of our sites below and use the share features to help get our message out.

We also have many types of “swag” available, including vinyl stickers and decals. Just contact us through IndieGoGo and we’ll mail you a stack of stickers right away for free!

Please contact us with any questions or for clarification. Thank you very much for your support!

story:
Dear Friends,

My goal from the beginning was to bring you a fine luxury mechanical watch this is truly unique and one of a kind.

This project is a result of almost two years of very hard work, please take your time to look through the pictures and the video descriptions.

You have Eight color Combinations to chose from, you also can chose either the open Heart PTS movement shown here and if you prefer the classic Date/Time NH35 Seiko movement you have that option too.

I will be looking forward to hearing from you soon,

God Bless,

Chadi, Umbrella Watch Group

Engineering Design

Look at some of the most extreme designs out there: the F-117 Stealth Bomber, Batman's Tumbler or the Lamborghini Reventon. They share a common feature: they all have curveless orfaceted designs.


From Day 1, curves where completely eliminated from our design equation --

Only sharp edges and hard angles remain.

The X-Frame design was taken to another extreme by breaking down each of the main watch Case Components (Watch Bezel, Case Middle, Case Back and Screw Down Crown) into separate parts, then designing those components separately.

  • The Case Middle has five Components including the screw-down crown.
  • The Watch Bezel alone consists of three parts layered on top of each other. The Bezel components have a 10-sided Decagonal design.

  • TheCase Back is transparent and also has a 10-sided Decagonal design.

  • The Screw Down Crown is designed to resemble a Gear and also ensures water-resistance by sealing it to the Case.
  • The Watch is 1 0ATM/100 Meters Water Resistant.

**Case Components are bolt on assembly

Dial, Hands, Markers and Strap

  • Multilayer Dial with a honeycomb pattern in the background, the dial ring has 12 hexagon hour markers.

  •  Super-Luminous Hands and Hour Markers

The Strap was designed to seamlessly fit into the watch and is attached to the case with four screws.


Finishing

Sapphire Glass is used on both the Watch and Transparent Case Back

All Eight Watches have a Matte Finish:

1) X-FRAME VULCAN BR, Matte Black Case/Rose Gold Bezel

2) X-FRAME VULCAN RB, Matte Rose Gold Case/Black Bezel

3) X-FRAME VULCAN BB, Matte Black Case/Black Bezel

4) X-FRAME VULCAN SB, Matte Gray Case/Black Bezel

5) X-FRAME VULCAN SS, Matte Gray Case/Gray Bezel

6) X-FRAME VULCAN RS, Matte Rose Gold Case/Gray Bezel

7) X-FRAME VULCAN RR, Matte Rose Gold Case/Rose Gold Bezel

8) X-FRAME VULCAN SR, Matte Gray Case/Rose Gold Bezel

Mechanism

The PTS Resources movement  is a Dual Time Self Winding Mechanism, it is a partially transparent design style Movement.

accuracy is at +/- 30 seconds/35 hour power reserve/21'600 alternances/hour/24 jewels

In other words, you get a partial view of what’s going on inside the watch.


A Separate Three-Seven Shaped Seconds Blade is directly placed on top of the Mechanism window.


Production Process

The extreme geometries in the Design components means that X-Frame cannot be made using the typical open-mold manufacturing process you see in over 95% of watches today.

All parts have to be CNC Machined individually with very accurate precision and zero room for error.

This Method of production is almost exclusive to limited production runs by high-end watch manufacturers.

Wrist Shots


Gallery




Warranty

The Watch is covered by a one year 365 day warranty.

To put everyone at ease, we have a forwarding address in each of these countries listed below ( in addition to New York and Ontario):

1) Barcelona- Spain

2) Dubai- U.A.E

3) Frankfurt- Germany

4) Hong Kong

5) Istanbul- Turkey

6) Johannesburg- South Africa

7) London- England

8) Malaysia

9) Milan- Italy

10) Mumbai- India

11) Paris- France

12) Shanghai- China

13) Singapore

Measurements and Weight

The Watch alone without packaging is 179 grams or 6.314 ounces.

Please download the 1:1 Scale file by Right clicking on the image below, print and cut it out to see how it measures on your wrist.

Risks and challenges

Our set delivery date is a worst case scenario date, meaning we already accounted for any potential delays.

We are looking forward to communicating and receiving Feedback, We are going to be in close touch with everyone from Day 1, our backers will be well informed of every step along the way.

 have Eight color Combinations to chose from, you also can chose either 
the open Heart PTS movement shown here and if you prefer the classic 
Date/Time NH35 Seiko movement you have that option too.I will be looking forward to hearing from you soon,God Bless,Chadi, Umbrella Watch GroupEngineering DesignLook at some of the most extreme designs out there: the F-117 Stealth Bomber, Batman's Tumbler or the Lamborghini Reventon. They share a common feature: they all have curveless orfaceted designs.From Day 1, curves where completely eliminated from our design equation --Only sharp edges and hard angles remain.The X-Frame design was taken to another extreme by breaking down each of the main watch Case Components (Watch Bezel, Case Middle, Case Back and Screw Down Crown) into separate parts, then designing those components separately.
The Case Middle has five Components including the screw-down crown.
The Watch Bezel alone consists of three parts layered on top of each other. The Bezel components have a 10-sided Decagonal design.
TheCase Back is transparent and also has a 10-sided Decagonal design.
The Screw Down Crown is designed to resemble a Gear and also ensures water-resistance by sealing it to the Case.
The Watch is 1 0ATM/100 Meters Water Resistant.
**Case Components are bolt on assemblyDial, Hands, Markers and Strap
Multilayer Dial with a honeycomb pattern in the background, the dial ring has 12 hexagon hour markers. Super-Luminous Hands and Hour MarkersThe Strap was designed to seamlessly fit into the watch and is attached to the case with four screws.FinishingSapphire Glass is used on both the Watch and Transparent Case BackAll Eight Watches have a Matte Finish:1) X-FRAME VULCAN BR, Matte Black Case/Rose Gold Bezel2) X-FRAME VULCAN RB, Matte Rose Gold Case/Black Bezel3) X-FRAME VULCAN BB, Matte Black Case/Black Bezel4) X-FRAME VULCAN SB, Matte Gray Case/Black Bezel5) X-FRAME VULCAN SS, Matte Gray Case/Gray Bezel6) X-FRAME VULCAN RS, Matte Rose Gold Case/Gray Bezel7) X-FRAME VULCAN RR, Matte Rose Gold Case/Rose Gold Bezel8) X-FRAME VULCAN SR, Matte Gray Case/Rose Gold BezelMechanism 
The PTS Resources movement  is a Dual Time Self Winding Mechanism, it is a partially transparent design style Movement.accuracy is at +/- 30 seconds/35 hour power reserve/21'600 alternances/hour/24 jewelsIn other words, you get a partial view of what’s going on inside the watch.A Separate Three-Seven Shaped Seconds Blade is directly placed on top of the Mechanism window.Production ProcessThe extreme geometries in the Design components means that X-Frame cannot be made using the typical open-mold manufacturing process you see in over 95% of watches today.All parts have to be CNC Machined individually with very accurate precision and zero room for error.This Method of production is almost exclusive to limited production runs by high-end watch manufacturers.Wrist ShotsGalleryWarrantyThe Watch is covered by a one year 365 day warranty.To put everyone at ease, we have a forwarding address in each of these countries listed below ( in addition to New York and Ontario):1) Barcelona- Spain2) Dubai- U.A.E3) Frankfurt- Germany4) Hong Kong5) Istanbul- Turkey6) Johannesburg- South Africa7) London- England8) Malaysia9) Milan- Italy10) Mumbai- India11) Paris- France12) Shanghai- China13) SingaporeMeasurements and WeightThe Watch alone without packaging is 179 grams or 6.314 ounces.Please download the 1:1 Scale file by Right clicking on the image below, print and cut it out to see how it measures on your wrist.Risks and challengesOur set delivery date is a worst case scenario date, meaning we already accounted for any potential delays.We are looking forward to communicating and receiving Feedback, We are going to be in close touch with everyone from Day 1, our backers will be well informed of every step along the way.

story:
Vescari is proud to unveil its new chronograph collection ‘The Chestor’. 

The Chestor combines modern day specifications with a timeless look. It's available in 6 different color combinations, that can be matched with one of our leather, canvas straps or stainless steel bracelets.             

From a classic combination of our steel case and black dial with a leather strap or a more bold looking combo in black steel with a rosegold bezel and matching canvas strap. 

It's all up to you to find your favorite!

Thank you.                                                                                                                                      

Jeroen

 

 

 

Please find a couple of hands-on reviews below

http://www.thetimebum.com/2019/03/vescari-chestor.html

https://microbrandwatchworld.com/reviews/the-chestor-by-vescari/

https://wristwatchreview.com/2019/03/29/vescari-chestor-the-comfortable-chronograph-that-won-me-over/

 

 

Brushed and polished steel alternate each other on our 40mm case. At it's heart beats a  Miyota 6s21 movement. This movement combines the accuracy and reliability of a quartz movement with a 1/4 second sweep of the chronograph that is normally found in a mechanical watch. 

To make the Chestor a real eyecatcher, the watch is equipped with a sunburst dial & polished hand-applied indexes that perfectly play with the light that falls on them.  A domed mineral crystal finally gives it that refined look.

Depending on your taste and preference the Chestor is available with various straps or  our stainless steel bracelet. 

 

 

We offer the Chestor in 2 different case styles. 

  • Stainless steel
  • Rosegold ( pvd coated )

 

 

 

 

 

 

You also have the option to choose our stainless steel bracelet for the Steel & Black and Steel & Blue Chestor.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We offer the following strap options for our new Chestor model:

Genuine Leather with a crocodile pattern in the colors Black, Brown and Dark blue 

Canvas in Black,  Green and Blue

Stainless steel bracelet with butterfly clasp

The straps measure a width of 20mm.  (The leather and canvas straps feature quick release pins) 

 

 

  • Case Material - 316L Stainless steel ( rosegold is PVD coated )
  • Case width - 40mm
  • Lug to lug - 48mm
  • Case thickness - 13.6mm
  • Movement - Miyota 6s21
  • Crystal - Domed mineral crystal with AR coating
  • Dial: Black, Blue or Silver sunburst with hand applied indexes
  • Hands - Alpha style
  • Strap - Leather & Canvas ( with quick release pins ) or stainless steel bracelet
  • Strap width - 20mm
  • Water resistance - 50M/5ATM
  • International Warranty - 24 months

 

 

 

 

 

 

You can add our leather, canvas strap or stainless steel bracelet to your pledge.

Just add €15 for every strap or bracelet that you like. This way you can create a different look with only one watch.

 

 

 

 

 

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ib0p2kcfmlrxsyb/AABcLlG4NuLyBRH3qToOOyC2a?dl=0

 

 

Risks and challenges

After our first succesful crowdfundingcampaign  we established a trustful supply chain with varies suppliers. Therefor we are hopefull to deliver all of your watches in time. We will keep you updated regularly at our page with the proces and timeschedule of the production. Any delays or hopefully quicker process during the production will be communicated to our backers at the page of our campaign

When you have a question or a comment during or after our campaign feel free to ask it. We will strive to anser any question within 24 hours with a max. of 48 hours. Our email is info@vescari.com

Thank you for your trust and support. 
We promise the watches will not disappoint you!

Regards, 
Jeroen Vrinzen 
Vescari Watch Co,

story:
Was born out of necessity. We all have experienced the discomfort of having our cell phone and wallet in our pockets - especially when sitting down, driving, or doing any physical activity. What the team set out to do was to create a stylish and secure solution to a problem that we all face daily.


 a fresh take on the iconic accessory - one side carries your cell phone, while the other side provides a pouch with a sleek wallet.


accommodate any size phone on the market as we offer three distinct cell phone sizes to choose from. These include the most popular current hand held device brands such asthe iPhones, Samsungs, HTCs and BlackBerries. Please consult the diagram included to see which pouch size fits your phone.

story:
Our Story

TAFA: The Textile and Fiber Art List is an international membership organization that seeks to help its members find larger audiences and markets for their work.  Launched in January, 2010, TAFA's first members and supporters were art quilters who quickly understood the potential TAFA offered in bringing together small businesses with a fiber art and textile focus. The membership now includes weavers, dyers, and the whole spectrum of contemporary and traditional textile techniques from around the world. Using Blogger as a test platform, we knew from the beginning that eventually we would outgrow what Blogger could offer and that we would need to fund a website that could truly perform as a base for our marketing needs.  TAFA has grown quickly!  As of May, 2011, we have 273 members from 23 countries.  TAFA's could potentially grow into the thousands!  But, only if we get off of Blogger and on to our dream site.


The video above and our About Us page give a good description of who we are.  In a nutshell, TAFA members are juried in, must have a business focus and a developed online presence.  The core of our membership are working artists who produce their own work for sale online.  We are also open to groups, organizations, teachers and others involved in the textile/fiber art field.  There are many reasons why an organization like TAFA is essential to this niche.  A multi-million dollar industry caught in between definitions of "art" and "craft", it is propelled by individuals and small businesses who often find themselves lost and overwhelmed in an ocean of marketing demands and needs.


As the web has increasingly become central to finding an audience and sustaining a business, more and more time and energy goes into learning how to promote via social media and other trends.  TAFA helps centralize these efforts and provides tools and communities for the members so that they can be found more easily by the larger audience.  Several niches have developed within TAFA. We have communities on Facebook, Etsy, and Flickr.  Member blogs are streamed together on our site and on to our Facebook page.  Coming together in these ways means that there is a much greater chance of being found rather than swimming out there in cyberspace all alone. 


Now that TAFA has grown to a decent size, our Blogger platform has become unwieldy, making it hard to explore what our members really have to offer.  Aside from the gorgeous products that our members have for sale, we also have a gold mine of expertise and talent that needs to be accessed.  Many or our members offer workshops, have published books, give lectures, and several have fascinating global tours that focus on textiles.  We want our audience to have access to these gifts.  We also want to centralize our knowledge and have a place where members who need help can find mentors and guidance as they build their businesses.  During this first year it has become clear that although many of our members are tech savvy, others are completely overwhelmed with new technologies.  Our new website will provide tutorials or referrals to help them learn some of these skills.


TAFA has unique potential both for its members and for the community at large.  The new website offers tools that we cannot develop on our current platform and we hope that YOU will help us achieve this vision.


TAFA Members on Etsy promote themselves through treasuries.


TAFA's New Website

We have contracted with a talented tech team, Horizon Media Group, which can deliver our dream site.  The site will have a powerful search engine with image based results.  Each member will have their own landing page which they can edit at will.  Their presence on the web will be documented there and they will submit images which will show up as search results, linking back to their member profile.  There will be separate pages with streamed information for their member blogs and events.  A member only section will have tools and links for the members.  Users will be able to search through a menu of categories, by key words, location, and price range.  The site will integrate fully with social media sites.

Who will benefit from the new site?

  • TAFA Members are the obvious first benefactors, but there are others.
  • Shoppers:  Members and their products will be easily found.  TAFA aims to become THE destination for anyone interested in textiles and fiber art.  Those looking for handmade gifts, a new textile for their wall, commissioned work for churches and corporations, functional quilts, ethnic textiles, wearable art, toys, and other products made by our members will be able to find them.  Galleries and boutiques will find new suppliers.  Museums will find new artists and sources. 
  • Writers:  Book and blog authors who write about textiles and fiber art will have a place where they can come and readily find people and product to write about.
  • Other artists:  TAFA already is a source of inspiration for the fiber art community.  But, perhaps many do not know that our members are also a great source for supplies.  We have members selling dyes, fabric, textile stamps, vintage textile remnants, ribbons, roving, yarns, along with many other tools and products that are phenomenal.  Many of them follow fair trade or green practices and combined, they are an invaluable resource. 
  • Students of fiber art:  Many TAFA members have been leaders withing their niche for years.  They offer workshops and have authored books.  Site users will be able to see current projects, shows, blog updates, workshops, and watch videos made by or about our members.
  • Peer Organizations:  The textile and fiber art community has scores of organizations around the world.  Some are better known than others, but members will be able to add their affiliations as live links.  For example, TAFA currently has 46 SAQA members.  A TAFA member recently posted on our facebook group that she would be attending the conference and was wondering who else would be there.  On the new site, visitors will be able to click on an affiliation and all TAFA members will pop up.  Half of our members have shops on Etsy.  Click on Etsy and members pop up, all illustrated by visual icons. 
  • Travelers:  One TAFA member recently traveled to Paris from the US.  She looked up another TAFA member there and they had a great time!  Most of our TAFA members have studios or workshops open to the public.  We also have several galleries who are members.  Visitors will be able to search members by location and find people they would like to visit.  Isn't that the best way to learn about a new place you are visiting?  The TAFA Connection!


What We Need and What You Get

Our Geek Team (said with affection) has estimated that our new site will cost $5,000.  We decided to raise part of that money through a public event which we just had in Paducah, Kentucky, our TAFA Market.



Watch our TAFA Market Video


After two months of hard work, we put up a beautiful show with members sending products that represented all five continents.  It was beautiful!  Unfortunately, we experienced devastating floods in the area during the same period, the worst since 1937.  It rained and rained on our parade....  Fortunately, we had one good day which covered our expenses.  The whole experience was exhausting and disappointing on one level, as we did not reach our goals for the new website.  But, on another, our TAFA Market confirmed that our members represent the best within the textile field and that together, they can do great things!  It was quite the wonderful experience to see things in real life that had only been images online.




We decided to use a crowd funding approach to move forward on the new site, so here we are!


What do you get?  Well, if you are a textile/fiber art fan, you will understand the importance of what we are doing and will certainly benefit in one or more ways that were listed above.  If you support the arts in general, you will know how hard this economy has been on the whole industry.  Many of us who are trying to make it in the arts really feel like survivors as we have watched our normal supporters struggle with their own losses.  We are living in chaotic times with financial, human and ecological disasters happening worldwide.  If you have the financial ability to support us and decide to do so, you will definitely have the feel good reward for helping us move ahead so that we can help ourselves.

And, of course, we are offering some perks to thank you as we can.  The perks on the sidebar give a general outline of what we can offer.  As some members are offering perks which are limited in quantity, we are creating a page on our site which will be updated with available donations.

The most important thing we hope you will get is enjoyment and use of our dream site when it is launched. 

How will your money be used?  Our Geek Team has broken down the site into phases which can be launched as we move along.  The first phase is the hardest as it builds the background of the site and its search engine.  This first phase will cost around $3,000.  We will post updates here and on our site as we move along.  If we exceed our goal with this fundraiser, we will use the money to promote our site in other places where we can start finding those markets we long for.

What does it take to raise $5,000?

Money is the obvious answer and we have broken it down:


104 New Members ($48).  Do you know of other people or businesses who could benefit by joining TAFA?  Have them take a look at our criteria on this page.  The membership fee is a one-time fee with no renewals.  It will be going up to $75 when the new site is launched.


23 Non-Member Sponsor Ads ($215/yr).  Similar sites to our future one charge about this per week!  Just 23 people advertising for one year could make our dream site come true.  Sponsor info is on this page.  Current ads will transfer to the new site. 


50 $100 donations, 250 $20 donations or 500 $10 donations.  It all adds up and we appreciate every penny.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share, share, share!  Send the link to this campaign to specific people whom you think might be interested in what we are doing.  Then, do the social media thing:  Share it on facebook, twitter, and blog about us.  Spread the word and make this happen!

Stay involved:  Sign up on our mailing list and follow TAFA as it grows.  You will find a MailChimp box on the right sidebar of our website. 

Get to know our members.  Explore our member profiles (long list on the right sidebar, scroll down quite a bit or explore through the Themes and Places index below that).

Crowd funding options have become a popular way of funding so many dreams and it was hard to know which site to pick.  We believe that IndieGoGo has the base that can understand and support our dream and we appreciate having this opportunity to share TAFA and its growth with you.  Comments or suggestions?  Use the Comments tab here and let's have a dialog!

Together we can do great things!


Update July 20th

Several of our members are working together as a "think tank" on a facebook group, discussing various aspects of the new site, including search function, language used, etc.  I felt that we needed a visual to understand what our products look like and how they can be grouped, so we set up a temporary market:  www.tafamarket.com.  This was done on Wordpress and is a much simplified version of what the new site will look like, yet the result is beautiful! 



Visit the TAFA Market

______________________

Update July 23rd

Website Prototype


Home Page (Long image flashes):















Member Profile:

23 Non-Member Sponsor Ads ($215/yr).  Similar sites to our future one charge about this per week!  Just 23 people advertising for one year could make our dream site come true.  Sponsor info is on this page.  Current ads will transfer to the new site. 

50 $100 donations, 250 $20 donations or 500 $10 donations.  It all adds up and we appreciate every penny. Other Ways You Can Help
Share, share, share!  Send the link to this campaign to specific people whom you think might be interested in what we are doing.  Then, do the social media thing:  Share it on facebook, twitter, and blog about us.  Spread the word and make this happen! Stay involved:  Sign up on our mailing list and follow TAFA as it grows.  You will find a MailChimp box on the right sidebar of our website.  Get to know our members.  Explore our member profiles (long list on the right sidebar, scroll down quite a bit or explore through the Themes and Places index below that).Crowd funding options have become a popular way of funding so many dreams and it was hard to know which site to pick.  We believe that IndieGoGo has the base that can understand and support our dream and we appreciate having this opportunity to share TAFA and its growth with you.  Comments or suggestions?  Use the Comments tab here and let's have a dialog!
Together we can do great things!
Update July 20th
Several of our members are working together as a "think tank" on a facebook group, discussing various aspects of the new site, including search function, language used, etc.  I felt that we needed a visual to understand what our products look like and how they can be grouped, so we set up a temporary market:  www.tafamarket.com.  This was done on Wordpress and is a much simplified version of what the new site will look like, yet the result is beautiful!  
Visit the TAFA Market______________________Update July 23rd
Website Prototype
