story:
Hey everyone, thanks for stopping by!

A little more about us and this project:

S E R P E N T F I R E is…

Devany Wolfe - Owner, artist, designer, crazy cat lady

Mimi Langlois - Head of operations, social media mogul

Sean Gillespie - Pattern vectorizer, accountant, wearer of strange magic hats

And our team has a proposal for you.

Saraphima has been a long time coming. Almost as soon as S E R P E N T F I R E was launched in 2011, people began asking,

"When are you going to put these designs on clothing?"

Messages like this kept pouring in over months and months until Devany began drawing up prototypes in photoshop and magic happened. It was meant to be! 




SERPENTFIRE is a collection of dreams that are shared by everyone involved in the community. It is a movement, a unified body of intention. Our fans had a vision and the execution of that has been so fruitful. Now it is time to provide that vision to our community and beyond - but we need your help to get it off the ground. 

(Above: the "All Seeing" print cut out maxi dress)

(Above: the "Dimensions" print cut out maxi dress)

So, what is our vision exactly? 


Garments that are a reflection of SERPENTFIRE's artwork. Prints that are the essence of the symbols, the design sense and the entire orchestration behind Devany's creative presence. Patterns which pay homage to aboriginal and ancient cultures, as well as personal sigils representing spiritual transformation and personal growth. These garments are beautifully designed and tailored to not only fit the intention of the pattern, but to be down-to-earth and comfortable enough for everyday wear, not only special occasions. New designs are always being made, but 'old favourites' will also always be available, unlike other fashion lines whose collections "are SO 2010" and therefore left in the dust - classics and contemporaries alike will always be ready to make, because the designs are timeless. Custom designs will be welcome too, all you have to do is ask!

(Above: the "Amphitheatre" print crop top)

(Above: the "Eternal Life" bandeau + harem pants)

Locally manufactured and assembled, the line will be made-to-order so that we can conserve materials and lessen our environmental impact as much as possible. 5% of the sales of Saraphima will go to a local feral cat rehabilitation/adoption service in Montreal called Pussy Patrol (check out their facebook page here). As the line develops and expands, we will be donating partial proceeds to other non-for-profit animal welfare organizations worldwide. 



It's not just about beauty, aesthetics, fashion - it is about wearable art with a cause. Supporting an independent artist and giving back to the community. It's a win-win situation. So here is what we need:

$10,000 to launch Saraphima. This breaks down to:

  • $6,000 to materials - ordering/sampling fabrics, creating designs, renting equipment and studio space for assembly
  • $2,000 to personelle - making sure our awesome team has what they need in order to manufacture Saraphima effectively
  • $2,000 to marketing - photographers, locations, web-building, ads, shipping supplies
If we are fortunate enough to surpass our $10,000 goal, well - we have some amazing surprises in store for you in terms of designs and collaborations with other artists - but you'll have to wait and see on that one! 

In order to make this even more worthwhile for you we've created a vast array of interesting and engaging perks that you will receive if you donate. As you can see, a lot of them give you creative direction to help shape the designs to come, and many of them are one-of-a-kind originals. We want you to be a part of this beautiful experience, and if you contribute, you can! Even if you can't donate, you can still share this campaign with your friends and social networks - any little bit helps.

UPDATE: We've made a Pinterest board where you can see a visual list of the perks we have for you: http://www.pinterest.com/saraphima/saraphima-indiegogo-perks/


Wednesday, November 6th UPDATE: We've added a shirts perk! Choose from 3 ladies styles or 3 mens, (can be unisex). 

Clockwise from top left: All Seeing Logo, Flora, and Enter The Void styles.

If you'd like to see more from our lookbooks and learn more about our prints check out: www.saraphima.com

For SERPENTFIRE's artwork: www.serpentfire.ca 

And to keep up on our campaign blog: http://saraphimaindiegogo.tumblr.com - this is where you can also see more details on your perks if you donate! 

Before we go we just want to say a heartfelt thanks to all of you. We couldn't have done this without your love and support. If we succeed in making this dream come true, we will have come so very far! So thank you. Big time. 

Sincerely,

Devany & the SERPENTFIRE team

(From left: Mimi, Devany and our model, Justyna wearing Saraphima)

Clockwise from top left: All Seeing Logo, Flora, and Enter The Void styles.If you'd like to see more from our lookbooks and learn more about our prints check out: www.saraphima.com

Sincerely,

(From left: Mimi, Devany and our model, Justyna wearing Saraphima)

story:
My name is Whitney Port, and I am the designer of the contemporary womenswear clothing line, Whitney Eve.

Our mission statement at Whitney Eve is to convey our unique and eclectic fashion sensibility into wearable works of art that inspire individuality and confidence to express oneself through style. One of our favorite ways to engage and enlighten the fashion industry and fans that have gotten us to where we are today is to produce fashion shows during New York Fashion Week, where we can showcase our artful designs.

This year, we would like to take unprecedented steps on our way to New York Fashion Week with the first fan-supported runway show on September 12, 2012, at Lincoln Center in New York, so I can share my art in a way that educates and involves my fans to be an integral part of the process.  Having come off a successful show at New York Fashion Week last season, the time has come to show again but in a way that has never been done before.  I want to provide my fans with a behind-the-scenes experience on how a runway show of this caliber is designed, developed, and executed.    

Now, to the campaign:

I have set a goal to raise $50,000 to help fund my Spring 2013 Fashion Show. That $50,000 will go towards the following:

  • Fee for production company
  • Models
  • DJ
  • Fee for the space
  • Stylist

I’m really excited to be raising the money through crowd funding, and have some really cool perks for anyone that contributes to the campaign. 

xoxo, Whit

Perks:

$5 - Our undying love, and a personal tweet from Whitney 

$30 - Gift cards to whitneyeve.com, $30 for $50 worth of merchandise on + tweet from @whitneyeve

Shop 'till you drop on whitneyeve.com with a $50 gift card for half the price! Along with the valuable gift card worth $50, receive a personal tweet from @whitneyeve. This great deal is only available to funders of this campaign!

$50 - One piece chosen by me from the Spring ’13 line ($200 value)

Be one of the firsts to rock Whitney Eve’s Spring ’13 line in an item chosen by me, and lead the way in the latest trends for the season. Available only to funders of this campaign!

$50 - Grab bag in your size with two pieces chosen by me ($350 value)

A stylish surprise, I will choose two pieces from Whitney Eve’s various collections in your size. $50 special deal for crowd funders only! Small, Medium, or Large. (not pictured).

 

NEW PERK!!!! $50 - Signed copy of my book, TRUE WHIT!

$85 - Grab bag in your size with four pieces chosen by me ($700 value) 

A stylish surprise, I will choose four pieces from Whitney Eve’s various collections in your size. $84 special deal for crowd funders only! Small, Medium, or Large. (not pictured).

NEW!!! $100 - Opportunity to have a phone call with Whitney about how she got started, what the industry has taught her, and how to put on a fashion show.

NEW!!! $250 - Hair/Makeup consult with Whitney's glam squad via Skype

$250 - it the NYC headquarters during prep week

Fashion week is a busy time and the prep leading to the show is crucial in a shows success. This visit will provide a fly on the wall look at all the prep leading up to the big day be it fittings, model selections, rehearsals, etc. 

In order to redeem this perk, contributor must be available to come to Whitney Eve's NYC headquarters between September 6-12. 

$300 - Exclusive sneak peek: attend a fitting in NYC

Before the looks ever make it to the runway they need to be made, fit and refit. You can be one of the first to see the looks before they hit the runway and experience how a fitting works.

In order to redeem this perk, contributor must be available to come to Whitney Eve's NYC headquarters between September 6-12.

 

 

NEW!!! $350 - Have the opportunity to name runway looks

As the models get ready to put the looks on and as the show is being produced each complete look is named and placed on shows run down. You can be the first to see the completed look and give it a name

All the pieces in the collection are styled together to complete a series of looks that are modeled on the runway in show order, which are named and placed on the run down.  You can be the first to see the completed look and offer your creative input by naming it.

 

NEW!!! $350 - Tour of the Whitney Eve offices in LA (comes with a piece from her line and a coffee date)

As the models get ready to put the looks on and as the show is being produced each complete look is Whitney Eve's corporate LA headquarters is where it all happens from conceiving the designs to the marketing and business side to shipping the product off to stores.

The hub of all things Whitney Eve, the fashion house is also an archive containing a library of all the collections first to present-day. Here the LA-based designer will open up her personal offices for you to see, along with a great new piece from her line, as well as a coffee date!

NEW!!! $750 - Intern at Whitney Eve for a week

Whitney started off in the fashion industry learning and gaining experience in various fields from internships at fashion magazines to getting into the public relations and marketing of a brand to stints at renowned fashion houses until she discovered her true calling was in design.  Be one of the rare few to have this truly special and one-of-a-kind internship at Whitney Eve.

We will be adding new and exciting perks throughout the duration of the campaign, so make sure to keep checking back in!

story:
Short Summary

My name is Christopher McElvogue, I am 21 years old and live in California. My brother Jack McElvogue (15), cousin Natalie Raven (16), and I have an amazing vision for a clothing company that we will fulfill.

Here is a brief summary of our brands vision:

    • Uniqueness, simplicity, quality, surrealism, and fine attention to detail, will be the cornerstones of our tee shirt line.
    • Uniqueness - we are going to push the boundaries of what a shirt pocket can say. There are infinite possibilities, and we will find the most awesome ones and make them a reality.
    • Simplicity - modeling on Apple’s philosophy that there is beauty in simplicity. A plain black or white tee shirt (Or hoodie, hat, etc.), an amazing pocket, a tag spreading our image. That’s it.
    • Quality - we won’t settle for less. If it means we make less money off each shirt in order for us to sell the tee with the best fit, fabric, and style, than we are willing to do that in the name of quality.
    • Surrealism - open their eyes. Wake people up. This is your chance to really make a difference, you have a stage and it is the pocket of a shirt. Let our designs blur the lines of reality and look awesome. 
    • Fine Attention to Detail - thread that matches the color in the picture. Perfect line ups. Don’t forget that the little details matter.

Your contribution will make our vision become a reality and reinforce the passion and drive that is waiting in us to create amazing clothing.

What We Need & What You Get

We are asking for $500 to cover the initial costs of launching our clothing line. We need funding to purchase sewing equipment, fabric, fabric treatments, printers and ink, packaging material, and to cover the costs of launching our online store.

Our initial batch of shirts after we raise enough funds will consists of 9 unique designs, 3 done by each of the 3 founders.

If you are one of the first 9 people to donate $25 or more you will recieve in return one of the 9 initial shirts. We are willing to take your input into account when designing the image for the custom pocket on the shirt.

Thank you for your time and I hope you are able to help us out if our project seems like something you would like to see become established.

Crown Clothing Co. is happening regardless of whether or not our fundraising goal is met on this website. If our fundraising goal is not met, whatever we did raise will still be a great help.

story:
MiGlaz Design: Crafted & Handmade Eyewear in Thailand

We, MiGlaz Design are design & development and manufacturing of eyeglasses frame company which is located in Thailand. Our nature is based in functional eyewear industry and we have launched the handmade collection in 2013.

MiGlaz emerged as an innovator questioning what users really seek from eyewear.  In order to bring new products to customers, we constantly engage in R&D of products and processes. Our vision adheres to the motto “We craft new inspirations and challenge conventional limitations in order to create products that authentically meet the unmet needs of eyewearers”

Our story

The word of MiGlaz came out from "My Glasses" at the beginning of the project 5 years ago. It was just easy thinking of how to find the best quality eyeglasses for yourself?. We were seeking for our "my best glasses" which should be very strong, light, flexible, durable, easy-to-wear, minimal, and beautifully fit on your face. How to do so was another step of our company history. We researched tons of books, consulted with hundred of suppliers and tested with more than thousand materials until we realised that the way we were looking for was just too far away from our expectation. Then finally in 2012, we decided to establish our own design & manufacturing studio and did set theories of making process up by ourselves. We believe in what we thought. We believe in the power of making better and the best quality product.

Our Way & Promise

The way we are is just simply. We have been looking for the best for our eyewearer. Our passion has brought us to do something challenging the limitations and go beyond the edge of conventional eyewear. With these thoughts, we have created creativity and inspiration for the new way of design and our achievement is to go beyond the customer's expectation. 

It is our designers’ inspiration and our engineers’ aspiration to bring a fine eyewear product to users. Our product is an integration of artistic elegance and engineering novelty. Even though it is impossible to claim as the best in a market, we are earnestly confident that we are the best for our customers.

Our Perfection Seeking

We do realize that perfection does not exist but we do pursue it. Every piece has its origin and journey. Every detail has its meaning and requires our attention. It is our job crafting your eyewear and we truly strive for the best.

Our Awards

In 2013 We have been honoured for;

  • Design Excellence Award 2013, Bangkok, Thailand
  • Good Design Award 2013, Tokyo, Japan
  • Currently entering the final stage of IF Product Design Award 2014, Hannover, Germany
  • Currently invited to the Red Dot Design Award 2014, Germany

Our Material

MiGlaz frame consists of;

  • Ultra-thin sheet metal material is made from special high strength stainless steel sourced from United States. Normally its property is used in the aerospace industries. We import the tons of rolls to be treated by our trade secret process. It provides a combination of flexibility and memory shape.
  • A coating supplier is selected from Switzerland which is as same as Tag Heuer. We do double coating to resist scratches, acid and heat.  
  • Our temples and nose pad is covered by silicone cushions which allows softness and comfort touch to the contact area. The spare part is provided for 1 set (temple and nose cushion).
  • The quality control policy follows the ASTM (American Society for Testing and Materials) Standard to ensure every piece of MiGlaz frame is qualified as the best product from us.


Our Features

  • Adjustable frame to fit your face perfectly (base curve, leg angle, front width), thanks to the no-hinge frame that allows the adjustment becomes practical
  • Two layers, two colors (2LINES platform only, patent pending)
  • Fit for comfort feel, adjusted frame allows the contact areas fit to your face with great comfort
  • Ultra thin make light weight (15-19 grams)
  • Luxurious appearance with pearl coating finishes
  • Magnet for folding the temple (patent pending), small magnets at the end of the temple help keep held the frame 
  • 16 unique designs (Copyright 2013)






2LINES Flagship Platform

It is the thinnest seamless design providing extra lightness and comfortcoming with two-color appearance finished by luxurious pearl coating. With ultimately flexible material, 2LINES provide users a better fit which minimizes irritation in temple and nose contact areas.


Lifestyle Shots



2LINES COLLECTION (10 designs)

Please try our mock up at 2LINES frames by printing in A4 size!!!

1LINE Platform

It is a single-piece seamless-design which is 40-70% lighter compared with conventional eyeglass frames. With every part built on one material piece, users are free from conventional misery caused by hinges or loosen screws. Comparing with 2LINES, 1LINE have less flexibility but give users more feeling of minimal design.



1LINE COLLECTION (6 designs)

Please try our mock up at 1LINE frames by printing in A4 size!!!

Create Your Own Signature!!!

  • available up to 20 Characters (included space) for each screen
  • screen 1 external side at the temple is free!!! (normally cost $50)
  • screen another one external side at the temple, just add $30 


Choices of Lens

The lens, provided for the selection of Sunglasses, Mirror and prescription multi-coated lens, are made of polycarbonate instead of conventional glass or plastic lens. Also there is anti reflective and anti scratch coating on the lens. 100% UV protection. 

  • Sunglasses multi-coated lens with high index 1.6, with black grey, black, blue, dark green, green, brown, red tinted colors to be selected. Add only $40 (worth $100)
  • Mirror multi-coated lens with high index 1.6, with gold, silver, or blue colors to be selected. Add only $50 (worth $120)
  • Prescription multi-coated lens (for single lens only);
    • high index 1.6 (power between +6.00 and -6.00 if you prefer index 1.67 please add $85), add only $55 (worth $120) 
    • high index 1.6 with tinted color (sunglasses lens), add only $60 (worth $140)
    • high index 1.6 with mirror coated, add only $80 (worth $180)
    • high index 1.6 with transition available only in grey and brown colors to choose, add only $135 (worth $290)
    • high index 1.67 (power greater than +6.00 and less than -6.00), add only $85 (worth $190)
    • high index 1.67 with tinted color (sunglasses lens), add only $95 (worth $210)
    • high index 1.67 with mirror coated, add only $105 (worth $230)
    • high index 1.67 with transition available only in grey and brown colors to choose, add only $175 (worth $370)
    • your official prescription is required (PD, Eyeglass prescription)
    • If you have Cylinder, you need to sum with your Sphere, for example, Sphere -5.00 and Cylinder -1.00, your lens is power -6.00 and you need to add $55 for index 1.6 or $85 for index 1.67
  • * Index 1.67 is more thinner and lighter than index 1.6 which is more suitable for whose sphere is greater than +6.00 and less than -6.00
  • Acrylic lens, blue anti-reflective coating (standard provided if no other kind of lens is selected)


How to Know Your Size?

a: Front Width

b: Vertical Lens Height

c: Horizontal Lens Width

d: Bridge (distance between lens)

e: Nose Width

f: Temple Length 

Our Packaging & Accessories

(Every frame will get each of these)

  • Matted Black PU hard box case
  • 250D Microfiber cleaning cloth
  • User manual
  • Lens pattern
  • 1 set of rubber cushion (spare part)
  • a how-to-assemble-the-frame DVD for your optician, in case of future change


Frame Adjustment Method

 

* You could also use your hand to adjust the frame by yourself!


Design Your Own Glasses!!! 

Only one in the world!!!

We offer you the best service which is to design a pair of very much unique frame for only you. The design will be created by our in-house design team. Your appearance is our priority and the frame needs to be fit perfectly on your face. All we need is only few pictures of yours and couple questions. That's it!!!

Our design & development process is;

  • Send your picture and the design & color you prefer
  • Scale your image and fit the size to your face
  • Trends & face analysis
  • Design and develop the drawing
  • Color selection
  • Send you 3 design proposals (soft file)
  • Receive feedback and revise the designs
  • Send you a prototype at your door step
  • Receive feedback and enter to the production process 
  • Final quality check
  • Ready to be shipped
  • Delivered by trusted courier agency 
  • Enjoy the best ever eyewear of your life :D



All in One Collection!!!

You will get one set of our collection. 50 pairs of MiGlaz frame. Much appreciated.

It is our pleasure and finally the hidden display is UNLOCK (worth $50)!!! We offer the special Material Display of bent eyeglasses frame with the clear acrylic base for free. It will stun your sight.




MiGlaz Frame Keyring

For whom that would like to support our Indiegogo Project, we offer our limited keyring for $10. Once the total MiGlaz eyewear frame is reached more than 100 frames, the Keyring will be unlocked!!! Every funder of 1LINE and 2LINES will get one of our keyring additionally (except $10 MiGlaz Frame Keyring Perk funders)!!!


How can you help?

Our craftsmanship and artisan have been rooted within our studio for years, they need time and experience to bring preciousness to our frames. Your helps will be used for our young apprentice to practice more skills and foundations to create MiGlaz frame being more than expectation. 

Piece-by-piece design is blended within the in-house studio by experienced team members. It would need more resources to do research on trends, styling and prototypes. We take our own pride to design by ourselves which could offer more stylish and unique appearances to you. That is our ground!

All the perks are created for such good reasons;

  • You can customise your own signature. There will be only one for you or your loved one!
  • You can get the best quality and handmade eyewear with special price!
  • You can get the benefit of wearing the functional eyeglasses which make you forget the old one!
  • You can get the unique customised eyewear. It is designed just for you!
  • 2 features are registered as patent pending and the designs are copyright in 2013. You can help us keep working hard on the new innovative technology!
  • You can give a gift to your beloved friends, sweetheart, family. They will love and enjoy a great one this year.

Every little of your perks and shares help us a lot :D

Please share the links of our IGG page and follow our social media sites. Every little word would let other people could have their own quality frame! 

Our Progress

  • We will keep you posted on our production process and update

Shipping Policy

  • Door to door basis
  • Guaranteed shipping by trusted courier agency (such as DHL, FedEx, UPS etc.)
  • Free shipping worldwide

FAQ

Q: How are the 2LINES and 1LINE different? 

A: For 2LINES, there are two frame interlocking together which provides the two tone appearance to the wearer. Each frame's thickness is only 0.315 mm which make the frame world's thinnest ever for full frame metal sheet eyeglasses. About 1LINE, there is one frame, one colour in each design. Its thickness is about 0.4 mm.They are both made of the same grade of high strength stainless steel. 


Q: Could the colours of 2LINES frame be changed to another?

A: Sorry, its color scheme is designed intentionally to match each other.


Q: About the lens, is there only optical frame?

A: No, the range of sunglasses lens and mirror lens are available. Please see more details in each Perk and 'Choice of Lens' content above.


Q: I love the ideas and I'd like to share with my love one. How can I do that?

A: Thank you so much, much appreciated if you could do that for us. Just simply follow our social media sites, share the link of our IGG page and spread your word to others. That's it! 

ANY OTHER QUESTIONS ARE WELCOME!

If you have any question, please feel free to contact us or keep in touch by linking to our social sites in this page.

Please share the link of our story and let's see what would happen! Thank you for visiting us : D
story_txt:
MiGlaz Design: Crafted & Handmade Eyewear in ThailandWe, MiGlaz Design are design & development and manufacturing of eyeglasses frame company which is located in Thailand. Our nature is based in functional eyewear industry and we have launched the handmade collection in 2013.MiGlaz emerged as an innovator questioning
what users really seek from eyewear.
 In order to bring new products to customers,
we constantly engage in R&D of products and processes. Our vision adheres
to the motto “We craft new inspirations and challenge conventional limitations
in order to create products that authentically meet the unmet needs of eyewearers”Our storyThe word of MiGlaz came out from "My Glasses" at the beginning of the project 5 years ago. It was just easy thinking of how to find the best quality eyeglasses for yourself?. We were seeking for our "my best glasses" which should be very strong, light, flexible, durable, easy-to-wear, minimal, and beautifully fit on your face. How to do so was another step of our company history. We researched tons of books, consulted with hundred of suppliers and tested with more than thousand materials until we realised that the way we were looking for was just too far away from our expectation. Then finally in 2012, we decided to establish our own design & manufacturing studio and did set theories of making process up by ourselves. We believe in what we thought. We believe in the power of making better and the best quality product.Our Way & PromiseThe way we are is just simply. We have been looking for the best for our eyewearer. Our passion has brought us to do something challenging the limitations and go beyond the edge of conventional eyewear. With these thoughts, we have created creativity and inspiration for the new way of design and our achievement is to go beyond the customer's expectation. It is our designers’ inspiration and our engineers’ aspiration to bring a fine eyewear product to users. Our product is an integration of artistic elegance and engineering novelty. Even though it is impossible to claim as the best in a market, we are earnestly confident that we are the best for our customers.Our Perfection SeekingWe do realize that perfection does not
exist but we do pursue it. Every piece has its origin and journey. Every detail
has its meaning and requires our attention. It is our job crafting your eyewear
and we truly strive for the best.Our AwardsIn 2013 We have been honoured for;
Design Excellence Award 2013, Bangkok, Thailand
Good Design Award 2013, Tokyo, Japan
Currently entering the final stage of IF Product Design Award 2014, Hannover, Germany
Currently invited to the Red Dot Design Award 2014, Germany
Our MaterialMiGlaz frame consists of;
Ultra-thin sheet metal material is made from special high strength stainless steel sourced from United States. Normally its property is used in the aerospace industries. We import the tons of rolls to be treated by our trade secret process. It provides a combination of flexibility and memory shape.
A coating supplier is selected from Switzerland which is as same as Tag Heuer. We do double coating to resist scratches, acid and heat.  
Our temples and nose pad is covered by silicone cushions which allows softness and comfort touch to the contact area. The spare part is provided for 1 set (temple and nose cushion).
The quality control policy follows the ASTM (American Society for Testing and Materials) Standard to ensure every piece of MiGlaz frame is qualified as the best product from us.
Our Features
Adjustable frame to fit your face perfectly (base curve, leg angle, front width), thanks to the no-hinge frame that allows the adjustment becomes practical
Two layers, two colors (2LINES platform only, patent pending)
Fit for comfort feel, adjusted frame allows the contact areas fit to your face with great comfort
Ultra thin make light weight (15-19 grams)
Luxurious appearance with pearl coating finishes
Magnet for folding the temple (patent pending), small magnets at the end of the temple help keep held the frame 
16 unique designs (Copyright 2013)
2LINES Flagship PlatformIt
is the thinnest seamless design providing extra lightness and comfortcoming with two-color appearance finished by
luxurious pearl coating. With ultimately flexible material, 2LINES provide
users a better fit which minimizes irritation in temple and nose contact areas.Lifestyle Shots2LINES COLLECTION (10 designs)Please try our mock up at 2LINES frames by printing in A4 size!!!



1LINE Platform
It
is a single-piece seamless-design which is 40-70% lighter compared with
conventional eyeglass frames. With every part built on one material piece,
users are free from conventional misery caused by hinges or loosen screws.
Comparing with 2LINES, 1LINE have less flexibility but give users more feeling of minimal design.

story:
Juni's Playground

After 4 years studying in Parsons: The New School for Design in BFA Fashion Design, I can finally build my collection that I have to design, sew and execute for ONE YEAR for my Senior Thesis. The photo above is just a rough sketch of the collection.

My name is Juni Salgado, I’m twenty-two years old, and I’m pursuing my BFA in Fashion Design at Parsons: The New School For Design. I’d like to consider myself a creative person. I’m always thinking of new, fun ideas and drawing inspiration from the most fundamental of places. I am an ambitious individual who is truly dedicated to the work that he does. I was the winner of a contest with GAP inc, which led to an internship as a children’s accessories designer. My work has also been featured in, “The Fashion Sketch Book” by Bina Abling. When not working hard, I enjoy traveling, shopping, eating, and spending time with my best friends. My life is an adventure; my mind is a catalyst of fashion revolution, my work an expression of art and progress. Thank you for believing in me and I greatly appreciate you considering donating to my cause.

My reason for this campaign:

ALSO NOTE:

ALL BENEFACTORS AND SUPPORT WILL BE MENTIONED IN MY LOOKBOOK <3

I have to spend my whole SENIOR year designing and constructing this whole thesis collection. I have a lot of techniques and contruction abilities up my selves. I am an excellent sewer and tailor but that is not enough for my vision. I also need to dye my fabrics to exact colors and printing my patterns. So I need YOUR help to help me build my collection and help me pay the beaders, dyers, printers and my fabrics.

The goal is $3,000 but this will go on until next year. BUT it is better to have the supplies now so I can start building the collection that is why the end date is 45Days

Your donations will help me pay the following:

  • Fabric Dyers
  • Beaders
  • Fabrics (Organzas, tweeds, twills, etc.)
  • Leathers
  • Trims (beads, zippers, buttons, and all of the hardware)
  • Models
  • Photographer
  • Photoshoot (location, makeup, hair)

Your donations would not only help me build my dream but will also help my parents who have been paying for my education since I was born. It would help them out tremendously. I love them for supporting me and not questioning anything that I pay for my collection because they trust me and all I want in the end is for them to be proud of what i have accomplished and what their money has been paying for.

It would help me build my senior thesis. It is a collection that I have been thinking of doing for a very long time. It is my vision and my esthetic.

ANY AMOUNT DONATED IS GREATLY APPRECIATED.

 

Supply Information:

New York City is home to the very famous Fashion District where I am going to get all my supplies and what I need. Some information about the stores and what I am getting in specific stores:

Fabric Stores include Paron Fabrics, Mood Fabrics, Elegant Fabrics and B&J

Hardware Stores include M&J Trim Stores and Pacific Trims

The Thesis:

My whole thesis collection will speak greatly of who and what I am as a Designer. I have a specific vision that I want to show the world my creativity and art. My clothes are Women's RTW (Ready-to-wear) for Spring/Summer 2014. Inspired by a child's Playground, the collection is going to be fun, contemporary and innovative! Here is just some fun key points to the fun collection:

  • Garments are interchangable: Skirts that turn into Jackets
  • Fun Colors inspired by a Crayon Box
  • Shape is inspired by Sports Uniforms
  • Idea of "playing with your clothes"

My thesis will greatly showcase my ability to make and design clothes. My other achievements and work that can back my ability for design include:

  • GAP Inc Competition- Won an Internship for Kids Accessories, then really loved my work HIRED me after the internship ended. I am now their new Kids Accessories Designer. My work will be sold in stores Summer/Spring 2013
  • My work as been featured in "The Fashion Sketch Book" by fame fashion illustrator Bina Abling.
  • Started as a basic Intern at contemporary high-end designer Frank Tell then was their Design Intern in just a week. I worked on Spring/Summer 2011 then went back to help design Fall/Winter 2011.
  • Worked in various Fashion Shows include other contemporary designers: Mandy Coon, Milly by Michele Smith, Kimberly Ovits and CFDA WINNER- Billy Reid

 

Other Ways You Can Help

RAWRRR SHARE ME AND SPREAD!!!!!!!! WHEEE

If you cannot donate but really want to help me, share! Share this link and send it to your friends or family that might be interested in helping a dream.

ALL BENEFACTORS AND SUPPORT WILL BE MENTIONED IN MY LOOKBOOK <3

story:
Who are we?

 We are 3 friends that have a dream to become something more than just another 9 to 5er. We want to make a difference in our family and our community. We are striving to promote positive vibes through all of our designs.

With this campaign and the money we raise will help contribute to the success and start up of our company.  Our drive and motivation is our family and we would like to give them the opportunity that we never had.

What do we need?

 Now our goal is to raise $750.00 for our startup costs. We have chosen a very great quality t-shirt because we believe that our brand is more than just a basic tee.  Depending on the amount that you choose to donate will be the perk that you will receive as a contributor.  No matter the funds that we receive will help us greatly in getting to where we need to be. Even if the goal is not reached, you will still be helping us in getting to where we want to be.

 Other ways you can help

 Even if you are not able to contribute to the funds, spreading the word is just as much appreciated. The best form of advertising is by word of mouth.

Keep it Fr3sh!!

story:
What is Flicker Technology  

Flicker always people to watch movies, while chatting with their family members. People want the option of watching movies with family, and friends regardless if they are in the same room together.  Flicker will have the option for families to video chat, suggest movies to family members, and watch the same movie at once. 



Flicker will be used on Great Flick's website. Great Flick's is similar to Netflix, and Amazon Prime. Great Flick's will have a membership fee of 8 dollars a month with unlimited streaming. 


Flicker is going to bring families closer together


 Funding needed $15,000

We are in search of 15,000 to get this idea in motion with a prototype to pitch to investors.  The funding will pay for a video programmer to create the website using existing technology. If our goal is not reached the funds will go into working on the website with what was raised. 
Some of the Perks!!!
  • Great Flick's Mug $10

  • Great Flick's Movie Poster $15


  • Great Flick's T-Shirt $25



  • Master Ceremony during Launch Party $2,000


  •  CEO for the Day $3,000

Other great perks as well check them out!!!


Risks & Challenges

The risk that Great Flick's "Flicker" technology faces is going up against existing companies that already have the market companies would be Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Hulu. Challenges of the technology is taking existing technology and using in a different way, While hoping they like the new idea of watching movies with their families. The funds will be used to hire a programmer to write the required code needed for the flicker technology.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't give money you can help find various programmers that will work for half there normal fees, until the company is up in running. Also to just spread the word to other people if you can't contribute money. Help make people aware of the this campaign. 

  CEO/Developer 

Shay has her masters in Entertainment Business, and bachelors in film.
story_txt:
What is Flicker Technology  
Flicker always people to watch movies, while chatting with their family members. People want the option of watching movies with family, and friends regardless if they are in the same room together.  Flicker will have the option for families to video chat, suggest movies to family members, and watch the same movie at once. 




Flicker will be used on Great Flick's website. Great Flick's is similar to Netflix, and Amazon Prime. Great Flick's will have a membership fee of 8 dollars a month with unlimited streaming. 






Flicker is going to bring families closer together

    Funding needed $15,000
We are in search of 15,000 to get this idea in motion with a prototype to pitch to investors.  The funding will pay for a video programmer to create the website using existing technology. If our goal is not reached the funds will go into working on the website with what was raised.

story:
Freeth uses a simple male/female coupling method that can be used you’re your everyday smartphone accessories like a wallet case, desktop stands, car navigations, etc. There’s no need to have to fidget with a messy clamp or cradle to insert your smartphones any longer.


Simply stick the female piece of Freeth to your smartphone.

Free’s uses a strong gel to adhere to your devices and not double-sided tape thus there won’t be any messy residue if taken off.

It sticks to your device securely and won’t fall off.


  

  • When cooking in the kitchen and you want to watch cooking videos or your favorite shows.
  • When riding in the car with your child and you want to put on a video.
  • When riding your bike and you want to use your mobile navigation.
  • Anywhere, anytime you need to stick your phone to something.


  • Its 360 degree revolution feature gives you the ability to use your camera freely.
  • Conventional cases are fit and molded to fit individual phone models. Freeth cases will work with any phone, regardless of model.
  • Convenient and comfortable card case/wallet.
  • Even if you change your phone, Freeth can still be used.
  • The gel pad can be used several times without stickiness or marks.

  

 

 

  • 360 degree revolution.
  • Easy to attach, regardless of size.
  • Easy to transfer to Freeth car stand from your existing Freeth case/card wallet.
  • Can be transferred multiple times without leaving any messy residue.
  • Economical and can be used even after switching devices.

For those that like to use cases with figures on them.

                     Terrier                                 Chihuahua                             Monkey

         Shih Tzu                  Maltese                            Pug                          Beagle

  • 360 degree rotation for easy access to the camera lens.
  • Wired arms allow shifting to make the case into a stand by adjusting the arm positioning.
  • Storage space allows for cards, cash, change, and even earphones.
  • Made from the best cotton materials.
  • Transferable to a new device if needed.



         

  • Easily use as a stand for your smartphone, iPad, or other tablets.
  • Convenient to use when showing your children videos.
  • Even if you use change your device, the doll can be reused. Freeth can be used anywhere you can think of.


Delivery of perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.


With any mass production comes with it risks. The larges risks for Freeth is to ensure that the manufacturing process is sound to avoid defects by inspecting the manufacturing company and their processes as well. Working protyotypes have been made and we have seen good results while using them in our everyday lives. We’re constantly looking at new applications for Freeth and continue to research.

story:
At Newlie I'm creating fresh and customizable products for modern moms by modern moms.  That means YOU!  I'm creating a Community of Moms who get to be involved with the company and do things such as help make selections for each season's styles and then customize those styles to fit your needs. You even help me name my collections!  I'm combining my talents to create the product company and lifestyle destination, Newlie, to  provide custom parenting solutions for modern moms. 


Meet Leslie Newton, The CEO and Lead Designer of NEWLIE

From crafts to comedy sketches, I've been a creator since I was 7 years old.  I began my career in the entertainment industry, performing with the Los Angeles Groundling's Improv Theater and writing skits for programs such as Saturday Night Live (Schweddy Balls, anyone?).  

In 1999, I transitioned from working with comedians to working with moms (probably the only group more skilled at entertaining a rowdy crowd!) founding timi & leslie, the company that introduced the "stylish diaper bag for moms" to the masses.  

My designs at timi & leslie were sold to over 500 stores nationwide and internationally.  I developed a celebrity clientele of women such as Jessica Alba, Pink, Annette Bening and Hillary Swank, and was featured all over the media.

Today I'm excited to be launching Newlie, and create an amazing Mom Community to help me build this product company and lifestyle destination.

If you can't contribute money, there are still so many ways you can help!

  • Share this campaign with the indigogo share buttons to your friends, family and anyone you think would be excited to get involved with this exciting new company!


Contact Info:

Contact me at: newliebags@gmail.com 

(please ask me questions through email and not on comments section to make sure I get them - thanks!)
Wholesale inquires: newliebags@gmail.com

FAQS
  • How do I clean the bags? Spot clean with a damp towel and air dry.  Do not put them in the washer or dryer.
  • What kind of strollers do Newlie Bags work on with the stroller straps?   Our bags can attach to a wide variety of strollers. They easily attach to any full-size model, whether it has 2 separate handlebars or one long horizontal handlebar. Double strollers that have a middle handlebar will also work with our bags.  
  • How do I calculate international shipping?  We've listed the international shipping along with the perk.  Just add this to your amount of the perk you selected.
  • How do I know if I won anything?  We will contact you through email after the campaign to let you know if you won anything and when you will receive it.  Shipping for raffle prizes is free unless you live outside the US.  You will be notified of the international shipping charges when we email you.

PLEASE NOTE

Delivery time: In manufacturing, there's always a risk that suppliers do not fulfill orders on time. We're working with a very professional, organized factory that has decades of experience. We trust them to help us coordinate other material suppliers and produce in a timely manner. We've added buffers to the lead times just in case.   I'll update you frequently about our progress, and if there are any blips along the way, I'll let you know! 

Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of the US, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.

Social Media Contests:  Make sure to be following us on Facebook and Twitter to get in on our other social media contests giving away great Newlie Bags and other fantastic brands!

A Word About Gratitude

When starting a new company, at the beginning you ask for a lot of favors from family and friends.  I am beyond grateful for my family and friends who have been helping me so far so I'd like to thank them here.

I also thank my dad who always encouraged me to follow my creativity and believe in myself.  

Me and my dad:



Watch our rap video about being a new mom!  Kit & Leslie, the rap moms of M'ternal Instanx

story:
Birthday Wishes

Do you know how you always wish that your Friends and Family somehow know what it is that project that takes over 99% of your brain and constantly plays in your head? And how you wish that they can just chip in few real $$$ and become part of the 'dream becoming reality'?

You know? Here we go!

Dream: BRISA Tango Fashion

So mostly everybody knows that Hernan is designing and creating Argentine Tango outfits for both Tangueras and Tangueros. Suits, pants, skirts, dresses, etc. All that on the simple sewing machine, fabrics spread all over the floor, and all this creative madness... you know ;-)

The designing fascination grew to the point that some changes are due so those who are falling in love with the designs (or already ARE in love with them) can get Quality Product.

The Birthday list includes:

1. SINGER Quantum Stylist 600-Stitch (1000+ Stitch Function) Computerized Sewing Machine with Extension Table, Bonus Accessories and Hard Cover

2. Double Mobile Desk & Work Center

3. Brother 1034D 3 or 4 Thread Serger with Easy Lay In Threading with Differential Feed


All this together bought from Amazon costs $772.47 plus tax.

I think it would be quite easy for all of us, Hernan's friends, chip in $5, $10, $20, $50 whatever you feel like to help the Birthday dream come true :-)

Can you IMAGINE

YOU will be a SPONSOR of Who Knows Maybe The Next Big Tango Fashion Designer. Aren't you proud already :-)


Don't believe in B-days and Friends?

That's cool! I respect that.
Instead - you can simply purchase the Discount Card For Yourself: $100 will buy you $150 worth of BRISA Tango Fashion Products. That's 33% savings right here. And I'm totally sure you will soon see something you will like and want to have.

You don't know where to look? Look at my clothes in classes or in Milongas. I'm a live mannequin for the fasion experiments. Look at Hernan - he is wearing his own design.
Website........ ahhhhhhuuuuhhhmmmm..... coming... soon.
Meanwhile check out: www.HernanBrizuelaTango.com for links. Soon. Very soon.

And that’s all there is to it.

Below are some photos I just happened to have... (I know, I know.... I need to think ahead. Starting.... NOW)

story:
NEW PERK!

Ah, spring! Get your dose of pastels and celebrate International Women's Day with us!

Thanks to you guys, WE HIT OUR INITIAL FUNDING GOAL!

Having all your support, we are ready to set a stretch goal of 4000 euro – let’s go beyond and do cool stuff together!

Reaching our initial funding goal, we are able to to pay for the first portion of custom made packaging as well as cover material expenses to produce rewards for our campaign. The New Stretch goal 4k will not only cover all the rewards and shipping expenses, but also cover the whole packaging order cost! Moreover, we’ll be able to order brand new materials for experimenting and prototyping our next collection’s jewelry pieces.

Together we can make it happen!

We are planning some great ADDITIONAL PERKS to celebrate the beginning of spring – some fresh colors to start a new season with amazing jewelry from YAYOI. Stay tuned!

Meanwhile, please help spread the word and share our campaign with your friends on Facebook, Twitter or via email!

▶ ▶ ▶ www.yayoi.eu ◀ ◀ ◀


Hi Indiegogo!

Thanks for visiting our Indiegogo page!

 ➤➤➤ To support us, please click CONTRIBUTE NOW button on the right ➤➤➤

YAYOI jewelry:

Statement designer jewelry made with premium quality materials and craftsmanship. YAYOI necklaces and bracelets are individually handcrafted with high quality materials and semi-precious stones. Our unique jewelry is for people ready to make a statement and not afraid to experiment.

We are Lidia and Jane and we’ve been friends for years. We’ve shared a lot of experiences, traveled and lived together in a lot of different countries. We’ve always known that we wanted to unite our vision of beauty and create something together. The idea of making unique handmade jewelry was born while we were both living in London. We were inspired by the street fashion of chic Londoners and funky style of young rebels. A retrospective of japanese artist Yayoi Kusama left a great impression on us – now we knew exactly what we wanted to do! We decided to unite our passions for craft, art and fashion to create extravagant statement pieces of jewelry. Jewelry and accessories have always captured our attention – a small accent transforming a whole outfit to make you look special.

We moved back to Latvia and spent months designing, prototyping and creating samples. We researched the market and tested our creations by personally wearing them. When it came to the point when we had to give a name to our brand, the decision was obvious - YAYOI, after the artist that inspired it...

Our pilot collection was greeted with compliments, local magazines and bloggers wrote positive reviews and our jewelry was soon available on the shelves of the best Latvian concept stores.

We took into account all the critiques and suggestions to create the samples for our second collection. We have plans to conquer the European market and become a recognizable brand not only in Latvia, but all over the world. This is the part where we need your help!


ELEMENT ONE collection

The concept of our new collection is water and its different natural states. Water is the beginning of everything and the first of all elements because of its mastery over them. Water therefore is our main source of inspiration in ELEMENT ONE. It changes the states forming a variety of textures. Water’s mysterious life giving qualities are equated with the feminine aspects of creation. By applying natural materials such as clear quartz and sea corals and using a deep melancholic color spectrum, we have attempted to deliver a story of the transformation of the element. Each piece reflects a different state of water. It freezes and forms a translucent ice on the surface whilst being in motion in the dark deep depths. Crystallizes and paints all in white. Water is nature's greatest artistic expression and this in turn has inspired us in the designs of the Element One collection.


To see all the pieces from ELEMENT ONE collection please visit our webpage:

▶ ▶ ▶  www.yayoi.eu  ◀ ◀ ◀


Our new collection is now ready for the first production launch. Your help will bring this vision to life and fund the first production run of the ELEMENT ONE collection. In order to bring this project to life we need your support:

  1. To place a bulk order for the materials.
  2. To pay for the first portion of custom made packaging.

By investing in this project on Indiegogo you will gain the advantage of having YAYOI jewelry pieces at a discounted rate.

Your pledges will enable us to bring this product to the real world!


MATERIALS

We use high quality materials and semi-precious stones that are costly. In order to receive a wholesale discount we need to place a large order. We’ve found material suppliers that meet all our requirements. A part of the money pledged will cover the material order to make the first production run of our new collection.


PACKAGING

The first thing customers will notice is our packaging. We want to create smartly branded boxes that is attractive and compliments our unique jewelry.

The problem is that most packaging suppliers require large quantity orders. Luckily we’ve been able to find a local packaging manufacturer that is ready to produce custom made boxes for our necklaces and is open to collaborating on quantities and prices.

Together with the company’s friendly staff we have developed the ultimate box prototype that will fit all of the necklaces. We’ve agreed to divide the packaging production to several stages and now we are ready to receive the first portion of our handcrafted boxes.

Advantages of our new packaging:

  • made from eco-friendly fully recyclable materials: cardboard covered with natural cotton fabric
  • compact and easy-on- the eye
  • custom made especially for us
  • handcrafted under fair working conditions in Latvia



UNIQUENESS: You will make a statement wearing YAYOI jewelry

GREAT VALUE: You will get a special price for our pieces after backing our project

SUPERB QUALITY: We really care about quality and design. It is our priority to deliver great products to you.

MAKE A DIFFERENCE: Support an independent jewelry brand

INNOVATION WORTH SPREADING: You'll help to run our first production so more people can enjoy our pieces! We believe in creating fashion that expresses your character, starts conversations and connects people.




RISKS AND CHALLENGES

The main challenge to successfully accomplishing the project goal is how to market and publicize the brand. We are currently updating social networks and emailing bloggers in order to expand the brand’s presence. The other challenge is ensuring deliveries are on time. We hope that everything will go according to plan. However if we feel we are not coping on our own we will seek additional help to complete the orders on time. We also have all our suppliers arranged to minimize the risk of not getting the supplies we need. We are confident we can deliver all the rewards to the expected quality and on time!

Thank you for taking some time to see and hear our story. Your support means the world to us!

BIG Thanks goes out to:

Monta Apsane, Daryl Worthington, Lee Chapman, Alina Lapshina, Kristine Madjare, David Viscu, Julia Oh, Marina Dorosenko, our families and friends. Without all of your helps and supports, YAYOI wouldn't be what it is today.

Element One collection.To see all the pieces from ELEMENT ONE collection please visit our webpage:▶ ▶ ▶  www.yayoi.eu  ◀ ◀ ◀Our new collection is now ready for the first production
launch. Your help will bring this vision to life and fund the first production
run of the ELEMENT ONE collection. In order to bring this
project to life we need your support:


To place a bulk order for the materials.


To pay for the first portion of custom made packaging.


By
investing in this project on Indiegogo you will gain
the advantage of having YAYOI jewelry pieces at a discounted rate. 
Your pledges will enable us to bring this product to the real world!
MATERIALS
We use high quality materials and
semi-precious stones that are costly. In order to receive a wholesale discount
we need to place a large order. We’ve found material suppliers that meet
all our requirements. A part of the money pledged will cover the material order to make the
first production run of our new collection.
PACKAGING
The first thing customers
will notice is our packaging. We want to create smartly branded boxes that is attractive and
compliments our unique jewelry.
The problem is that most packaging suppliers require large
quantity orders. Luckily we’ve been able to find a
local packaging manufacturer that is ready to produce custom made boxes for our
necklaces and is open to collaborating on quantities and prices.
Together with the company’s friendly
staff we have developed the ultimate box prototype that will fit all of the
necklaces. We’ve agreed to divide the packaging production to several
stages and now we are ready to receive the first
portion of our handcrafted boxes.Advantages of our new packaging:


made
from eco-friendly fully recyclable materials: cardboard covered with natural
cotton fabric


compact
and easy-on- the eye


custom
made especially for us

handcrafted
under fair working conditions in Latvia




UNIQUENESS:
You will make a statement wearing YAYOI jewelry
GREAT
VALUE: You will get a special price for our pieces after
backing our project
SUPERB
QUALITY: We really care about quality and design. It is our priority to deliver
great products to you.
MAKE A
DIFFERENCE: Support an independent jewelry brand
INNOVATION WORTH
SPREADING: You'll help to run our first production so more people can enjoy our
pieces! We believe in creating fashion that expresses your character, starts
conversations and connects people.
RISKS AND CHALLENGES

The main challenge to successfully
accomplishing the project goal is how to market and publicize the brand. We are
currently updating social networks and emailing bloggers in order to expand the
brand’s presence. The other challenge is ensuring deliveries are on time. We
hope that everything will go according to plan. However if we feel we are not coping on our own we will seek
additional help to complete the orders on time. We also have all our suppliers arranged to minimize the risk of
not getting the supplies we need. We are confident we can deliver all the
rewards to the expected quality and on time!



Thank you for taking some time to see and hear our story.
Your support means the world to us!
BIG Thanks goes out to:
Monta Apsane, Daryl Worthington, Lee Chapman, Alina Lapshina, Kristine Madjare, David Viscu, Julia Oh, Marina Dorosenko, our families and friends. Without all of your helps and
supports, YAYOI wouldn't be what it is today.

story:
Our Story

How do you balance everything that life throws at you? This is a question that many people struggle with including me. And I believe that the answer lies in believing in what you do and truly knowing who you are and what is important to you.

I've spent years trying to figure out how to bring something that I love together with something that has a positive impact on my family, my community and ultimately, the world. I realize that this is an ambitious goal but I also know that IT IS POSSIBLE. When life happens, we are forced to evaluate what is really important. And I know what’s really important: good health, faith, family, friends – and a really good pair of shoes to help you get through it all.

Pulling all of those things together, I’ve designed Bella Modi (patent pending). This product is a shoe system that provides a comfortable shoe base and multiple straps/components that allow for an infinite number of design variations. It will change the way women think about shoes. It will give them the tools to feel creative, beautiful, and empowered.

 

The Impact

Myself: The positive impacts start here, with me. Change happens one person at a time and carries forward.

You: This product will give you the fashion tools you need to complete your look with a personal touch. It will empower you, help you feel beautiful, and allow you to exercise your creativity.

My community: My business model includes giving back to the community in a way that empowers women. Not only creating jobs in which people have unlimited earning potential, but also with programs that encourage community members to donate to local women’s shelters – contact me for more details.

The environment: Worldwide, billions of pairs of shoes are thrown away annually. Many landfills are facing capacity issues and we continue to add to the problem by buying and discarding more shoes as styles and colors change. With Bella Modi, all you need is the latest strap kit, not a few new pairs of shoes for each season!

The world: Our goal is to create less waste, more good will, and contribute to a stronger economy – worldwide. This product is a tool for making good things happen for many people.

 

What We Need

With your help, I can make this a reality.  We are just getting started and need all the help we can get!  Please donate to help with:

Product Development: This product is fully designed and in the process of being prototyped and patented. Funding will support the completion of the prototypes, consumer testing, patent finalization and trademark development.

Marketing: In order for this product to achieve its goals, people need to know about it! Websites and general marketing materials need to be developed and distributed.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Get on board and get the word out! Please share this link on facebook, twitter, linked in, etc. The power of your network is going to help bring this project to fruition.

Do you have skills or experience? Advice, support, and services that can assist are also appreciated. If you can offer any services which support a start-up that would be great! And I’d love to take advantage of other people’s knowledge and not reinvent the wheel. So please feel free to contact me directly if you can offer any help in start-ups, manufacturing, SEO, or anything else that I’ll be tackling as I move this project from concept to reality.

story:
Getting to Know Me ("Big Apple" bound)

Hello! My name is Katy and I am a Campus Sales Rep for Mark. Cosmetics & Beauty Products. I have been a Rep for about a year and a half. I am really excited about Mark.'s impact with young ladies & their innovative products & design. Mark. is a sister company of Avon and they are based out of NYC. The company started in 2006 and is growing in leaps and bounds. They announced the Dream Trip on a Sales Call. It is a all expense paid trip to NYC for Training for us Reps and free Product! I have always wanted to go to New York City since I started with this company. The trip would be so amazing if I got the chance to go! The goal is to sell $2,000 in product and mark. corporate will send me, a Sales Representative to NYC ALL EXPENSES PAID. So, if you'd just like to help, please shop my E-Boutique or donate on this Fundraiser site. Here is the link to my E-Boutique through mark. http://www.mymarkstore.com/kathrynmcbride


The Pay it Forward Effect (Impact of your help-"There's Nothing You Can't Do")

The impact this Fundraiser has for me & other women is to Empower young women to make their Mark on the world and realize they can make a difference. We support a wonderful charity called M. Powerment which is designed to support ladies of Domestic Violence. Our company is founded on charity and we really want to make our Mark. in a positive way on the world! Making the trip to New York for Training would help me to be a better Sales Woman and explore my creative side as well.


The Campaign & Your Freebies/Perks ("Where Dreams are Made Of")

I need to raise 2,000 in Sales from customers. The money will be used to support my company Mark. and buy products..either beauty or fashion. If I am able to sell 2,000 dollars worth of product, then Mark. will give me a "Dream Trip" to New York City where I will visit Headquarters and attend training meetings. Only the Top Reps from around the country will be there & I really hope to be one of them. My heart is in this company and I really get excited talking about their products & what our company represents. Please visit my own personal E-Boutique and make a purchase to help support my trip! :) The web address is http://www.mymarkstore.com/kathrynmcbride. Any purchase big or small will help. I promise.


How You Can Help (Mark. Rewards & Charity)

If you are not able to help at this time, bookmark my website or put my campaign in the back of your mind. Do you know any friends that could use a beauty of fashion pick-me-up? Our products are very affordable & innovative. We stay on trend with all the latest fashions and are sometimes the first to bring products to market. Tell your friends about Mark & ask them if they can visit my website. Also, if you want to help, you can host a party or event where I can bring product and will raffle off Freebies. It's a great way to have girl time & check out Mark. products first hand. There are many ways you can help if not financial. Just donating your time to help me market or organize an event would be great! Thanks for considering my campaign to Get me to NY City!!!


**SUMMARY**


~ Need to Raise $2,000 in SALES by March 24th


~Sales Representative Rewards Trip for Selling $2,000 worth of product


~Sales Training in New York City with the Top Professionals in my company Mark.


~Mark. by Avon is supporting this trip


~The Trip of a Lifetime!!!!

story:
THE MOST STYLISH MULTI-FUNCTIONAL SPORT & LIFESTYLE SHOE IN FOAM COMPOSITE FOOTWEAR!

              

MULTIPLE COMPONENTS allow the same functionality and versatility as a fabric made sneaker but much more durable!


MULTI-FUNCTIONAL

  • leisure, recreation, casual, and work 

AIR/WATER VENT & DRAIN

  • stylish AIR VENTS (keep your feet cool and dry) & WATER DRAINS aftersoaking in water

WEAR MOLDABLE FOOTBED

  • soft footbed for a CUSTOM FIT

ANTI-MICROBIAL

  • NO STINKY feet!

100% RECYCLABLE  

  • made of foam composite material that can be recycled to produce playground pads, tracks, and more!


________________________________________________________________________

We've combined function and comfort and fused it with the most unique design in foam composite. Use 'em for everyday use for a comfortable and COOL look! But the 2.0 also performs at its BEST for MUD RUNS and the most challenging OBSTACLE COURSES! No water logging, and mud just runs off. SUPER EASY cleaning and looking good as NEW!

 GET 'EM AS DIRTY AS YOU WANT...CLEANS IN SECONDS!


 APX (All Purpose Kix) and not just for everyday use. The APX is designed to meet the demands of all your athletic recreational activities from Hiking, Crossfit, Walking, Running, and more. And of course its completely submersible in water! The lace is ELASTIC for easy slip-on an removal and is specifically made for water use (won't dry up and crack).

 Crosskix are EXCELLENT for your daily everyday shoe. But for those looking for specific uses and functions, below is a helpful comparison chart to help you choose your style.

NEW proprietary material compound is 20% SOFTER!

Both the 2.0 and APX styles are WEAR MOLDABLE. What does this mean? Our proprietary compound is specially designed to take the shape of your feet over time. The more you wear your KIX, the more it molds to the shape of your feet including the ARCH, FOREFOOT, and HEEL CUP.


_________________________________________________________________________



NO NEED TO TIE SHOELACES! 

Our Fully Adustable Elastic Lacing system allows you to INSERT and REMOVE your feet without ever having to untie or tie shoe laces! EXCELLENT for kids!

 _____________________________________________________________________


1. How do you qualify for the "FREE" pair offer?

  • If you backed our original project (Crosskix II) and we are able to VERIFY your order, you are eligible to receive an additional pair at NO CHARGE.

2.  If I am a "Verified Backer", how do I get a FREE pair?

  • Simply back the project for at least 1 pair (plus applicable shipping charges). Your 2nd pair is FREE. You may pledge for more pairs but only (1) will be FREE per backer.

3. Is the "FREE OFFER" a 2 for 1? 

  • No. Each backer/customer is only given (1) FREE pair regardless of how many pairs are purchased.

4. Does the additional shipping charge apply to the "FREE" pair?

  • Yes. 

5. Can backers choose any style (2.0 or APX)?  

  • Absolutely. The surveys will allow you to choose your style, color, size, and quantity based on your purchase.

6. What sizes are available for each style? 

  •  2.0: 3M/5W to 12M/14W 
  • APX: 3M/5W to 13M/14W 

7. When can we choose our style, color, and size? 

  •  Upon completion of a successful campaign, we will be sending out a survey to all backers in which you will be able to specify all the information we need to fulfill your order. 

 The more shoes we can circulate, the closer we achieve launching our SOCIAL and ENVIRONMENTALLY conscious programs. Our goal is to donate lightly worn and usable Crosskix to needy families domestically and third world countries around the world. And, the unwearable shoes will be recycled to produce playgrounds, running tracks, and other sports surfaces. Send us your old KIX and get a discount on your next pair.  

At Crosskix, we are VERY passionate about helping those that need assistance and giving back to the world. Yes, this is a huge undertaking but..

WE CAN DO IT...ONE SHOE AT A TIME!



Crosskix are produced in MENS sizes. So... 

When selecting your size, submit the MENS size that is on same row. For Example: if you wear a womens size 7, you would submit a size 5.

Also, we will provide a chart that compares other brands with Crosskix to assist in selecting the correct size the first time around! 


2.0 - NEW INSTEP STRAP FASTENER! Simple yet very effective! Select a slot and snap into place. Goodbye velcro! Wear your 2.0's tight, loose, or just right and NEVER worry about the strap coming off!  


 



HELP US GET YOUR FAVORITE COLOR KIX ON YOUR FEET BY NEXT....

Our goal is to donate lightly worn and usable Crosskix to needy families domestically and third world countries around the world. And, the unwearable shoes will be recycled to produce playgrounds, running tracks, and other sports surfaces. Send us your old KIX and get a discount on your next pair.

 
At Crosskix, we are VERY passionate about helping those that need assistance and giving back to the world. Yes, this is a huge undertaking but..


WE CAN DO IT...ONE SHOE AT A TIME!







Crosskix are produced in MENS sizes. So... 
When selecting your size, submit the MENS size that is on same row. For Example: if you wear a womens size 7, you would submit a size 5.
Also, we will provide a chart that compares other brands with Crosskix to assist in selecting the correct size the first time around! 











2.0 - NEW INSTEP STRAP FASTENER!

Simple yet very effective! Select a slot and snap into place. Goodbye velcro! Wear your 2.0's tight, loose, or just right and NEVER worry about the strap coming off!  











 












HELP US GET YOUR FAVORITE COLOR KIX ON YOUR FEET BY NEXT....

story:
You might know us from before, you may even have a Grand Frank shirt or suit in your wardrobe. But for the last year we have been working on something new and really special. And now, we’re incredibly excited to share what we believe is the best suede jacket out there.
 

 

When creating this jacket we focused on versatility. We wanted you to find an apparel which is perfect to wear in casual as well as formal environments. The jacket is easy to dress up- or down and will suit you in every occasion. 

 

 

The Limoges model is inspired by the all-american workwear of the 40's. The collar and the buttons give this jacket a more dressy appearance. 

The Marloes model is a modern take on the classic bomber jacket. Without the elastic hem, it’s versatile and takes on a tailored look.


The Process 
When the tanning process is done, the hides are treated with a series of different mixture of oils, salts and other elements to create a durable and long-lasting material. Next up is the texturing process where the hides are thinned to 0.5 mm before they are sent over to the colouring.

Four days later, the dry leathers are sent to the cutting table where they are cut by hand in 2 different patterns. Our Marloes model contains of 37 different leather pieces and the Limoges model contains of 57 pieces. When the leather is cut, it is passed to our seamstress, Filomena, and her team. They work with each piece separately, and this is the part of the process where the jacket starts to take shape. The skilled seamstresses add our cotton blend lining together with all trims, including buttons and zippers.

After 5 weeks of hard work, love and dedication in the production process, the jacket is perfected and ready to be shipped.

 

We set out to challenge the established pricing model of today, where traditional luxury brands markup their prices up to 800%. Their business model includes distributors, agents, up-street retail locations and excessive marketing. As all these middlemen need their margin, the apparel ends up overpriced and silly expensive.

We decided to change that. 


We believe that the this traditional model has to be updated and improved. By teaming up directly with our manufacturers, cutting out the middlemen and selling our products directly to you, we can now offer these premium quality jackets at factory direct prices.

 

 


 

 

 

Grand Frank was founded to give men the opportunity to wear formal clothing without compromising with their individuality and personal style. Founder and CEO Erik Bergström was working in a corporate automative environment at the time, and struggled to find clothing and accessories which reflected his personality, indeed any personality. He decided to create it himself and Grand Frank was born.

Ever since then our company has been built around creating staple pieces in a man’s wardrobe with richer stories and greater personality. Our simply philosophy is that if you love what you’re wearing, you’ll feel great, easy as that.

Welcome to Grand Frank
