story:
What is F2C? F2C stands for Father 2 Child, an innovative, evidence-based program implemented by the Mental Health America of San Diego to provide fathers with the necessary tools to be the best parent and partner they can be.

  • A continuous cycle of 12 week classes created by the Fatherhood Initiative.
  • Successfully designed to break generational cycles of absentee fathers.
  • Proven to create healthier and happy families.
  • Provides additional support through activities, programs and referrals.



    • Why is F2C Essential for San Diego? Many men become fathers without ever having the opportunity to learn how to parent.

  • This can frequently be attributed to men having absent, distant, or abusive fathers. However, these men often want to break the cycle.
  • Many men return from war or incarceration and are expected to immediately fall back into the role of being dad, even though they are dealing with many complex personal issues.
  • Parenting is hard, and F2C is here to provide the necessary support, compassion, and education for fathers who are ready to take the next step toward being the best version of themselves.



    • Who Attends? A diverse population of men between 21 and 67 years old.They are referred by:

  • Word of Mouth
  • Religious and Nonprofit Organizations
  • Wives
  • Family courts, Probation officers, and Counselors



    • Curriculum Highlights Ages and stages
    Connecting and Communicating with Your Child
    Discipline vs. Punishment
    Parenting and Stress


    Ok, Great!
    So, What the @#$% Are You Doing with My Donation?

    Your donations directly improve San Diego since they are put toward expanding MHASD’s F2C program as well as other programs dedicated to enhancing the resources available for those in San Diego who are in need of self-help.


    Broke, But Still Want to Help? Don't worry. We still love you!
    There are plenty of ways to help us at no cost.
  • This page, SHARE it!

  • On facebook and Twitter, LIKE us!

  • Yearning to know more, VISIT our website!

  • Still want to do more? CALL or VOLUNTEER!


    •
story_txt:
What is F2C?

F2C stands for Father 2 Child, an innovative, evidence-based program implemented by the Mental Health America of San Diego to provide fathers with the necessary tools to be the best parent and partner they can be.
A continuous cycle of 12 week classes created by the Fatherhood Initiative.
Successfully designed to break generational cycles of absentee fathers.
Proven to create healthier and happy families.
Provides additional support through activities, programs and referrals.


Why is F2C Essential for San Diego?

Many men become fathers without ever having the opportunity to learn how to parent.
This can frequently be attributed to men having absent, distant, or abusive fathers. However, these men often want to break the cycle.
Many men return from war or incarceration and are expected to immediately fall back into the role of being dad, even though they are dealing with many complex personal issues.
Parenting is hard, and F2C is here to provide the necessary support, compassion, and education for fathers who are ready to take the next step toward being the best version of themselves.



Who Attends?

A diverse population of men between 21 and 67 years old.They are referred by:

Word of Mouth
Religious and Nonprofit Organizations
Wives
Family courts, Probation officers, and Counselors


Curriculum Highlights


Ages and stagesConnecting and Communicating with Your ChildDiscipline vs. PunishmentParenting and Stress
Ok, Great!So, What the @#$% Are You Doing with My Donation?

Your donations directly improve San Diego since they are put toward expanding MHASD’s F2C program as well as other programs dedicated to enhancing the resources available for those in San Diego who are in need of self-help.
Broke, But Still Want to Help?

Don't worry. We still love you!There are plenty of ways to help us at no cost.
This page, SHARE it!
On facebook and Twitter, LIKE us!
Yearning to know more, VISIT our website!
Still want to do more? CALL or VOLUNTEER!

story:
Still looking to snag a pair of Westwoods?  Check us out at westwoodsun.com now!






The Westwood Story

On the Wasatch Front of the Rocky Mountains, things are epic. The snow runs deep in the winter and the lakes stay glassy in the summer. Our four seasons bring an average of 265 days jam packed with sun and all the outdoor recreation starts at 4,500 feet above sea level and up. So the need is simple; a go anywhere, do anything pair of shades in the battle against UV rays... with an emphasis on looking fresh.

Each handcrafted pair of Westwood Sunglasses is made entirely of wood and all frames come with polarized lenses that dramatically reduce glare. The temples are flexible giving a universal fit for all noggin sizes. Weighing in at .8 ounces, these comfortable sunglasses are feather light. And don’t sweat taking them out on the water either, wood floats.

The most exciting part about the Westwood Sunglasses line is the price. We’re providing quality eyewear for less than half the retail price of big brand shades. Protecting your eyes is a must but that doesn’t mean you should break the bank doing it. Westwood Sunglasses needs your support to get the ball rolling. Help us build the brand by contributing through IndieGoGo and get product shipped direct to your door. Join the fight against UV rays and rock some Westwoods.

We need your support!

In order to get the first series of Westwood Sunglasses manufactured, we need your help!  In exchange, we are offering heavy discounts on our Ivory, Maple, and Smoke Classic models. 

We need $6,500 to fully launch the brand.  The money raised will go into directly into manufacturing costs of the Westwood Fall Collection and design costs of the Spring and Summer Collections.

The Classic Collection

Our Indiegogo campaign features three unique frame colors from our Classic Sunglasses line: Ivory, Maple, and Smoke.  Each handcrafted pair of Westwood Sunglasses is made entirely of natural wood or bamboo.  Each set of Westwood Sunglasses includes the following features:

  • Eco-friendly and made entirely of wood
  • Handcrafted making each pair unique
  • Polarized lenses that dramatically reduce glare
  • Flexible temples for universal fit for all noggin sizes
  • Feather light by weighing in at around .8 of an ounce
  • Includes Westwood branded Wooden Case and cleaning microfiber
Classic Ivory




Classic Maple

 

 

Classic Smoke

Classic Honey (Pre-Order)

Check out the gallery for more pictures! 

Find us on Instagram @westwoodsun

All the Perks!

There are a variety of ways to help support Westwood Sunglasses. Pick your favorite by selecting the perk on the upper right side of this page!

  • Westwood Early Birds ($35)
  • One pair of Westwoods ($45)
  • Mix and Match Any Two ($80)
  • All Three for $100
  • Westwood Fitted T ($15)

Frequently Asked Questions

Is shipping included? Yes.

Do you shipping internationally? Yes but you need to add an additional $15 to cost. If you forget, no worries. We will be in touch shortly after purchase.

When will I receive my order of Westwoods? Our goal is to arrive in time for the Christmas in the US.  Each pair is handmade and takes a little bit of time to manufacture. 

PLEASE COMMENT in the comment tab section, we'd love to hear your feedback!

story:
CoolBag Patented Design and Features:

 

 

Colors available:

 

Keep beverages cool:

 Use CoolBag's Custom CoolPac - a waterproof ice sleeve that can be filled with ice from your refrigerator or hotel ice machine.  CoolBag's Custom Blue Ice freezes solid to help keep your beverages cold.  

 

Media Coverage:

CoolBag-Gen2 Protects your items while you take a swim, or a walk on the beach:

 

 

Travel with CoolBag-Gen2:

 

CoolBag-Gen2 is TSA Accepted Carry-on:

 

CoolBag-Gen2 has plenty of storage:

 

CoolBag-Gen2 Cooler:

 

Water, soda, beer, wine – whatever your beverage of choice may be...they all remain cold and refreshing in CoolBag’s discreet cooler. It is soft, seam-sealed, with both inside and outside access.

 

CoolBag-Gen2 Cut Resistant Liner:

 

How Cool is that!

Production is already happening! Help us hit our funding goals by either texting, emailing or using the links at the top to share CoolBag with your friends, family, and business associates. Your support is greatly appreciated! 

 

The CoolBag Journey:

In March, 2014, CoolBag was initially introduced to the market and has been in over 13 countries. Our supporters made the CoolBag dream come to life! The magic did not end there though. Since then, we have listened to our customers and taken their suggestions to make CoolBag-Gen2 even better.  With over 20 different changes, CoolBag-Gen2 is a bag like no other!  It is a bag that we are very proud to offer to consumers.

Our trademark name “CoolBag” and trademark slogan “Stay Cool in Life” is a brand now distinguished and recognized in the marketplace. We have been working hard placing our product in retailers across America, and hope to place in global markets soon also.

We have surrounded ourselves with people that have a dedication to “make it happen’. Partnering with the right manufacturer was vital. Our quality is amazing! Once you receive your CoolBag-Gen2, you will also be amazed and agree. CoolBag-Gen2 is fashionable and its functionality is unmatchable!

CoolBag is a product that allows the fun to happen, while you relax and "Stay Cool in Life"! Please support us by pledging to our campaign and sharing this page with your family and friends!

Thank You!

David Ponx

story:
We stand for one simple thing:

Quality For All!

This is the motto behind everything that we do and everything we aspire to.

Each step of our process aims to disrupt the status quo of the Luxury Fashion industry, to bring you the best of the best, without the inflated prices – it’s who we are.

Bags that age beautifully - JUST LIKE YOU!

 

The First Collection: Essentials

 

It is a necessity to look professional and polished at most of the workplaces and the quality briefcase is a must-have accessory for your style statement. LAVNG provides the high-quality briefcase you need daily at your workplace or while traveling, at an honest price.

 

 

The perfect size to suit your style and carry your stuff!

 

 

 

 

 

Thoughtfully Designed

 

  • Get Organised with Removable Padded Laptop Sleeve

Along with your laptop now you can carry your documents, and stationery with style without worrying about dropping or missing them.

 

 

 

  • RFID Protected Full Length Pocket 

 

 

 

 

  • Adjustable, durable, comfortable and elegant Strap 

The briefcase comes with a removable strap which has fabric base and leather top. It comes with shoulder support in case you need to carry heavy stuff in your bag

  • Metal Feet 

The metal feet keep the bag stable and ensure slow wearing of the leather at the base.

 

 

  • Keep the backup sim handy yet secured 

Always Stay Connected with hidden Sim Card  Ejector Pin and Sim card slot to keep your backup sim card handy

 

Nothing but the BEST!

 

 

We designed the briefcase that we’d want to carry every single day.

 We went through multiple iterations of prototypes until we achieved the perfection in designing your best daily companion.

 

 Front Inside Pockets: 

  • 1 Slip pocket, 
  • 1 Gusset pocket, 
  • 2 card pockets, 
  • 1 ID card Pocket, 
  • String with a Key loop, 
  • 2 Pen pockets  

Back Inside Pockets: 

  • 1 Full-width zip pocket 
  • Hidden ‘sim card’ and ‘Sim Eject Pin’ pocket  
  • RFID Protection on selected pockets

 

This Slim Briefcase is a smart way to carry your daily essentials, including a 15-inch laptop. This practical and stylish briefcase is perfect for your busy day of balancing work and fun!

 

 

 

Discounts extended since we launched on Indiegogo.

 

 

 

There’s no need to worry about sacrificing style for utility with this sensible and chic leather backpack. 

Front Inside Pockets: 2 Slip pockets

Back Inside Pockets: 1 Slip pocket, 1 Zip pocket

The key loop attached to a leather string so that you do not lose your keys at an inconvenient time.

 

 

This cute and petite backpack is your reliable companion where ever you go. The perfect design and size makes it easy and elegant to carry while safely keeping just everything you want

 

 

Back Outside Pocket: Full width, full-length Safety pocket with magnetic closure, fits 10" iPad.

 

 

 

Removable straps allow the bags to be used differently at different occasions. 

  • Inside RFID Pocket 

 

  • Drawstring 

 

 

 

 

Discounts extended since we launched on Indiegogo.

 

 

Long Zip Wallet 

The beautiful wallet offers the best of both worlds, classic yet functional; handcrafted from soft leather is a delight to interact with. It has the place for all the card, cash and coin you may need to carry yet keeping the slim profile. The durable materials make sure the wallet will offer you years of use with minimal fuss.

 

 

 

  • 7.8"W X 4.1"H X 0.6"D

 

 

 

Discounts extended since we launched on Indiegogo.

 

Men's Slim Wallet 

                                                                          4.4"W X 4.4"H

 

A must-have back pocket companion, this Slim Leather Wallet is small, yet accommodating that can keep all of your financial necessities close at hand. This slim and lightweight wallet is made from luxuriously soft leather.

 

Fit your cash, coins, and cards in a slim profile. Slim your wallet, without turning your world upside down.

 

 

 

Discounts extended since we launched on Indiegogo.

 

 

Unisex Key and Coin Pouch 

5.8"W X 4"H

 

This compact key and coin case is designed to be the most trusted companion. Finished with a zip pull and a leather key strap, this case has a compartment to carry cards and currency as well.

 

 

Discounts extended since we launched on Indiegogo.

Card Case 

  • Dimensions : 3.9"W X 3"H
  • 2 card slot at front and 2 card slots at back
  • Center compartment to keep bills

When you want to go minimalist, carry your cards and currency with style with this elegant crafted from luxuriously soft leather.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Discounts extended since we launched on Indiegogo.

Key Chain

A simple but timeless leather keyring made from full grain organically tanned finest natural leather. 

 


FEATURES:
- Finest quality full grain organically tanned Tanned Leather.
- 100% Handmade.

- Attach to your belt, bag or hooks by opening or closing using fast snap button.
- Split ring to easily hold your keys.
- Hand smoothed edges.
- Length when open 6"; length when closed 3"

 

ABOUT US

 

Minimalist and Functional Design

 LAVNG products are designed with the minimalist timeless look, which is not meant to be short-lived. It stays relevant today as it was yesterday and will be tomorrow.

Be it office, day trip or quick overnight, LAVNG bags are the epitome of cute and convenient on all occasions.

 

 

Honest Price

We are committed to offering the very best quality at the very best price. We’ve cut out the middlemen, kept our distribution model lean, and by selling online from our centralized warehouse in Singapore we’re able to keep our prices low rather than the traditional 6-8X markup.

 

Why buy seasonal bags?

Buy what last long - YEAR AFTER YEAR!

 

The Natural Colors

LAVNG uses aniline leather which is dyed through and through using organic colors. Aniline naked leather without further artificial finishing is a fully natural product.

Free Worldwide Shipping

We won't charge a penny for Shipping your bags no matter where you are located. 

 

 

Environment Friendly

The choice is between cheap leather which is bad for the environment and the finest leather produced in an environmentally friendly manner

LAVNG is proud of using only the finest quality natural leather which is environmentally friendly and bio-degradable.

 

Limited Time Campaign - Ends in Oct 2018

Grab these awesome bags at HUGE DISCOUNT before it is too late

We are on track to complete the production of our bags in October 2018. Starting late Oct 2018 we will sell these beautiful bags on our website at FULL PRICE.

Hi, I am Geetanjali the founder and designer of LAVNG. LAVNG started because of the frustration which I had to go through whenever I would buy a new leather bag. I would not settle for low-quality fast fashion and would always end up overpaying for quality which I would not even know is environment-friendly or not.

The idea of starting LAVNG first clicks me when I was staying in Amsterdam in the year 2009 and visited Italy on a vacation trip. For the first time, I got to know the real price of high-quality leather goods which are made in an environment-friendly manner. 

I found out its quite common for luxury brands to increase their price up to 10 times as compared to manufacturing price to fund the middlemen, expensive real estate and celebrity marketing.

I started to research on better ways of doing things; and after years of traveling, visiting tanneries, factories, studying designs and modern needs from a bag, I am ready to make LAVNG a reality.


 

  

Only the best leather makes the cut for our designs. We use full grain, organically tanned naked leather: we love it and we think you will too!

It is the leather that you can feel good about owning as it is totally environmentally friendly, our leather is luxuriously soft with grains that can outlast the many years to come.

"ORGANICALLY-TANNED"  

Our leather is tanned in an organic and environment-friendly manner using vegetable extracts. There is no use of chrome, heavy metal, formal dehydrate or volatile solvents in tanning process; unaided by potent chemicals, organic tanning takes much longer than chrome tanning (several weeks/months vs a day). 

Less than 10% of world leather is full-grain and organically tanned, making it one of the most expensive leather available in the market. It has a distinctive sweet and earthy fragrance and is soft to touch. If cared well, potentially last a lifetime and will develop a beautiful patina over time displaying the story of its unique journey.  

"FULL-GRAIN"  

The top surface of a hide, or the grain, is the strongest part of the hide. "Full-grain" means that the surface has not been buffed or sanded to remove imperfections. It is much longer-lasting and durable than top-grain leather (which has been buffed or sanded to remove imperfections) or split-grain leather (which doesn't have any grain at all). 

Top-grain leather is more prevalent on the market because it's cheaper to buy low-quality leather and remove the defects than to buy quality hides. To us, split-grain leather is actually a scam, as plastic or rubber coating is done on top of leather splits to make it a marketable product.  

"ANILINE"  

Our leather has been dyed the whole way 'through and through'. Pigmented leather, in contrast, has a coat of paint sprayed on top and is cheaper to make. Aniline leather without further artificial finishing is a fully natural product.

 

 

Duty/VAT/GST charges: If you live outside of Singapore, you will be responsible for applicable duty/VAT/GST charges, if any. In many of the countries, there is no duty or taxes on online shopping up to a certain amount.

Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We're sorry that, in such case, we can't have any mechanism to help them get through faster.

 

Our leathers are naked and have no artificial finish - hence making is a fully natural product. A few scratches, marks, irregularity in color and texture are a part of this leather and only goes to show that it is a natural product; it is not water resistant, prolonged exposure to water can cause splotches or marks - eventually becoming part of patina.

The leather color appears slightly different in different light and is noticeable while photographing it, especially the Tan color. Under the bright sun it appears lighter and inside a room, it appears little darker. This is characteristics of natural leather. The pigmented leather on other hand has the same appearance irrespective of the light.

We've put in place very tight controls around planning, management, and quality controls to ensure the most premium quality bags. We are very confident about professionalism and craftsmanship of the tannery and the factory. We have put proper contingencies in our planning to ensure timely completion of each milestone in our production run.

Still, the deep experience of industry and life has taught us that although we are prepared in every way possible, unexpected events may come up that are not in our control. We assure you to be completely transparent and honest in all our communications going along the way.

We’ve cut out the middlemen, kept our distribution model lean, and by selling online from our centralized warehouse in Singapore we’re able to keep our prices low rather than the traditional 6-8X markup. Why buy seasonal bags?Buy what last long - YEAR AFTER YEAR! The Natural ColorsLAVNG uses aniline leather which is dyed through and through using organic colors. Aniline naked leather without further artificial finishing is a fully natural product.Free Worldwide ShippingWe won't charge a penny for Shipping your bags no matter where you are located.   Environment FriendlyThe choice is between cheap leather which is bad for the environment and the finest leather produced in an environmentally friendly mannerLAVNG is proud of using only the finest quality natural leather which is environmentally friendly and bio-degradable. Limited Time Campaign - Ends in Oct 2018Grab these awesome bags at HUGE DISCOUNT before it is too lateWe are on track to complete the production of our bags in October 2018. Starting late Oct 2018 we will sell these beautiful bags on our website at FULL PRICE.Hi, I am Geetanjali the founder and designer of LAVNG. LAVNG started because of the frustration which I had to go through whenever I would buy a new leather bag. I would not settle for low-quality fast fashion and would always end up overpaying for quality which I would not even know is environment-friendly or not.The idea of starting LAVNG first clicks me when I was staying in Amsterdam in the year 2009 and visited Italy on a vacation trip. For the first time, I got to know the real price of high-quality leather goods which are made in an environment-friendly manner. I found out its quite common for luxury brands to increase their price up to 10 times as compared to manufacturing price to fund the middlemen, expensive real estate and celebrity marketing.I started to research on better ways of doing things; and after years of traveling, visiting tanneries, factories, studying designs and modern needs from a bag, I am ready to make LAVNG a reality.   Only the best leather makes the cut for our designs. We use full grain, organically tanned naked leather: we love it and we think you will too!It is the leather that you can feel good about owning as it is totally environmentally friendly, our leather is luxuriously soft with grains that can outlast the many years to come."ORGANICALLY-TANNED"  Our leather is tanned in an organic and environment-friendly manner using vegetable extracts. There is no use of chrome, heavy metal, formal dehydrate or volatile solvents in tanning process; unaided by potent chemicals, organic tanning takes much longer than chrome tanning (several weeks/months vs a day). Less than 10% of world leather is full-grain and organically tanned, making it one of the most expensive leather available in the market. It has a distinctive sweet and earthy fragrance and is soft to touch. If cared well, potentially last a lifetime and will develop a beautiful patina over time displaying the story of its unique journey.  "FULL-GRAIN"  The top surface of a hide, or the grain, is the strongest part of the hide. "Full-grain" means that the surface has not been buffed or sanded to remove imperfections. It is much longer-lasting and durable than top-grain leather (which has been buffed or sanded to remove imperfections) or split-grain leather (which doesn't have any grain at all). Top-grain leather is more prevalent on the market because it's cheaper to buy low-quality leather and remove the defects than to buy quality hides. To us, split-grain leather is actually a scam, as plastic or rubber coating is done on top of leather splits to make it a marketable product.  "ANILINE"  Our leather has been dyed the whole way 'through and through'. Pigmented leather, in contrast, has a coat of paint sprayed on top and is cheaper to make. Aniline leather without further artificial finishing is a fully natural product.  Duty/VAT/GST charges: If you live outside of Singapore, you will be responsible for applicable duty/VAT/GST charges, if any. In many of the countries, there is no duty or taxes on online shopping up to a certain amount.Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We're sorry that, in such case, we can't have any mechanism to help them get through faster. Our leathers are naked and have no artificial finish - hence making is a fully natural product. A few scratches, marks, irregularity in color and texture are a part of this leather and only goes to show that it is a natural product; it is not water resistant, prolonged exposure to water can cause splotches or marks - eventually becoming part of patina.The leather color appears slightly different in different light and is noticeable while photographing it, especially the Tan color. Under the bright sun it appears lighter and inside a room, it appears little darker. This is characteristics of natural leather. The pigmented leather on other hand has the same appearance irrespective of the light.We've put in place very tight controls around planning, management, and quality controls to ensure the most premium quality bags. We are very confident about professionalism and craftsmanship of the tannery and the factory. We have put proper contingencies in our planning to ensure timely completion of each milestone in our production run.Still, the deep experience of industry and life has taught us that although we are prepared in every way possible, unexpected events may come up that are not in our control. We assure you to be completely transparent and honest in all our communications going along the way.

story:
Check our Website: www.celestinewatch.com

Our Story

Celestine Katongole was born in a remote African village in his grand-mother’s garden on a cold rainy night with little to no chances of survival. Miraculously, this once sickly and malnourished little boy has grown into a genius & cultured designer who against insurmountable odds, is leading a movement that will extend freedom to boys & girls with similar stories like his.

After losing his father at the tender age of 6, everything that could possibly go wrong for this young lad, his uneducated mother, and four siblings went wrong. As Celestine vividly recollects, “school was regularly missed because we simply couldn’t afford it, a meal a day was a miracle, and exploitation for labor was inevitable.” 

Refusing to be a victim, this young designer focused on developing invaluable qualities: character, perseverance, and a terrific work ethic. Fueled by his childhood pain, Celestine discovered his life’s mission; to use luxury fashion as a vehicle that will bring freedom, hope, and restoration to exploited children & communities around the world. To kill Goliath, all little David had was a stone, Celestine's ingenuity in designing, passion for justice, and the support of you the American people will help us slay this evil giant, "modern-day slavery."

This once hopeless child is en route to revolutionizing the way we consume fashion, look at and think of the individuals whose labor goes into its manufacturing. Most importantly, this former orphan boy is challenging us all to demand transparency from the media, entertainment, fashion, agriculture, mining, transport, political, and hospitality industries as this is the only way human trafficking will be rooted off the face of the planet. While all this sounds great, it will all end in utter failure if YOU don’t support our project. Please back our vision and help us bring freedom to the enslaved, and remind kids like Celestine that no matter where you come from, in America you will be given a chance to make a contribution.

With your support, Celestine will go from a no name brand, to becoming the new standard of excellence. Our founding philosophy is simple, “life over quick profits,” and this is got to become the philosophy of every serious brand. By 2024, all our products will be made exclusively in the United States, as this will guarantee our organization 100 percent control over the supply chain while simultaneously creating jobs for Americans of all backgrounds. 

Join the Fight

Part of being leaders in the fight against slavery and exploitation is recognizing a simple truth that in dealing with such sophisticated evil, it is virtually impossible and quite honestly naive for any single organization to claim knowledge of the best pathway to total freedom. For this reason, we invite you to join our team as an ambassador by passionately sharing our story with at least ten people.

Why what you consume matters

It’s important to remember that one of the main reasons the trading of humans for labor, organs, and sex has prevailed for generations is because decent people just like you and I continue to give a deaf ear to the wails of the victims. If we only paused and asked ourselves a simple question before every purchase, what is the TRUE HUMAN COST on that $5 hoodie that my favorite brand or celebrity just advertised? The answer would challenge us to alter our consumption habits. Today, the UN estimates that there are over 50 million men, women, and children enslaved for labor, sex, and organs. Our mission is to lead the movement that will change these statistics and we are inviting you to fight alongside us, will you join? 

 

How and where it's made.

Designed by our founder Celestine Katongole in Naperville, IL; a quaint Mid-Western city approx. 35 min west of Chicago. 

Time Pieces: With Swiss Movements from a small Swiss family-owned manufacturer in Bern. Highest quality unbreakable & scratch resistant crystal sapphire glass from Hong Kong. Sustainably cured, handmade Italian leather straps from a small artisanal family-owned tannery in Tuscany. Assembled in a small, transparent Shenzhen-based factory. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Legacy Black Laquered Polish

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Kris Ann Black Laquered Polish

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Dream Sunray Silver

Legacy PVD Coating

 

 


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Freedom Sunray Blue

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Dream Sunray Blue

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Dream Stainless Steel

Freedom Stainless Steel

KrisAnn Stainless Steel

Eyewear: Meticulously handcrafted by Japanese eyewear-making masters in the small town of Fukui. Made with aerospace-grade titanium and ancient Japanese acetate. 

Why fight human trafficking?

For centuries, fashion, hospitality, media, mining, agriculture, automotive, and virtually every single industry in the world has prized quick unethical profits over human life & the environment. Sadly, we, the general population empowered them by taking the “bait” of always accepting their heavily discounted but low quality, mass-produced merchandise. Celestine was born to put things back in order; Human life and sustainability above heavy discounts and quick profits. We believe that sustainable manufacturing & consumption, the value for human life, plus family & community empowerment are the most viable approaches to permanently stop human trafficking & exploitation.

story:
L'Eric is a vintage, lightweight, functional briefcase / messenger bag. It is created to keep your laptop, tablet, digital devices, cards, certs and accessories neat on weekdays or business trips. 

We’ve been trying to produce briefcases with high quality, durability and delicate workmanship. L'Eric takes minimalism in design, yet it is one user-friendly and functional case having the following key features:

  • Open in the center and easy access to every piece of gadgets  
  • Standalone flannel compartment for up to 15 inch laptop 
  • Quality guaranteed SBS zipper for smoother sliding, flannel zipper tape preventing your laptop from scratches
  • Metal components delicately designed for injection molding, processed by black matte plating 
  • Nice-to-touch and water repellent surface. Stretchable, scratch resistant
  •  Handles replaceable to extend life cycles

 

 

A Functional Spacious Briefcase

L'Eric is well constructed and spacious. Working professionals carrying 15 inch laptop and more electronics like iPad, iPod, electronics, watches, storage devices, wireless mouses, etc. will find organizing easy.Grab and go. Hold it for a professional, class look when meeting a new customer. 

Tangled wires are messy and kill your productivity. L'Eric is equipped with zippered compartment to make your bag look clean. 

Quick Access to Every Piece of Gadget

L'Eric opens in the center. You can access all your belongings easily and quickly.

Lightweight and Durable

We meticulously designed overall construction to be reasonable, materials both lightweight and durable, since we know professionals need to carry less “pressure”.

L'Eric has a zippered standalone compartment that contains most 15  inch laptops, with the interior materials and zipper tap made of flannel, to prevent laptops from scratches.

 

Quality Guaranteed Materials

We partner with SBS Zipper to ensure smooth zipping. 

  • All metal components are delicately designed for injection molding, processed by matte plating
  • Every package comes with an additional shoulder strap to get your style covered

SBS Zipper Brand Introduction

SBS Zipper, founded in 1984, is currently one of the two leading contenders for "Internationsl zipper domination" . It is zipper supplier of famous brands like North Face, H&M and Mango.

 

Soft to Touch & Water Repellent Surface

We use high quality PU, not genuine leather. It is stretchable, nice to touch, water repellent and scratch resistant.  

L'Eric Travel Bag

The Design

We're a group of life product designers. We want to do our part to improve the shortcomings of existing products and to achieve both the functionality and simplicity. 

L'Eric Briecase Dimensions: 40*31.5*8cm (L*W*H) 

L'Eric Travel Bag Dimensions: 44.5*26*25cm (L*W*H)

Rewards

Guaranteed delivery

We will start shipping products to our backers in May 2019. We've mature supply chains specialized in bags making located in Shenzhen, China, but we will keep our backers posted immediately if we meet supply chain issues. We promise to be transparent and communicate any potential delays and important milestones.

story:
The 70’s were when we didn’t wear bike helmets, and grunge meant not showering after an all night bonfire at the beach. We played guitars, ate tacos, and our jeans had holes in them because we wore them out, not because it was fashionable.

Recapturing that vibe means using authentic materials that bring us back with the look and feel of yesterday, combined with the usefulness and benefits of today's' gear.

California is the destination of dreams, and we want to share our lifestyle and those dreams to inspire others to live life the right way...

So here we are, saying Hello from San Diego, California.

For 18 years, we have been hand making backpacks and daypacks for surfers, skaters and locals to use for school that have the soft, worn-canvas look and feel while being reinforced with waterproof, padded lining. 

 

These Aren't Basic Backpacks; Quality is the Key

Once you pick up one of our backpacks you'll just feel the difference...

o Soft canvas that is “aged”. So what we do, is this is a thick canvas and we literally make cuts in it and then wash it. When washed, the cuts fray. Then behind the cuts we put patches so the tear does not “keep going” and you get the torn up, soft aged look and feel.  Our soft canvass will last much longer and feel much better than the cheap nylon material found in most backpacks. Our canvas is aged, torn, reinforced, lined, padded, and has a 3-YEAR Replacement Warranty.

Our 100 % Certified Organic Cotton Pre-shrunk Canvas is produced through sustainable fabrication methods and materials. These environmentally friendly methods produce a canvas that is upscale in every way. The look and feel of this product are perfect for next-to-skin ruggedized applications and an excellent choice for backpacks, tents and other products that require long term use in various weather environments. The dyed product options are produced using the lowest impact dye method possible for producing vibrant colors



o The inside is a smooth, waterproof nylon with pliable padding.  If you spill your water or any liquid in there, there's no chance of leakage.

o The Zippers are the highest quality YKK brand “no lock” zippers. Your zipper will never get caught giving you a hassle.  You get a lifetime smooth guarantee direct from the factory.

Participate in Our Referral Contest - Get a Free Back Pack

For every five backers that get our bags via Indiegogo we'll ship you a free backpack - no strings!

Here's how it works:

  • Sign in to Indiegogo with your Indiegogo account
  • Use the share tools at the top of our project and tell all your friends
  • Track your progress and expect a free bag every time 5 backers you referred get involved

Full details on how to participate in an Indiegogo referral contest are here.

We Know What To Do - Now We Want To Do it For You.

Now we've engaged a top design crew and factory to make these packs to the highest standards, and found the best materials in the world so we can share those same packs with you.

What We Need & What You Get

Our factory is all set for production.  In fact, due to our relationship with our factory staff, they have agreed to bump us to the first production as soon as we get funded.  This means super quick delivery to you!

  • To build a few hundred packs, we need $ 18,000.00.  This includes purchasing bulk material, patches, extra strong threads, waterproof and padded lining, and paying extra for a third party to quality control the production and ensure every pack is perfect.
  • For Indiegogo supporters, we don't plan on making much profit at all, we just want to get started with the line.  In fact, we hope to deliver some extras along with the pack for our loving family of contributors that nobody else will receive, including tshirts and patches.

  • If we don't hit our goal, we will survey the supporters and ask if they want us to go forward or refund your money.  We only want to get you the best packs in the world!

Love your past.  Love people. Feel good...

Vintage California...Back to the good stuff!

story:
PRE-ORDER NOW: www.ttt-watches.com

As seen on Fast Co. Design | The Verge | Gessato | Hypebeast | Highsnobiety | Design Week | DesignTAXI | Designboom | Discovery Channel | Futurism

Introducing Hidden Time

In 2014 we released our first watch, the concentric disc Series 000, and were funded within 72 hours. In 2016, we launched the space-obsessed Series K452, and were funded within 24 hours.

Now, we’re back on Indiegogo to introduce our first international project, The Trio of Time, and release our third watch, Hidden Time.

Video by Futurism

Hidden Time in three editions

Black watch + midnight straps

Rose gold watch + coffee straps

White watch + snow straps

 

The Trio of Time 

The Trio of Time (TTT) is our very first experimental world tour to explore how international creativity reinterprets the perception of time. 

We will collaborate with a local designer in three different cities around the world to create a timepiece together, which will be released here on Kickstarter. 

Each watch will feature a unique design that represents the designer’s view on passing time. And with each watch we will share our experience with the Kickstarter community; in fact, backers of each campaign will be able to vote on our next destination.

Hidden Time is the first edition of TTT

 

The first TTT collaboration: Hong Kong to Seoul

Our TTT journey begins in Seoul, Korea.

Seoul is a prominent design city in Asia. With a rich history and rapid growth rate, the city features abundant resources for art and design. Many talented designers have launched studios in the city, contributing to both the local industry and the world at large.

We met with industrial designer Jiwoong Jung, an artist as fascinated by time as we are. Jung’s product design work has been featured in the 2012 and 2014 Maison & Objet Paris exhibition, among others, and in international design publications.

 

Beautiful architecture in Seoul

 

A few of Jiwoong Jung's beautiful products

 

Together, we are releasing Hidden Time

 

Early designs of Hidden Time

 

The watch's beautiful gradient makes time disappear as it passes by

 

Jiwoong Jung working on our first collaboration

 

The rose gold edition offers a slight variation on gradient colors

 

Hidden Time, the vanishing timepiece

Hidden Time's watch face features a beautiful gradient display under a crystal covering where numbers are firmly printed. As hours pass, the hour gradient disc rotates and “hidden time” is revealed.

The watch helps you focus on time in the moment, using a modern interpretation of the camouflage effect to hide the passing hours.

“My research on how to naturally pass time began with how hiding occurs in nature, which led me to one of the best known examples––the chameleon’s protective color. Their defense mechanism is a kind of optical illusion, but a simple and effective way to have two things together naturally when superimposed.” –Jiwoong Jung

Hidden Time in black

 

A beautiful light violet gradient compliments the rose gold edition

 

Time disappearing as hours pass by

A striking balance between lines and gradients

The powerful watch is thin and lightweight

 

 

Watch time pass in a new way 

 

 

via GIPHY

 

Features

Typeface

  • Crystal printed watch face over rotating gradient graphic. 
  • Includes a unique type, Favorit, in collaboration with Dinamo Typefaces (Johannes Breyer and Fabian Harb).

Favorit typeface from Dinamo Typefaces

 


For everyone

  • The 39mm case is designed for both men and women. 
  • 316L stainless-steel enclosed casing.
  • Available in black, rose gold, or silver.
  • Ultra thin - only 8.7mm (0.34in).

Hidden Time is the perfect size for any wrist

The timepiece stands out while complimenting your look

 

 

Docking system

  • Interchangeable strap system that secures straps with a simple pull and click within seconds.
  • Straps available in white, coffee, or midnight (you will choose this during the survey process).

Anicorn's smart docking system allows for easy strap swaps

 

Straps can be interchanged to fit your current outfit or mood

 

 

 

Swiss accuracy

  • Driven by a Swiss Ronda Caliber 515 Quartz Movement, a high grade and reliable jeweled model that allows for smooth spinning with great accuracy.
  • The Swiss Ronda 515 is known as one of the highest quality quartz movement motors, with slim dimensions and long preserved running time.

The jeweled model allows for seamless spinning

 

Packaging

We know how important delivery is, which is why we’ve created a beautiful new package for this edition of The Trio of Time. Each timepiece comes ready to be assembled with easy smart straps. Just wind the watch to your time zone, and experience the beauty of Hidden Time.

Every item pledged for on Kickstarter is subject to a final quality check at our Hong Kong studio, before being hand packaged with care in our premium packaging.

Anicorn packaging for the first TTT edition

The timepiece comes ready to be assembled and worn

 

Specifications

Movement: Swiss Ronda Caliber 515 Quartz movement.

Battery life: Around 45 months. There is a power saving mechanism with pulled out stem: Reduction of consumption approximately 70%.

Housing: 316L Stainless steel, Ø 39mm (1.54 in), height 8.7mm (0.34in), back & screws, PVD plating.

Glass: Sapphire glass - Scratch Resistant

Water resistance: 50 meters / 5ATM (164 ft).

Strap: Genuine leather (18mm lug width) + stainless steel buckle with smart docking system. One size fits all.

 

What’s next?

TTT is a continuous global journey. If successful, we hope all our backers will join us in exploring our next destination (New York? Vienna? São Paulo?) to expand our perceptions of time.

We want to make our backers a part of the process––that’s why after our successful campaign, we’ll let you vote on our next destination!

Anicorn's collection of timepieces

 

Why Indiegogo?

We're so excited to return to Indiegogo for our latest project, and we're so thankful to have such a strong community around the work we do. Thanks to our past two campaigns, we were able to bring our timepieces to life and establish our business. 

We wanted to present our project to our loyal backers first, since they've been such an important part of our journey. We can't wait to take this new step together. 

Join us in bringing this collaboration and subsequent journeys to life––we can't do it without you!

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

We know there are always risks with production, but with our extensive experience we are confident we can get our watches out to you on time. We’ve learned about manufacturing and fulfillment from our two previous campaigns, and if we face any issues, we will be completely transparent and keep everyone updated on our progress.

As always, communication is key for us! We will share any and all developments during manufacturing and beyond.

PRE-ORDER NOW: www.ttt-watches.com 
As seen on Fast Co. Design | The Verge | Gessato | Hypebeast | Highsnobiety | Design Week | DesignTAXI | Designboom | Discovery Channel | Futurism
Introducing Hidden Time 
In 2014 we released our first watch, the concentric disc Series 000, and were funded within 72 hours. In 2016, we launched the space-obsessed Series K452, and were funded within 24 hours.Now, we’re back on Indiegogo to introduce our first international project, The Trio of Time, and release our third watch, Hidden Time.Video by FuturismHidden Time in three editionsBlack watch + midnight strapsRose gold watch + coffee strapsWhite watch + snow straps The Trio of Time The Trio of Time (TTT) is our very first experimental world tour to explore how international creativity reinterprets the perception of time. We will collaborate with a local designer in three different cities around the world to create a timepiece together, which will be released here on Kickstarter. Each watch will feature a unique design that represents the designer’s view on passing time. And with each watch we will share our experience with the Kickstarter community; in fact, backers of each campaign will be able to vote on our next destination.Hidden Time is the first edition of TTT The first TTT collaboration: Hong Kong to SeoulOur TTT journey begins in Seoul, Korea.Seoul is a prominent design city in Asia. With a rich history and rapid growth rate, the city features abundant resources for art and design. Many talented designers have launched studios in the city, contributing to both the local industry and the world at large.We met with industrial designer Jiwoong Jung, an artist as fascinated by time as we are. Jung’s product design work has been featured in the 2012 and 2014 Maison & Objet Paris exhibition, among others, and in international design publications. Beautiful architecture in Seoul A few of Jiwoong Jung's beautiful products Together, we are releasing Hidden Time Early designs of Hidden Time The watch's beautiful gradient makes time disappear as it passes by Jiwoong Jung working on our first collaboration The rose gold edition offers a slight variation on gradient colors Hidden Time, the vanishing timepieceHidden Time's watch face features a beautiful gradient display under a crystal covering where numbers are firmly printed. 316L stainless-steel enclosed casing.

Ultra thin - only 8.7mm (0.34in).

The timepiece stands out while complimenting your look

Straps available in white, coffee, or midnight (you will choose this during the survey process).


Anicorn's smart docking system allows for easy strap swaps
 



Straps can be interchanged to fit your current outfit or mood

The Swiss Ronda 515 is known as one of the highest quality quartz movement motors, with slim dimensions and long preserved running time.


The jeweled model allows for seamless spinning

Anicorn packaging for the first TTT edition

The timepiece comes ready to be assembled and worn

Strap: Genuine leather (18mm lug width) + stainless steel buckle with smart docking system. One size fits all.

TTT is a continuous global journey. If successful, we hope all our backers will join us in exploring our next destination (New York? Vienna? São Paulo?) to expand our perceptions of time.
We want to make our backers a part of the process––that’s why after our successful campaign, we’ll let you vote on our next destination!

Anicorn's collection of timepieces
 
Why Indiegogo?
We're so excited to return to Indiegogo for our latest project, and we're so thankful to have such a strong community around the work we do. Thanks to our past two campaigns, we were able to bring our timepieces to life and establish our business. 
We wanted to present our project to our loyal backers first, since they've been such an important part of our journey. We can't wait to take this new step together. 
Join us in bringing this collaboration and subsequent journeys to life––we can't do it without you!
 



 

 
Risks and challenges
We know there are always risks with production, but with our extensive experience we are confident we can get our watches out to you on time. We’ve learned about manufacturing and fulfillment from our two previous campaigns, and if we face any issues, we will be completely transparent and keep everyone updated on our progress.
As always, communication is key for us! We will share any and all developments during manufacturing and beyond.

story:
Climate change is real and it is altering our environment every day. There is enough scientific evidence to prove that even the most basic, ordinary human activities are major contributors to climate change. It is time we join forces and contribute to global efforts for mitigating the effects of this man-made disaster.

To lead this transformation, we've decided to start with changing the way we think about one of our most basic human requirements, clothing. Creating ecologically responsible, durable yet stylish clothing and accessories, we want to ensure that the integration of the fight into our daily lives is seamless.

In this battle to save our planet we stand with indigenous Himalayan communities who are at the front line taking the challenge head on. Our initial strategy is to create products using only natural material, mainly harvest from the foothills of the Himalayas. We, at Aslee, believe that with the consumption of these products, these communities can move towards multi-specie tree-based agriculture. This means more plant based farming, leading to afforestation, soil conservation and empowerment of the local community.

In 2015 the country was devastated by one of the biggest earthquakes to have stuck humanity in the Himalayan region. It is also regularly affected by flash floods, landslides and unpredictable weather conditions. But the sheer resilience and innovation of Nepal's indigenous communities are an inspiration for us to create products that are sustainable, eco-friendly and contribute to the economic growth of the local population.

We believe that environmentally friendly fabrics will play a major part in achieving the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) defined by United Nations and will strengthen the global response against climate change. The clothing industry is one of the largest polluters in the world and our hope is to change the way we think about this industry.
We understand that action is essential and the only way to incorporate it into our everyday lives is if it doesn't come at the cost of compromising on individual style and current trends. So, we're working to create products that are super stylish sustainable and durable.

We are passionate about our work also because the fabrics we have used have some epic properties! Like the wild Himalayan hemp, that is super eco-friendly compared to most other materials. It has got properties that make it even better than organic cotton and linen. We’ve also worked with 'Allo' or Himalayan nettle. It is hand harvested only by indigenous mountain communities of Nepal. It grows in the wild and is hand-spun by rural women to create a fabric which is 100% natural and biodegradable.

 

The hemp plant has been around in Nepal and India for centuries. Historically, people have have used it for various purposes. Communities nestled deep in the heart of the Himalayan mountains have developed techniques to extract oil, food (hemp seeds are also known as “superfood”), stock feed, medicines and textile to make clothes, shoes and bags from this incredible plant.  

There are many different types of hemp plants. Wild hemp, also called industrial hemp, refers to the non-psychoactive (less than 1% THC) variety of Cannabis Sativa L.  Both hemp and marijuana come from the same cannabis species, but are genetically distinct and further distinguished by use and cultivation method.

Here’s what makes the fabric from hemp truly one of a kind –

  1. It requires 50% less water than cotton to grow.
  2. It is naturally anti-microbial.
  3. It is more breathable than cotton and linen.
  4. It blocks out 50% more ultra violet rays than cotton. Even when only 50% hemp is used in a textile product, it is still able to offer the same level of UV blockage.  
  5. It grows faster than other similar plants, so has a higher yield for lesser effort.
  6. It is naturally resistant to fungus and insects, so does not require any pesticides.
  7. It restrains or suppresses weed growth.

It is sustainable, comfortable and super stylish.

 

The miracle Himalayan plant called Himalayan nettle (Girardinia Diversifolia), also known as Allo or Nilgiri nettle; is a perennial plant which grows wild throughout the moist mountainous regions of Nepal and India. It has several qualities of great interest to fabric and clothing manufacturing industry. 

  1. The length of the fabric from Himalayan nettle is greater than any other plant fiber known to man.
  2. The long fiber increases spinning options and hence fabric possibilities.
  3. The fabric stays cool in the summer and warm in the winter due to its hollow core.
  4. It is antimicrobial and antibacterial.
  5. It is naturally a fire retardant.

The indigenous communities have incorporated sustainable harvesting and processing techniques in their Himalayan nettle production chain. Today, they have become experts at nettle fiber production and are developing all natural mufflers, stoles, purses, bags, home accessories and even incorporating it in to everyday apparel.

The plant also combats the effects of climate change by holding soil in place thus preventing landslides and erosion.

 

Softening process: The fiber is separated from the bark by hand beating and putting the plant in clean river water for days. In order to make the fiber soft, it is further washed with ash.

Drop spindle: A top-like tool is used to turn soft fiber into usable yarn in a dance like motion that twists and spins the fiber.

Charkha or spinning wheel: Cleaned and carded fiber is spun by skilled indigenous women, turning raw fiber balls into softer yarn by using hand operated charkha or spinning wheel.

Handloom: The threads from the yarn are loaded lengthwise on the loom. Each thread is first passed through an eyelet and then a comb. The artisans weave a wider and more uniform fabric. This process requires a unique set of skills and focus which is acquired after many years of textile manufacturing.

The fabric is then brought to a small scale industrial facility, where it is stone washed to make it softer and then biodegradable water based dyes are used to color it.

All the cutting, sewing and assembly is done in Kathmandu and Bhaktapur through small local facilities. More than 95% of the employees working in these establishments are women.

Our goal is to provide as much information about the people, processes, materials and how our products can create an impact, so our consumers have confidence in their purchase. In order create more transparency in our supply chain, we offer exclusive Nepal tours - where you can directly meet the artisans, textile developers and inspiring rural women of Nepal who together make the backbone of our company and the fight against climate change.

Other than experiencing this amazing farm to fabric journey, our itinerary will also include any of the three following activities –

  • Momo making classes which are conducted by local ‘Master Chefs’ of Kathmandu.
  • Newari dinner night with local dance performances.
  • A day trek to Kopan Monastery.
  • Himalayan mountain flight (Experience the stunning views of Mt. Everest).
  • Walking tour of the ancient city of Bhaktapur.
  • Bungee jumping from a bridge more than 160 m over a mountain gorge.
  • And if you want to experience the night life of Kathmandu, we can also arrange a pub crawl in the party district Thamel where you can experience some incredible live music and a mini rock concert.   

These will be small group tours of the Kathmandu valley and we plan to conduct only two tours for the year of 2018. If this itinerary excites you please sign up early because these tours are exclusive therefore need longer preparation time. 

Our tours will start from Tribhuvan International Airport. Please go to perks for further details. 

TIME LINE

For over 18 months we have been building relationships with artisans and Nepalese green entrepreneurs. During this process, we've introduced a variety of quality control measures and organizational techniques. These helped keep quality high and produce items that have the consistency required for an international market. Since these items are still made by hand, variations will be a small part of the products. 

Additionally, Kathmandu valley comes in the 'high' risk earthquake zone, therefore our supply chain is vulnerable to these unavoidable natural circumstances. Nepal is also a political charged country and has recently adopted a federal democracy, often there are bandhs or nationwide strikes. This unstable political situations leads to complete shutdown of transportation and manufacturing units. 

We have setup a robust communication system and our team regularly visits Kathmandu in order further strengthen the relations we have developed in last couple of years.

story:
Najha Colletions are inspired by the Future and created for those love live the life in a sophisticated and original way !!

Putting together: love for Fashion, love for Creativity and love for cork.

 Cork: WATERPROOF, DURABLE, WASHBEL and FASHIONABLE.

Choose a perk and support us

We are very happy to have reached this much so far, and we are already thinking how will be our Next Season Collection (FW 2014-2015), So contributing you will be participating in our next season colletion, and, and, and .... you will be the first one to see it ... NEW and FRESH ... Don´t miss this opportunity and be the first in line.

The reward for your support

  • An accessory from Najha Collection; 
  • (or) a Najha Bag from Spring/Summer 2014 Collection;



Acessories Perks



Bags









Najha short-story

Hi everyone!

You already accessed an overview of the brand in the video, but there are some things yet to say. My name is Daniela. I have studied Management, but this area never allowed me to be a fulfilled person. Fortunately, I felt a sudden calling for Design and so I decided: "DESIGN, that´s my area", I went to Italy and studied fashion and there I learned to follow my own style balanced with fashion trends, and be demanding onQUALITY.

Najha was created mixing to main features love for fashion and for natural materials: So CORKand the 100% ORGANIC COTTON, are the main materials of each collection. At the moment we work with the best cork to have NAJHA bags and we are able to have the best quality in production, allowing us tooffer YOU the best quality bags in cork.

FASHION, QUALITY AND DESIGN ,are the main features of each NAJHA bag ...

About cork

Cork is a great material which comes from the Cork Oak, is its BARK. Cork harvesting is a task performed by specialized craftsmen, and is a very healthy process, not only for the tree but also for the environment.

After the harvesting, the cork is treated to become flexible to create the "Leather Cork" or "Tissue Cork" which is used to make NAJHA bags, and most important: cork may have different designs and colors, depending on the final result we want to have. 

Cork is WATERPROOF, DURABLE, WASHABLE and FASHIONABLE.

If you want to know more: Cork Harvesting

About Organic Cotton

Why 100% Organic Cotton?

Great quantities of pesticides are used in conventional cotton fields, causing intoxication and death of farmers, birds, fish and insects. It also pollutes the air, soil and water supplier. So when we are using 100% organic cotton for Najha Bags linning we are contributing to:

  • Farmers better life conditions (better paid) and health (no pesticides);
  • Less pollution on the Planet;
  • And the balance of ecosystems.

NGO "Viver100Fronteiras"

We met "Viver100Fronteiras" in September and since then we started to know a little bit more about their work in Guine-Bissau. They have already performed a great work there, improving hospitals, schools and the locals´ life quality. 

Know more about them: Viver100Fronteiras.




FAQ

Do you need to cut the tree to have cork?

No, we do not need to cut the tree, the cork comes from the Oak Cork bark. The process is healthy for the tree. Moreover, the tree needs the bark harvesting every 9 years, as it increases its longevity and allows the growing of a new bark layer.

Are the bags resistant?

Yes, we look for the best cork to produce Najha Bags: this cork is durable.

As any leather bag, Najha CORK bags need your care, it's important to keep them in the protector fabric bag when not used. It also needs cleaning.

How do I clean my Najha Bag?

It is very simple, just take some damp tissue with (natural) soap and clean it. Just let it dry then and... it's ready for use!

When the rain comes, may I use it?

When raining, you can totally use your Najha Bag, it's WATERPROOF. Of course we don't recommend you to dive your beloved Najha bag into the ocean... But we know you also knew that!


Social Media

Check us on Facebook

Follow us on Instagram

to follow my own style balanced with fashion trends, and be demanding onQUALITY.
Najha was created mixing to main features love for
fashion and for natural materials: So CORKand the 100%
ORGANIC COTTON, are the main materials of each collection. At the moment we
work with the best cork to have NAJHA bags and we are able to have the best
quality in production, allowing us tooffer YOU the best quality bags in cork.
FASHION, QUALITY AND
DESIGN ,are the main features of each NAJHA bag ...About corkCork is a great material which comes from the Cork Oak, is its BARK. Cork harvesting is a task performed by specialized craftsmen, and is a very healthy process, not only for the tree but also for the environment.After the harvesting, the cork is treated to become flexible to create the "Leather Cork" or "Tissue Cork" which is used to make NAJHA bags, and most important: cork may have different designs and colors, depending on the final result we want to have. Cork is WATERPROOF, DURABLE, WASHABLE and FASHIONABLE.If you want to know more: Cork HarvestingAbout Organic CottonWhy 100% Organic Cotton?Great quantities of pesticides are used in conventional cotton fields, causing intoxication and death of farmers, birds, fish and insects. It also pollutes the air, soil and water supplier. So when we are using 100% organic cotton for Najha Bags linning we are contributing to:
Farmers better life conditions (better paid) and health (no pesticides);
Less pollution on the Planet;

And the balance of ecosystems.
NGO "Viver100Fronteiras"We met "Viver100Fronteiras" in September and since then we started to know a little bit more about their work in Guine-Bissau. They have already performed a great work there, improving hospitals, schools and the locals´ life quality. Know more about them: Viver100Fronteiras.FAQDo you need to cut the tree to have cork?No, we do not need to cut the tree, the cork comes from the Oak Cork bark. The process is healthy for the tree. Moreover, the tree needs the bark harvesting every 9 years, as it increases its longevity and allows the growing of a new bark layer.Are the bags resistant?Yes, we look for the best cork to produce Najha Bags: this cork is durable.As any leather bag, Najha CORK bags need your care, it's important to keep them in the protector fabric bag when not used. It also needs cleaning.How do I clean my Najha Bag?It is very simple, just take some damp tissue with (natural) soap and clean it. Just let it dry then and... it's ready for use!When the rain comes, may I use it?When raining, you can totally use your Najha Bag, it's WATERPROOF. Of course we don't recommend you to dive your beloved Najha bag into the ocean... But we know you also knew that!Social MediaCheck us on FacebookFollow us on Instagram

story:
With the Camemory Product, you can record the videos, take pictures from the first person point view, you can get access to your smartphone
anywhere, anytime…
…but wearable on your head and hands-free. All you need to do is motion your hand, making the defined gestures around the sensors on frames.










Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

What is Camemory, anyway?
Camemory is a wearable technology device that acts as an extension of your smartphone to perform a set of simple tasks. It resembles a pair of glasses or a headset.

What does it do? (Function)

  • Captures photos and videos wherever you are.
  • Bluetooth 4.0 accepts phone calls, plays music, and voice GPS navigation.
  • PC camera: Camemory can work as a Webcam.
  • Works as USB memory

What do I need to do to make it work?

Press the start button on the machine, to take pictures, videos, or listen to music by using the Gesture Control system.

Is it compatible with an android or iPhone?
Right now, Camemory is compatible with IOS and Android systems.

Who is Camemory for?
Right now, Camemory is intended for men and women. The glasses are designed for the activities like hunting, fishing, big sport game, teaching, cooking, researching, and so on.

Which colors and styles does it come in?
It has various colors and styles. It comes in different varieties for everyday business-ware, casual-ware and sports-ware.

Is the screen the same as Google glasses?
No, the crystal part is the light indicator on the Camemory Glasses.

Can you switch the display to the left?
Not in this version, we are working on it for future pro-types.

What’s the video and camera resolution?
There are two resolutions type for each model. They are 720P30-60 and 1080P30-60.

How do you control Camemory Glasses?
Press the video button in front of the glasses and the glasses start to record with the light flashing. Press the video button again to stop recording.  Press the camera button, and the glasses start to take pictures. You can also use the Gesture control button to take pictures and videos, listen to music as well.

What type of quality is the device?
Made of titanium and plastic, the Camemory Glasses frame adjusts by hard bending, thus being sturdy.

Is it waterproof?
Definitely not!  “Don’t let the Camemory Glasses device or battery come in contact with liquids. Liquids can get into the electronic components, leading to corrosion.”

What is the battery life like?
Battery life will last a full day, unless you use more-draining features.  You can use the battery necklace to charge it when you are using your Camemory device.  Battery capacity of the device is 460mA, the necklace battery size is 1200 mA.

Can you charge it wirelessly?
Wireless charging isn’t a feature yet, we are looking at this for future proto-types.

How much storage do you get?
Camemory Glasses has various storage size. Camemory comes with 8GB, 16GB and 32GB of internal storage.

Is Camemory Glasses heavier than regular glasses?
Camemory Glasses weighs a little bit, which can be lighter or heavier than your usual frames, depending on their build.

How do you reboot it?
Easy: just press the circular power button to turn the device on and off. To initiate a hard reboot, press and hold the power button for 15 seconds.

How long will it take to fully charge?

30mins – 1 hour

What is the product warranty?

We will provide lifetime warranty for manufacturer defect.

Can we use it as a Webcam?

Yes

Does the camera zoom in and out?
It does not zoom, although it does have an auto wide focus area.

Does the video zoom in and out?You can shoot 720p-1080 HD video through the camera lens.  It cannot zoom in and out, but has the auto wide focus area.

Can I take a picture while recording the video?

No

Is there some apps in the phone that can be use with Camemory Glasses?Not now, but we are designing it.

Can we input commands with using your voice?
No.

What does it feel like?
If you’ve got it adjusted correctly, Camemory Glasses feels more or less like wearing a regular pair of glasses.  The right side is notably heavier than the left.

Is it distracting?
No, absolutely not. It can free your hands to record whatever you like and talk through the phone.

Is using gesture sensation easy or cumbersome?
It’s really easy – and it is easy to learn the hand motions.

Can I use it while driving?
Yes, it’s a hands free device.

Can you use it if you wear glasses?
Yes, we make frames that you can take to your eye doctor to make your own glasses.

What are they like as sunglasses?
We have certain styles for your sunglasses needs.

Do I need to worry about radio emissions?
No.

Is Camemory Glasses spying on you?
No.

Will people know you could be photographing or recording them?

Yes, the light indicator will be on while it is photographing or recording.

How much will it cost to own a pair of Camemory glasses?
Prices depend and vary upon styles and memory card features.

When can I buy a pair?

March 2016.

How can I choose the color and the style?

We'll send e-mail to contact with you for the information of your desired color/style.



Risks and challenges

While we're doing a lot of the work ourselves, obviously we have to rely on others (manufacture, shipping) to provide their end. We're confident that these parts will be no problem, as we're talking to established companies here. We will also go to China ourselves to oversee production, and Shawn has worked with the factory we wish to use before, so communication between us and the factory will not be an issue. But talking to other people who have run Indiegogo, there is always something that comes up, be it customs, shipping, the manufacturing not being up to scratch or any other of the many things that can delay the process. We will do our best, and hope to deliver on time, and whatever happens we will keep you updated every step along the way.

We will definitely deliver a great product, and hope to do so on time!

Thanks from the whole team :)

Legal Disclaimer

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

story:
Concept and reason for creating the product

After the successful launching of our A.Brolly Tube, we want to make a new umbrella with all the cutting-edge technologies and for the whole family,and the product we came up with is this: A.Brolly Stonehenge. 

Engineering and design

A.Brolly Stonehenge is equipped with a number of patented high-tech functionalities. Firstly, we apply our AquaRepel technology on its fabric, making it extra water repellent and you can get rid of the water on the canopy with one fling motion.

Have you ever experienced walking along a crowded walkway with an umbrella? It causes you to twist and turn your umbrella constantly. Our Vortex technology allows the canopy to spin around with opposing forces so you can simply walk through without having to reposition your umbrella all the time. 

We also embedded the Anti-Blaster technology into the shaft of the umbrella makes the umbrella easier to close than ever. No more struggling to close the umbrella. The addition of the self-locking shaft ensures that the umbrella would not shoot open as the self-locking shaft gently controls the closing of the umbrella for the user.

A.Brolly Stonehenge is designed to have a super large canopy size of 122cm diameter when opened, enough to fully cover 2 people shoulder by shoulder. It helps you to protect your family members without getting wet under heavy rain.

In addition, we just added a carabiner which allows you to hook your A.Brolly Stonehenge on your backpack, briefcase or shopping bag to free up your hands as well as space required to carry the umbrella. While a carabiner is sold for around US$7 to US$10 outside, you get one here without extra costs!

and there is more...

We are producing over 600 billion pounds (275 million tonnes) of garbage each year. Approximately 17 billion pounds (8 million tons) are plastic waste which is destined for landfills or ends up into the oceans of the world causing untold environmental damage.

Furthermore, we are also exhausting the world’s precious water resources. For example, dyeing mills use on average 3.15 million liters of water per day. This is enough water for 16,000 people per day. According to the World Business Council for Sustainable Development (WBCSD), there is already not enough water for all uses. When annual per capita renewable freshwater availability is below 1,000 cubic meters, it will begin to hamper economic development as well as human health and well-being.

A.Brolly wants to take part in the solution but not the problem. Therefore, we are using the most advanced dyeing technologies with our recycled fabric made of recycled PET bottles to minimize any impact to the environment.

We employ the cutting-edge AquaOff® technology to completely eliminate water use in the dyeing process of the fabric. Assembly of the umbrella is carried out in our factory which covers the title of the most environmentally progressive umbrella factory in the world. Every aspect of production and all machinery are set up so that the least amount of energy as possible is used in the assembly of the umbrella. This makes the A.Brolly Stonehenge the most environmentally focused umbrella in the world!

Quality

Approximately 18 million pieces of umbrellas are sent to landfill each year. Our goal is to be part of the Solution and not the problem and hence why the Stonehenge umbrella in addition to its environmental credentials is made from the very best umbrella frames so it will stand the test of time and be around for many years to come.

 

 

Patents

With decades of experiences in making umbrellas, A.Brolly is highly advanced in terms of umbrella making technologies and is one of the very few manufacturers that own multiple umbrella patents worldwide. The Vortex and Anti-Blaster technologies used in the A.Brolly Stonehenge are self-developed and self-owned patents, and it ensures that A.Brolly Stonehenge has unique and exclusive features that are absolutely different from most umbrellas in the market.

Specification

 

New Color For Stonehenge

This Time, we added "Grey Stonehenge" special for our Indiegogo backers.

Waterproof travel pouch

an additional multiple-usage, shock-resistant and waterproof travel pouch free of charge for each Stonehenge purchased if we reach our set goal. Please help spread the news for us so we can reach our goal and provide each Stonehenge with this travel pouch for free!

  

A.Brolly Tube

A.Brolly Savile

Early Bird Package

Standard Package 

Family Package
