story:
& we're super excited to be launching this awesome (and somewhat terrifying) IndieGoGo Campaign! We're no strangers to crowd funding as our first ever subscription box business, Lit-Cube, was funded back in 2015 as a small Kickstarter AND our Stars Hollow Coloring Book was also funded via Kickstarter. However, we ARE new to such a HUGE project. We're freaking out here, actually. #MuppetFlail 

 

SophistiGeek's humble origins begin in a cramped living space where mother of five, Peggy Martinez, worked her butt off day and night and constantly thought outside the box to make her dream of owning her own business and supporting her family with it a reality.  MORE of our "origins" and the timeline of our business is below. But for now, let's dive into what we're doing here on IndieGoGo! 

The Experience We are Creating. 

SophistiGeek has ALWAYS operated with a few core beliefs. 

  • ONE. Create fabulous & geeky products that are mostly female-centric unlike the other major geeky brands out there that lean heavily toward men. 
  • TWO. Design really great products inspired by fandoms and cult classics that aren't quite as main stream as what other companies offer. 
  • THREE. Keep our exclusively designed & manufactured products affordable for the average geek. 
  • FOUR. Be unique. Be different. Totally unlike the other guys. Think outside the box with what products and what designs we create and bring to our customers. 
  • FIVE. Always be in touch personally with our customer base and create unique shopping experiences for them, even if it means a lot more work on our side. 

Of all of those core beliefs, the one that has been the most fun and fulfilling is number FIVE. We've done tons of live chats, creating thriving VIP Groups to mingle with our customer base, and so much more. Last year we began doing LIVE sales via Facebook and they became wildly popular. THIS year we wanted to kick our live sales up a notch and make them even MORE personalized for our customers. 

In April of 2018 we launched our "Live Shopping Experience" right from our teeny tiny, not-very-pretty warehouse. (really, it's more of a glorified storage unit) We were BLOWN AWAY by the response. You can see one of the very first & rough live shopping experience videos HERE.  

There isn't a single other brand or retailer IN THE WORLD doing what we're doing. 

However, one of the things that was evident right away was that there was no real way we could SCALE what we were doing. Only one person could do the live sale at a time and they had to be IN our warehouse. As the owner of the company, I also couldn't do it all myself since I'm busy running so many other aspects of the business. Not only that, BUT not everyone could enjoy the LIVE Experience because we couldn't schedule them to fit everyone's schedules AND Facebook is notorious for being spotty and cranky with cutting off comments, etc., if it perceives the "live shopper" to be commenting too many times in a thread or in a row. We were running into that more and more as we did the shopping days. 

SO, I did some out of the box thinking, and one night while I was working late in the warehouse after a live sale, it HIT me like a ton of bricks! Instead of trying to fit MORE people into a schedule and relying on a very unreliable platform and keeping our "experience" not quite as nice as I would have preferred because of our ugly, cramped space... why not kick the Live Shopping Experience UP A FREAKING NOTCH and make it available permanently via our website? The FIRST EVER LIVE STREAMING Shopping Experience available at ANY time on the www.shopsophistigeek.com

Enter the need for an IndieGoGo Campaign. 

In order to create the LIVE & personalized shopping experience, we're going to need YOUR help. We'll need to outfit a small showroom just like a storefront, create a small fulfillment department, purchase all the gear necessary to "go live" from our showroom (iPads, mics, etc.), hire live retail operators, purchase enough new inventory for our customers to shop, and get into the retail building necessary to create this amazing experience for our online customers. Not to mention website development for the live feeds, branded packaging, inventory system, tables and shelving, and so much more. 

A small sampling of the things we offer at reasonable prices...

& so much more!

story:
Please notice, that you have to use the sharing tool from Indiegogo. Otherwise we can't track who invited his friends. They also have to be logged in with there account.

What's that Xapkin Tab?

The Xapkin Tab is an innovative refreshing cloth, which has been pressed into a small round shape. The Tab is approximately 2cm in diameter and 1cm in height. By dousing the Tab in our special fragrance it will unfold and become a 23x23cm size cloth. The combination of the Xapkin Tab and our fragrances produces the perfect tool for cleaning your skin and work surfaces.



What's the purpose of that Product?

Our goal is to develop a functional and practical aid for everyday use.

The practical size of the Tab is ideal to put in your trouser pocket. It’s great for every occasion. Whether you’re in a restaurant, working out or just for everyday use. The Xapkin Tab is an all-purpose cloth made out of viscous, which is compostable and will decompose residue-free after a month.


In this day and age with a high germ contamination rate it is easy to become a victim of illness, which is why it is so important to purify our hands to reduce the possibility of infection. That is why we developed a special cleaning liquid to intensify the Tabs cleaning ability.

There are currently three different fragrance’s available.

  • Citrus

  • Rose

  • Eucalyptus

With your help we will be able to develop new fragrances and different formula’s in order to have the ideal solution for the area of application.




Why we need your support?

We have now completed the development of our Tabs and fragrance’s. However, since we do not yet have the production capacity we need to begin by creating the infrastructure for our production. We need to get several mixing tanks, agitators, scales and filling stations. The second point is the cost for advertising and promoting products. We will use a variety of media to promote our products. 

We need your help to overcome these hurdles, so that we can successfully enter the market.


What's in the future?

After the successful implementation of production and marketing, we would like to offer our customers the possibility to design their own Tab-dispenser. We would then produce them with our 3D printers. We are planning to expand our fragrance collection. Thereby not only changing the scent but also the formula to obtain optimum cleaning results for various uses.


Risks and other ways to help!

To minimize the risk, we already pre-produced all of the products that we offer as perks; therefore we can guarantee that you will receive your perk.

We don’t offer any perks that you are interested in but you would still like to help?

Then you can help by simply spreading information about our products. We also still need distributors all over the world. You handle goods and work in the catering business and would like to purchase our products? Then please don’t hesitate to get in touch with us.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Hannah Olson, and I founded Hannah Caroline Couture in September of 2012. Hannah Caroline Couture is a custom clothing company that designs clothing for women of any body type, budget and deadline, giving me the opportunity to fulfill my passion for design and empowering women across the country to feel comfortable and beautiful in their clothes.


In two and a half short years, the HCC label has been featured in several fashion shows, including:

  • Omaha Fashion Week (5 shows)
  • Kansas City Fashion Week (2 shows)
  • RAW:Artists Omaha (2 shows)
  • Several charity shows
Now, as a college sophomore, I have been accepted to showcase my designs in the biggest show of my career: Full Figured Fashion Week in New York City! This week of fashion allows women of all sizes to celebrate their bodies, a mission that has been central to my company from the start.

I've already tackled the hurdle of getting accepted into the exclusive showcase. Now I need help getting there. I am asking you to join me on my journey and help me by contributing towards travel, transportation, and accommodations from Omaha, Nebraska to the Big Apple.

Contributing to this campaign means you're helping me, an ambitious, experienced teenage designer bring my message of inclusive, custom fashion to a huge stage: Full-Figured Fashion Week in New York City. This is much more than just a summer trip to NYC- this is the big break for Hannah Caroline Couture that will get my company in front of the press, media, and connections that it needs to take HCC to the top and spread the message of inclusive, frustration-free, personalized fashion all across the nation (and the world!)

What We Need & What You Get

We passed the application process, now we need help getting there. This campaign will support me and my mom/assistant with:

  • Airfare: $1800
  • Hotel Accommodations (6 nights): $2000
  • Materials (fabric, zippers, etc.): $500
  • Transportation (cabs + subway): $300
  • Shipping the Collection: $200
  • Other Expenses: $200

Being part of a custom clothing maker's campaign makes for some awesome perks:

  • Gift cards for ready-made clothing
  • Exclusive campaign tee shirts
  • Custom clothing
  • A ticket to the big show

If we don't get completely funded, we will fund airfare first, and find alternatives to for hotels and transportation during the week of shows.

The Impact

My company, Hannah Caroline Couture, is committed to helping women feel confident and beautiful in their clothing. Sending me to New York City helps me spread this message to an incredible audience on one of the biggest stages in the fashion industry.


HCC has gained media attention in the Midwest in newspapers, blogs, and magazines. To check out some of the stories, head to www.hannahcarolinecouture.com/press.


Risks & Challenges

I'm experienced in producing stand-out collections and taking advantage of opportunities to grow. The biggest show in HCC's history is within reach, but the road from Omaha to NYC is an expensive one. Contributing to this campaign will allow a teenager to follow her dream, spread an important message, and expand a company built on relationships, customer service, and hard work.


Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute financially at this time, it would be a great help if you shared my campaign with people who can! 

Hannah Caroline Couture thrives on referrals, too- if you know someone looking for custom clothing, send them to www.hannahcarolinecouture.com. All revenues will go toward these expenses leading up to the trip!

story:
The Problem

Small. Medium. Large.

With all the body shapes in the world, do you really think that the mass produced sizes that stores provide are ever going to make you look your best? Buying clothing in store is like rolling the dice every time, with most choices being a poor fit. Most men don’t even know what a great fit for them looks like, or even feels like. 

 

It’s true, there are plenty of great tailors out there. If you have the patience and the time and the money, then sure, this could be a good option for you. But what if you’re a normal guy who wants to look his best? It’s time for a better, more balanced solution.

A Solution Called UKYS

The UKYS app has been developed to solve the problem of men not being able to easily access fitted clothing. The UKYS app uses your iPhone/iPad camera to measure your body within minutes, taking a long and costly tailor measuring process and making it quick, easy and completely free.

Once the app has your measurements, every quality UKYS shirt that you order will be custom fitted for your body.

We are excited to be able to share our ambitions with the INDIEGOGO community. We need your support in order to produce the first run of custom shirts, measured using the UKYS app. You’re not just investing in a sharp, custom shirt; you’re also making it possible for men everywhere to finally be able to dress their best.

It’s time for all men to experience what fitted clothing does for your outward appearance and your inner confidence. 

 

We use only 100% finely cotton fabrics. We're proud of the quality of our shirts. All fabrics are Oeko-Tex Certification obtained and long-term color consistency guaranteed. Almost our shirts are from 80's 2-ply, which is about the best you can get.

 

Because we automate the expensive measurement process and sell directly to consumers from our factory, we're able to pass on those savings to the consumer and offer an amazing value. Typically, custom shirts of similar quality start at $130 and above.

Create your own personalized shirt for a custom look, fit, and feel.
 
            
   Collars                                    Cuffs                                             Pocket
 

*Not all options shown

At the heart of the UKYS app is LIM, a technology developed by our in-house engineering team to perfectly capture the measurements a tailor would make, but from your phone instead of a costly visit to the tailor.
 

LIM has been developed and refined over the course of a year. Hundreds of prototypes were tested before we felt the app was able to consistently determine measurements to the same level as our own professional tailors.

 

With just five standing posture photos, which you can take in the comfort of your own home, LIM Technology is able to create a 3D model of your body from which your body measurements are taken and used by the UKYS app to apply to your orders.

 

 

Face-censored effect is designed for the privacy of your photos. Once our experts review the data, your photos are permanently deleted.
 

 
Here's one of our first tester's reaction to his shirt tailored with LIM technology.

 

Here's one of our first backer's reaction to his shirt tailored with LIM technology.

STEP 1:  After you back on Indiegogo, you will receive your UKYS account and UKYS Getting Started Guideline via your email.

STEP 2: Download and Install UKYS app to your IOS device at this link: http://apple.co/29fqGJN

STEP 3: Open UKYS app to customize your shirt choice and get measured.

STEP 4: Enjoy the Perfect Fit of your custom shirt.

Beginning with a family tailoring business overseas, our experienced team of tailors have made thousands of custom fitted shirts. This business was combined with that of other family members who work in information technology. Together we developed the app, combining the best aspects of both industries.

 

The app and measurement capturing is our innovative technology, but the final product, a UKYS shirt, is individually crafted by the skilled hands of our tailors. Each shirt comes with our Fit Promise – if you’re not 100% satisfied with the fit of your shirt, we will alter it or remake it from scratch, at no extra cost. Alternatively, we also offer a money back guarantee.

The app development is complete and ready for launch. Our tailoring business has the resources to produce the shirts within the timeframe that we have outlined.

We have spent over a year developing this project and every piece is in place to begin production immediately after our Indiegogo ends.

 

Our team has been diligently working together for a year to bring this product to life. We have a diverse set of skills and backgrounds in tailoring, product management, marketing, computer science, design...This is our family.

 

 

 

 

 

Potential delays may come from our fabric suppliers, but we are involved at every step of the supply chain, from the choice of fabrics through to the close monitoring of production. This experience allows us to feel very confident that there will be minimal delays, if any, and that we have the control to ensure that each shirt is up to the high standards of UKYS.

If there is a delay, we guarantee that each shirt will still be delivered.

Interested in writing about us? Our press kit is available for download here. Also, please feel free to email us directly at press@ukys.com or leave a message if you have any questions.

What if my shirt doesn’t fit?

If you are not 100% satisfied with your fit, we will alter, remake it or offer your money back.

The app takes my photo. Does it stay private?

Yes, a face censoring effect is automatically applied to your photos, so your privacy remains intact. Once our experts review the data, your photos are also permanently deleted.

What happens when I order a shirt again?

Your measurements will still be connected to your profile. You can apply them to any future orders.

Will this technology only be used for men’s shirts?

LIM technology can be used for any type of fitted clothing. We are focused on men’s shirts for now but will continue to develop the product in order to make other types of high-quality, fitted clothes available in the future.

story:
Hey Indiegogo, Burners and Friends of Duck Pond!

For those of you who don't know us, we are the Duck Pond, a Burning Man theme camp & dive bar serving up frosty beers and our World Famous Playa Specials every year since 2006!   We're here on Indiegogo raising funds to help us bring back the Duck Tower, our 30 foot high, 5 foot diameter lush-luring beacon of refreshing beverage goodness.

For 10 years, we've been known for lighting up Burning Man with our Early Bird Special Sunday night party, frosty beers, and our World Famous Playa Specials.  We pride ourselves on not only being prepared just a little early, so you properly celebrate your return Home after a hard day of building, driving, or whatever else it you do when you get back to the playa, but also helping to guide yourself back to Tokyo Sector (aka the 9 o'clock side) with our bright 'n shiny Duck Tower.

But we need your help!  The Duck Tower has been faithfully serving Funky Town for many, many years, and needs some help getting back to the playa.  We're asking for your help to make sure we get her into ship-shape, and making sure you have a trusty beacon to get you where you need to be.  We're raising $3,500 to purchase new materials, supplies and generally construct and transport the next generation Duck Tower, and to help fund bringing the Duck Pond back to the playa in full force for 2016.

Learn a whole lot more about us from one of our founders, Mr. John Mills.


Where's your money going?

We're raising $3,500 to help fund two key projects: 

  • Building Duck Tower 2.0
  • Funding 24' Truck Rental 

The Duck Pond pride ourselves on being completely self-funded - ALL of our projects are funded by member dues, and offset by fundraisers.

The funds from this fundraiser will be used to reimburse the construction costs for the next generation Duck Tower, current cost approximately $500 (thanks, Good Tim!).  The remaining majority of the funds will go to paying for a truck rental to get Duck Tower 2.0 to the playa (quoted at $3000 -and that doesn't include gas!)

Any remaining funds beyond $3500 will offset the costs of running the camp:

  • Gasoline and Generators ($865 in 2015)
  • Sound Equipment rental ($1065 in 2015)
  • Storage and Transportation costs ($1165 in 2015)

What's in it for you?

You get to bask in the self-satisfied warming glow of inner peace knowing you helped us bring a community favorite back to the playa. And swag. All the swag.


Risks & Challenges

Ask any Burner "What can go wrong at Burning Man?" and you'll get the same answer: EVERYTHING.   Despite surviving the dust, rain and lightning, mechanical failures, theft, car accidents and more the Duck Pond has a proven track record of bringing you our highly-interactive theme camp every year.  

Our primary risks this year are having our truck rental over-booked (we almost didn't get a truck last year, despite having a reservation for over 8 months!), and being unable to complete construction of Duck Tower 2.0.  While we're being intentionally a little vague about our designs (we want to surprise you guys!), we promise the construction is straightforward, and involves the usual Burner project materials : blood, sweat, tears, steel, MIG-welders, 110v power, 300w bulbs and some cool new high-tech materials for the "skin."  Design is underway, and construction began in April.  We believe the risk of not getting our truck (which was reserved in early April) is much higher than failing to complete construction.  That said, we've got a great relationship with our new truck rental company (Fairfield Storage, ask for Nervin!), and are confident that, with your support, Duck Tower 2.0 will be a resounding success.

In the worst case, if there are any construction challenges or problems getting a truck, we will bring Duck Tower 1.0 to the playa. You know it, you love it, and it'll light your way Home.


Other Ways You Can Help

Love the duck pond, but need to save your moolah for that damn Nevada Live Entertainment Tax? We'd still love your help! 

  • Help spread this campaign within your Burner community, on Facebook, or on Twitter and Instagram
  • Want to get more involved? Reach out and help us with one of our many projects (Bar, Decor, Lifeguard Tower, Bucking Duck, Duck Tower, Fundraising, any of it!)

And that's all there is to it, thanks!

story:
What's it all about?


Built on a foundation of passion for heritage crafts, Asad Iftikhar Iqbal is looking to launch a full collection of Asian bridal and occasion wear. Since setting up the brand in 2013, we have received a lot of interest in our premier capsule collection 'The Dress-up Box'. The collection showcased six different looks encompassing a range of textiles and detailing across saris, lehengas and anarkalis. 

The ethos behind the brand is to offer custom made outfits for individual clients. Everything is geared towards ensuring that Bollywood glamour is not just limited to the chosen few. Our clients enjoy an innovative service that gives them access to a blend of traditional crafts fused with modern designs. 

We've had a great response, but the most important feedback we've had is that people want to see more! By funding this preview, you'll be giving us a chance to show people what we can really do. 

What We Need

We're asking for a total of £1,200 which will allow us to put one bridal ensemble and two pieces of occasion wear into production. All three outfits will be made up of fine fabrics and exquisite hand embroidery from a very talented team of craftsmen. As well as the pieces themselves, you'll be funding a photoshoot which will be used to generate some of the perks listed below. We'll work with whatever funds we raise, but the more we get, the more we'll be able to do!

The collection itself is inspired by different historical eras, and will take you on a journey that will have you dancing in the palaces of 1890's Lucknow to walking the streets of 1920's New York. Luxury is the byword for this collection and you can expect to see a lot of velvet, brocade and stunningly intricate craftsmanship. Our mission is to make traditional Pakistani crafts available to everyone, whether they're looking for a gharara or an evening gown and this collection will do that in abundance. 


Here's a small sample of the ensembles in the collection:


The Beaded Flapper Lehenga

Drawing inspiration from the muted excess of the Prohibition era, this bridal ensemble features a heavily beaded lehenga with a pleated peak-a-boo lining. The raw silk blouse features a statement shaped seam across the bust and the embellished dupatta with its fringed edging will be sure to recall flapperesque drama.

The Black & Gold Gharara

This outfit brings back nawabi style with a modern twist. The placement of the embroidery on the short kameez gives a different look whilst complimenting the old world charm of the full brocade gharara. 

The Sapphire Romantic Gown

With its full skirt and embellished detailing, this gown recalls romantic imagery such as 'The Lady of Shallot'. Details such as the pleated waistline make this an outfit easy to dress-up or down for any occasion. 


What You Get

In exchange for your support, you have acces to an exciting range of perks! On offer we have a heartfelt thank you for everyone who funds this project on our website and facebook page, as well as the chance to own two of the pieces that embody the aesthetics of the collection. 


1. £5  - A digital sketch of one of the outfits from the collection and a 'thank you' on our website and Facebook page.


2. £10 - All of the above and a digital edition of a few pages from my scrapbook so you can see how the collection came about. 


3. £20 - 1 + 2 and a 20% off voucher to use on any order you place with us.

 

4. £40 - 1 + 2 and a 30% off voucher to use on any order you place with us.


5. £50 - 1 + 2 + 3 and a set of postcards featuring the pieces you've helped to create.


6. £100 - 1 + 2 + 3 and a soft-back photobook featuring the pieces you've helped to create.


7. £250 - 1 + 2 + 3 and the 'Shahi' blouse in a colour of your choice.


(Please note that the lehenga/ skirt in this picture is not included)

A deliciously sumptuous blouse in pure silk velvet with rich hand embroidery featuring a mix of dabka, tilla and sequins on the shoulders and sleeves. Use it to dress up a vintage sari or pair it with your favorite jeans to make a statement. This will be made from scratch and tailored to your measurements. 


8. £400 - 1 + 2 + 3 and the 'Ornate' dress in a colour of your choice.


Bring back retro glamour with this cocktail dress in pure silk chiffon with a luxuriously soft pure silk strapless lining. The intricate details across the neckline and sleeves are set off by the cut-out layered back. This will be made from scratch and tailored to your measurements. The ribbon belt is not included as standard but can be added at no extra cost. 

As a contributor you can expect...

  • To be kept up date with regular emails about the progress of the pieces. 
  • To be part of a unique journey. 
  • To be our first priority if you have any questions along the way
  • The pride of knowing you've help to create something unique and beautiful that showcases the best of Pakistani craftsmanship.

Other Ways You Can Help

If contributing isn't for you, please share this with as many people as possible! We're very passionate about this collection and would love to find more people who share the same passion. 


Website: www.asadiftikhariqbal.com

Facebook: www.facebook.com/asadiftiqbal

Twitter: www.twitter.com/Asad_I_Iqbal

story:
The Run Down

I want to create my own art! As a designer/illustrator I have been creating things for other people for close to six years. It is time for a change. Here's your chance to help me put my art out on the best canvas there is. YOU! 

The Goods

  • We are looking to raise $1500 to purchase t-shirts and to have our designs printed.
  • Every T-shirt will be printed by hand by one of our team members.
  • Who Doesn't want original art,T-Shirt,or a picture of an awesome dog?
  • If we don't reach the goal, all of our funds are going to filling our "perks" to say thanks for the support

What we are trying to do.

To me nothing beats original art and t-shirts are the easiest way to show it. Old Crow Apparel is an opportunity for me and other artists to share what we love with the world.  On top of showing off art we are donating a portion of all shirts sold to local artist charities.   We already support several community youth groups, by providing T-shirts for their events, and donate shirts for fund raising.   For several years I have served as a mentor for High School students that dream of going to Art School for Design.  By helping us you are helping develop the next generation of artist. 

Broke? Want to Help?

Not a problem Some people just can’t contribute.

Please share our love of this project with your friends and family.

Every little thing helps. Remember Indiegogo has share tools that will help you get the word out.

Thank You so much for your support. 

Michael Corrick

story:
Update Feb 6, 2013 ~ Compaign Ends

Throughout this campaign, your support and generous contributions have given us so much encouragement. We are delighted that many of you like the product and are finding success with it, so quickly. We had fun conducting this campaign and connecting with all of you, the dog lovers.

Please visit our website



for information and to purchase
the Pebble Smart Doggie Doorbell.

Have fun and let us know how the product works for you and your beloved dog(s). We love to hear your feedback!

Update Jan 24, 2013 ~ Shipping Started

We started shipping today! We will ship the products in the order that contributions were received. When you receive your doorbells, please read the instructions first before testing and installing. This is especially important if your dog is sensitive to sound.

Update ~ Sample Sign-off

Just received the samples to sign-off for the first production. The first batch is coming soon... Cheers! Watch the unpacking video in the Update section.

Update ~ Press Coverage

CBS News: Teaching dogs to ring doorbells
ABC News: Doggie Doorbell Lets Owners Know When Pooch Wants...
KVAL: Doorbell for dogs: 'It's easy to train, easy to install'
WVNTV: Inventor creates doggie doorbell
Oregon Herald: Eugene dog rings doorbell when he wants to urinate
Capital Bay: Pet owner invents a doggie doorbell after his pooch ...
Portland Plup: Move over Kitten Mittons, the Doggy Doorbell has...
NY Pooch: Dog Needs Out? Just Ring the Doorbell!
NWCN: Oregon dog trained to ring bell for potty break

Indiegogo
Team Blog: Gadgets, Apps, and Widgets Roundup
Team Blog: Holiday Gift Roundup
Team Blog: Campaign Roundup

Internationally
Daily Mail UK: Pet owner invents a doggie doorbell after his pooch...

Door-scratching to Bell-ringing

Are you familiar with this scene, beautiful doors ruined by your beloved dogs? If the dogs could speak, they would tell you it is equally frustrating for them.

Pebble Smart Doggie Doorbell solves the problem and transforms it into a rewarding experience for the dog owners and their dogs.

  • No more door-scratching
  • Great for house training
  • Easy installation
  • Wireless, range up to 250 feet
  • Hear it anywhere in the house
  • Easy to train and loads of fun
  • 36 selectable tunes
  • Proud dog, happy owner
  • And yes, cats can use it, too…

How It Works

Installation is super easy and no wiring is required. It can be installed inside or outside.

Can My Dog Learn It?

Simply put, yes. Pebble Smart Doggie Doorbell is built with training in mind. We provide detailed, step-by-step, and easy-to-follow training instructions. Like Pebble, our Whippet, your dog can learn to ring the Doggie Doorbell and be happy and proud every time he does it.

Training Enhances Bonding

Training makes your dog happy and smart. It deepens the bond between you and your dog.

All experienced dog trainers teach that fun and positive training enhances the bond between the owner and the dog. It is a vital ingredient in a rewarding pet-owning experience. Pebble Smart Doggie Doorbell is enthusiastically embraced by dog trainers as a great training tool. Many dog owners who have tried this product tell us how happy and proud their dogs are when they have learned this trick, not to mention how amazed and amused the owners and their friends are! 

Our Progress So Far

Since the begining, this project has been embraced by our community. From friends, to dog owners, to trainers, to pet store owners, to business counselors, we received so much support, encouragement, and wonderful ideas. Now, with your support, we will be able to put the product into the hands of many more dog lovers.

The funding will go toward completing the tooling work and the first batch production. Your pre-orders will help bring down the per-unit cost. Thank you, IndieGoGo!

Blue for Boys and Pink for Girls


When ordering, you can specify your preference for the blue or pink accent of the receiver. We will try to match your preference when possible.

Both Coming In and Going Out?

Pebble Smart Doggie Doorbell can be used by your dog for both coming in and going out.


The secondary receiver can be placed on a different floor.

Multiple Doors?

No problem. You can get one of the following multi-packs. (Other configurations may be available upon request.)

Note: All multi-packs contain complete individual units. They can work together in the same household or as individual units in different households. In other words, you can get multi-packs and distribute the individual units among friends.

Testimonials

“Pebble Smart Doggie Doorbell is so much easier to train with than other types of doorbells. It is also a valuable tool in teaching a dog the proper doorbell manners.”

~ Julie Flanery, CPDT, Certified Dog Trainer, Wonder Dogs, Philomath, OR

“Pebble Smart Doggie Doorbell is a smart invention that gives the dog a fun and positive way to interact with the owner.”

~Julia Bowlin, Dog Trainer, Eugene’s Dog Whisperer

 “… it is the best investment I have made for my Miniature Poodle.  …  In just a few days my Poodle was pressing the bell to go outside. No more wet door rug!  Best of all is the portability of the unit.  We travel quite often so I take the Doggie Doorbell with me and stick it on the new door and my Poodle always knows how to tell me she needs to go outside. I even use it in hotels! Thank you for a great product.”

~ Darlene Kellerman, Dog Owner, Therapy Dog Volunteer, Eugene, OR

“No more door-scratching! Our dog, Scooter, uses her doggie doorbell many times every day.  We humans like knowing when she's ready to come back indoors from the yard, and Scooter likes that she can get our immediate attention and door-opening service when she rings her bell.  If we don't respond quickly, she rings it a second time!”

~ Betsy Datri, Happy Dog Owner, Eugene, OR

“I am very pleased with your professionalism. You have pride in your work… Once again, thank you for your ingenuity.”

~ Kit F., Lebanon, OR

Compared to Other Solutions

People have come up with different ways to save the doors. Each approach has its advantages and limitations.

Jingle bells can be hard to hear if you are not in the same room or it is hung outside the door. Electronic sensors sense the presence of the dog near the door, but the dog may not have intended to go out. Door protectors work great to protect the door, but it doesn't give the dogs a good way to communicate their needs. A great opportunity for training and bonding is lost.

Pebble Smart Doggie Doorbell is easier to train with. You can hear it from anywhere in the house. The bell will only ring when the dog intentionally triggers it. (The more they use their brain, the smarter they get.) The communication is intentional and positive. When they ring the doorbell, you will be so delighted and amused that you want to reward them. It is an all-around happy experience.

About Us

Pebble Smart LLC was founded by Keith Jin and Yin Lei, and inspired by Pebble, our family's beloved Whippet. Pebble came to us on a Valentine's Day and we fell in love with him.

At Pebble Smart, we believe smart training tools can help transform behavior issues into opportunities for fun and positive training, which deepens the bond and brings more joy in pet owning. Every pet product we invent and make is for the love shared by people and their pets everywhere.

Video Credits

Our sincere appreciation goes to the people and dogs who contributed to the video:

Darlene Kellerman and her Miniature Poodle, Kozi, for their support and for sharing their experience with us.

Kai Burley, for his great music work.

William Haldane, for brainstorming ideas for making this video.

Betsy Datri, Brian Eimstad, and Scooter, for being our very first testers and enthusiastic supporters. The dainty little Scooter learned to ring the doorbell with her paws.

Jennifer Biglan, for being an amazing dog trainer. Her Husky, Kyla, was ringing the doorbell within minutes.

Molli, the little sweetheart Cockapoo, for showing us how quickly she could learn this new trick.

Ginger and Griffindor, the Labdoodle, for testing our early prototype.

And those loveable and funny dogs, for demonstrating the problem that inspired Pebble Smart Doggie Doorbell.

story:
Four years as a fashion major at Syracuse University brings me to the final and most extensive project yet - Senior Collection. 

This collection consists of 6 complete looks, each designed, drafted and sewn by hand.

who I am + what I do: 

Rooted in a deep love for art, clothing has always been an important way for me to communicate my personal artistic style.

Raised by parents who taught the importance of a strong work ethic, I’ve been happy to take the role of being a student as a constant motivating challenge. I am driven to strive for my utmost potential in everything I do. 

This determination in school offered me the opportunity to study in Australia for a semester. There, I discovered more peace than I had ever felt before. Australia’s culture taught me how to find the balance between work and enjoyment, simply being that whatever you do for work can and should be what you love to do every day. I took time to immerse myself back into the things I have always loved- painting, writing, music, and living a natural lifestyle where less is more. All of these things helped me find my truest sense of self, both personally and as a designer. 

The clothing I now design is directly inspired by this lifestyle. Each piece I create is centered around the idea of self liberation- garments that allow for less worry about your appearance, and more focus on an active yet peaceful life. My main concern is always how a design and all of it's details will make a person feel.

I desire clothing to function in a way that allows the wearer’s true personality to shine through. I believe the most beautiful thing is when clothing lets a person’s natural imperfections to radiate. The idea of this imperfect perfection describes one essential characteristic of my style and design aesthetic. Clothing designed from this aesthetic will let you experience the greatest possible feeling of comfort, freedom, and confidence. My designs offer this sense of liberation through clean simple lines, soft yet durable fabrics, and a modern edge. 

I have always desired my art to impact people in a positive way, and now I have found the means to do so by designing clothing. By producing this fashion collection, I will be able to apply my ideas as tangible and meaningful creations. These creations will serve as the initial foundation to a clothing line focused on the simple idea that what you choose to wear may inspire you to lead a healthier and happier life.

how your support helps:

To complete this collection I am asking for $1500. This amount will allow me to purchase quality fabric, yarn, accessories and all other materials necessary for each garment’s creation. I intend to consciously source these materials, to remain attentive to earth’s sustainability in all of the work I produce. Several looks include two or more pieces embellished with unique fabric treatments. With your donations I will be able to construct clothing that is distinguished and original- ready to be shown on a runway and to design companies in the industry.

A portion of this project is the collaboration with local jewelry designer, The Knotty Owl, of Rochester, NY. Your donations will assist us in purchasing jewelry materials for this collection that have the quality necessary for a professional runway show. The jewelry pieces collaborating with my clothing will introduce the The Knotty Owl's most recent line of design work, that take on a new direction of intricate shapes and materials.

Thank you so much for your consideration. I am so happy to share this project with you, and cannot wait to see it all unfold. If you have any questions, please contact me at ali.v.sparks@gmail.com. 

 

With gratitude, I am offering these thank-you ‘perks’ for the first few supporters who donate:

(images of perks are located in the gallery - click the gallery link at the top of the page)

 $10 or more -

Anyone who contributes $10 or more will receive one of my personal hand-painted illustrations with a personalized message. 

$25 or more -

The first 20 supporters who give $25 or more will receive one of my hand-painted illustrations + one $10 gift certificate to The Knotty Owl.

(The Knotty Owl is a jewelry line based locally in Rochester, NY. She offers a wide variety of wooden jewelry, each piece crafted by hand.)

$50 or more -

The first 10 people to give $50 or more will receive the choice of one hand-made accessory + one $20 gift certificate to The Knotty Owl.

You have the option of 2 accessories: a jersey-knit circle scarf, or a denim necktie. Each one will have a unique faded blue color. Dyed by hand, the imperfections in color are to be embraced.

$100 or more - 

The first 10 people to contribute $100 or more will choose: 

Two accessories. (2 scarves, 2 ties, or scarf & necktie) 

OR 

Your choice of one garment item. 

You have the option of a unisex long sleeve OR short sleeve cotton t-shirt. 100% cotton fabric dyed blue with an ombre fade.(S, M, L sizes available)

$125 or more - 

The first 10 supporters to donate $125 or more will receive a women's tank dress. Made from light cotton jersey-knit fabric and dyed blue with an ombre fade. (S, M, L sizes available)

$200 or more - 

The first 5 people donating $200 or more will receive the choice of two garments. Long sleeve T, short sleeve T, or tank dress. Tell me what you like best!

 

If you have any questions regarding perks or the project in general, please feel free to contact me at ali.v.sparks@gmail.com. Depending on the amount of your donation, I can be flexible with the reward, so please send an email if you have any concerns. Thank you so much for your support!
story_txt:
Four years as a fashion major at Syracuse University brings me to the final and most extensive project yet - Senior Collection. 
This collection consists of 6 complete looks, each designed, drafted and sewn by hand.
who I am + what I do: 
Rooted in a deep love for art, clothing has always been an important way for me to communicate my personal artistic style.
Raised by parents who taught the importance of a strong work ethic, I’ve been happy to take the role of being a student as a constant motivating challenge. I am driven to strive for my utmost potential in everything I do. 
This determination in school offered me the opportunity to study in Australia for a semester. There, I discovered more peace than I had ever felt before. Australia’s culture taught me how to find the balance between work and enjoyment, simply being that whatever you do for work can and should be what you love to do every day. I took time to immerse myself back into the things I have always loved- painting, writing, music, and living a natural lifestyle where less is more. All of these things helped me find my truest sense of self, both personally and as a designer. 
The clothing I now design is directly inspired by this lifestyle. Each piece I create is centered around the idea of self liberation- garments that allow for less worry about your appearance, and more focus on an active yet peaceful life. My main concern is always how a design and all of it's details will make a person feel.
I desire clothing to function in a way that allows the wearer’s true personality to shine through. I believe the most beautiful thing is when clothing lets a person’s natural imperfections to radiate. The idea of this imperfect perfection describes one essential characteristic of my style and design aesthetic. Clothing designed from this aesthetic will let you experience the greatest possible feeling of comfort, freedom, and confidence. My designs offer this sense of liberation through clean simple lines, soft yet durable fabrics, and a modern edge. 
I have always desired my art to impact people in a positive way, and now I have found the means to do so by designing clothing. By producing this fashion collection, I will be able to apply my ideas as tangible and meaningful creations. These creations will serve as the initial foundation to a clothing line focused on the simple idea that what you choose to wear may inspire you to lead a healthier and happier life.
how your support helps:
To complete this collection I am asking for $1500. This amount will allow me to purchase quality fabric, yarn, accessories and all other materials necessary for each garment’s creation. I intend to consciously source these materials, to remain attentive to earth’s sustainability in all of the work I produce. Several looks include two or more pieces embellished with unique fabric treatments. With your donations I will be able to construct clothing that is distinguished and original- ready to be shown on a runway and to design companies in the industry.
A portion of this project is the collaboration with local jewelry designer, The Knotty Owl, of Rochester, NY. Your donations will assist us in purchasing jewelry materials for this collection that have the quality necessary for a professional runway show. The jewelry pieces collaborating with my clothing will introduce the The Knotty Owl's most recent line of design work, that take on a new direction of intricate shapes and materials.
Thank you so much for your consideration. I am so happy to share this project with you, and cannot wait to see it all unfold. If you have any questions, please contact me at ali.v.sparks@gmail.com.

The first 20 supporters who give $25 or more will receive one of my hand-painted illustrations + one $10 gift certificate to The Knotty Owl. 
(The Knotty Owl is a jewelry line based locally in Rochester, NY. She offers a wide variety of wooden jewelry, each piece crafted by hand.)
$50 or more -

story:
The HONU is a sidemount buoyancy compensator that was designed for destination diving.  
 
 
The HONU was designed to satisfy a need that I had for a sidemount rig that was suited for destination diving.  Since the first coffee napkin sketch 18 months ago, the HONU has been turned into a fully functional device that has been proven in various recreational diving environments.  At 6 pounds, the HONU is light enough to roll up and place into a carry-on bag when traveling.  With 27 pounds of lift, the HONU has sufficient lift for most any cylinder configuration.  The convenient location of the rear dump valve will make it easy to maintain neutral buoyancy while maintaining a sublevel orientation.  The single bladder of the HONU is ideal for scuba diving within recreational diving limits. To maintain a streamlined profile in the water, three integrated weight pockets have been placed into the lumbar region.  Each weight pocket is designed to carry up to three pounds of weight.  For many scuba divers, this will eliminate the need for weight belts or additional weight pockets.    
 
                      
 
The design of the HONU was 'Born in Texas'!  The manufacturer is located in Wuxi (pronounced woo-she), China, which is just outside of Shanghai.  The manufacturer that we selected is the largest manufacturer of buoyancy compensator devices in Asia, and is ISO 9001:2000 certified.  (It is possible that your current buoyancy compensator was also made by this manufacturer!)  The parent company of this manufacturer is located in California and owns "top of mind" brands within the scuba diving industry.  Our manufactuer has proven it's ability to rapidly produce small prototype orders, and we have established a solid relationship with them over the past year.  A face to face meeting with our manufacurer has further strengthened our relationship.  
              
 
What We Need
 
We have boot strapped the research, design, prototyping, and testing of the HONU.  We are now ready for the first production run of the HONU.  In order to make the HONU available to you, we will need your support in raising capital to cover the costs associated with the first production run of the HONU.  
 
 
What You Get  (the perks!)
 
Some of you will want to take advantage of this opportunity to pre-order the HONU.  Diving with the HONU is the greatest perk that we can offer.  Whether you are looking for one recreational sidemount buoyancy compensator, or multiple recreational sidemount buoyancy compensators, you will find a perk that will satisfy your desire.
 
You can pre-order one complete HONU kit for $449.  In addition to this perk, you will also receive a handwritten Thank You card.
 
You can pre-order three (3) complete HONU kits for $1,250.  At this level, the discounted price per kit is $425.  You will also receive a handwritten Thank You card.  
 
You can pre-order five (5) complete HONU kits for $2,000.  At this level, the discounted price per kit is $400.  You will also receive a handwritten Thank You card.  
 
The accessory kit is a perk that you might like to have in your dive bag.  For $99, you will receive:  
 
  • two chokers with stainless steel butterfly bolt snaps
  • two cam bands with stainless steel butterfly bolt snaps
  • bungees with stainless steel butterfly bolt snaps
  • one stainless steel oval ring
  • two zip ties
  • an additional stainless steel butterfly bolt snap
  • two elastic hose retainer bands
  • handwritten Thank You card
 
For $25 you can sport your enthusiasm for sidemount diving by wearing the Sublevel Sidemount cavern diving t-shirt.  You will also receive a handwritten Thank You card.      
 

We will appreciate all levels of support.  At the $5 level of support, we will share some Aloha with you by sending you a handwritten Thank You card.  

                              

FAQs

If you have any questions about the HONU that have not been answered above, please ask.  You can email us at randall@sublevelsidemount.com or melissa@sublevelsidemount.com. 

Is there a warranty?

Yes, there is a two-year limited warranty.

What are the dimensions of the HONU?

The height of the bladder is 22 inches.  The butt plate extends the total overall lenght to 28 inches.  The width of is 15 inches.  The bladder has a maximum depth of 3 inches and tapers to one inch at the top of the device. 

How much does the HONU weigh?

6 pounds.

When the HONU is rolled up, what are the dimensions?

15 inches x 9 inches x 4 inches (Length x Width x Depth)

What is the HONU's maximum lift?

27 pounds.

What cylinder configurations can be used with the HONU?

You can easily mount a single steel 100, twin steel 85s, or other steel or aluminum cylinder configurations smaller than twin steel 85s.  I prefer to use twin aluminum 40s for recreational diving.  

What about sizing?  

One size fits most.  This device is not currently offered for small framed persons.  Don’t worry…we will be offering this device for small framed persons in the future.

Thank You!

We really appreciate your support of this campaign!  To date, we have financed this project by our boot straps.  Without your support, we will have really cool sidemount buoyancy compensators for our personal use, but we will not be able to share the HONU with others.  That would be sad.  So, thank you for helping us to share the HONU with other destination divers.  We are looking forward to seeing where the HONU travels to.  It will also be a thrill to dive with other HONU owners.  If you are in the neighborhood, let's go diving!

Not a scuba diver?  

That's okay!  You probably know a scuba diver.  And if you do, chances are they are a destination diver.  If you like what we are trying to do, it would be terrific if you could let your scuba diving friends know about this campaign.  Let us know if you referred someone to us, so that we can Thank You!    

About Sublevel Sidemount, LLC

The managing members of SUBLEVEL SIDEMOUNT, LLC are Randall and Melissa Brown. We are avid travelers with an affinity for beautiful beaches and blue water. Sublevel Sidemount, LLC is an active member of The Diving Equipment and Marketing Association.

story: .

What we are:

KIS® Fashions, LLC started in 2009 by Kelly McDonald of Wabasha, MN,  designs, manufactures and distributes luxury designer KIS® handbags wholesale to boutiques throughout the US.  KIS® is also a vendor for a television shopping network, ShopNBC, selling the KIS® handbags and KIS® apparel items on their website.

The KIS® handbags are made of the finest leathers, so soft to the touch and in vibrant hues.  They're also unique in their design with extraordinary organization options and pockets.

In October of 1990, Kelly McDonald became visually impaired and remained so for over 1 ½ years.  Her sense of touch was heightened, not only to find things but the feel of soft luxury was comforting.  Kelly is a corneal transplant recipient and is grateful for the vision she has today!  Her vision loss is what inspired the search for luxurious leathers and the design of the inside pockets:  A pocket for sunglasses and keys, so they're protected and you can find them easily.

The KIS® logo seeks to empower.  We say its a KIS® Andbag with Purse…sonality.  It’s an Andbag because it’s for Women who want this AND that not this OR that.  And KIS® not only stands for Keep it Simple but also keep it Sexy, Sophisticated, Silly, Sporty, Sassy, Scrumptous, Spectacular, Special, Sleek, Smart, Stylish.

 

Where we are at: 

KIS® has a wonderful working relationship with their factory.  We know the factory, the factory knows us and together we are able to produce beautiful, top quality, handbags.  KIS® rents space from a warehouse in Minnesota where the KIS® inventory is stored .  For a small, per order fee, the warehouse also fulfills orders  and ships the KIS® products out to customers.

KIS® has built a great reputation of being a solid business partner with their customers.  KIS® has received positive reviews and testimonials by the various KIS® end users.

Kelly McDonald has built KIS® Fashions, LLC and where it is today with her own personal funds.  It's a start up business, with enough inventory to see the brand through the holiday selling season, and then we are looking to bring on the new Spring/Summer line.  That's where we need backing.  The money coming in from current sales is going right back into the company for day to day operations of payroll and necessary “set ups” of systems for all aspects of conducting business. 

Now that we know the company and products are working and all entities are in place to make KIS® brand a success, our next step is to bring more attention to KIS® by reaching out to fashion writers to introduce KIS® to a wide audience of women who deserve a KIS®, expand our social media outreach on facebook, twitter, and more.  All these avenues are very little cost, with big rewards down the road.

KIS® needs your support.  We want to grow our business in our beloved community of Wabasha, MN.  Creating jobs, by bringing a unique and ambitious venture to this area is a grand goal but one reaching.  Once we start telling the KIS® story, people will want to get their own KIS® handbag.   if we don't have the inventory – KIS® can fall from the vine.   So, before we reach out and start telling the story, we need to build our inventory – and then there's no end to the KIS® story.

 

Short Summary

KIS® has tried traditional methods of funding-    banks, area organizations, state and federal programs and so much more.  Economically,  things are not as they were a a few years back, so that is why KIS® must reach out with methods for the way things are today.

KIS® has a plan:

It’s important for us here at KIS® that you know we have a long term plan.We have our line of handbags, “Every Woman Deserves A KIS®”, we have an apparel line of all bamboo fabric items, “Get KIS’d”, and we also have developed a line of bed sheets from bamboo fabric, “A KIS® Good Night”. 

The market for our bamboo apparel and bamboo sheets are both growing.  With your support here, these lines will thrive as well. 

With all this, a strong work ethic, ambition by all team members, proficient relationships with large prospective buyers and so many other safeguardsin place KIS® is a company that can grow – we just need your help with getting us to the next level.

Accountibility:

ALL funds will go towards inventory and only the necessities to operate the business – no ifs, ands, or buts!

Follow us on our Facebook page KIS Fashions, LLC.  We will provide updates thru stories, photos, and videos of all that we are doing – also check out our website at: www.kisfashions.com . 

We are thinking BIG – please join us and come along for the ride!  You will feel good helping and watching this new company, in a small town, grow during these challenging economic times.

story:
Hi! I'm Ellia! I design and craft high-fashion bags at accessible prices. I worked as a designer in China for nearly 7 years before finally deciding to come to the United States, study design management and open my own brand. Taking control of not only the quality, but the conditions in which employees work, the materials and creating bags in a safe, ethical way is my ultimate dream. This year I am excited to launch my first original collection: The Geometry Collection.

This collection is inspired by paper sculpture and the interaction of light and form. The possibility of paper inspired me to create something different from the structure of bags; to create something that transcends the tradional handbag styles. 

Each bag was designed from the ground up. I began by studying origami techniques, then design ideas, paper samples, revisions and finally leather samples. Each bag went though a revision process. I made at lease 3 different pattern sets and samples for each in order to tested out the best structure and ensure a look that is unique and functional.

Each of bag is made of high-quality Italian Calf leather. The texture is subtle, creamy and smooth.  It's also strong and durable without being hard to the touch.

I use high quality gold-tone hardware for the whole collection and keep the decor to a minimum. Half-sphere studs are the decoration. Anti-scratch magnetic snaps are extra thin just to match the style. Only non-toxic, water based glues are used in production.

Currently I'm working out of my guest bedroom, and it's stuffed with machines, tools, materials, also the business plans are posted on the wall. Having an actual studio and/or retail space would greatly improve my workflow and facilitate the design process.

I'm working on everything myself: designs, sampling, web design,  marketing, procuring materials, graphic&photos, business planing, packing and shipping, paperwork and everything else that goes into a small business. While there are a tremendous number of very talented people nearby, I can only pay them in handbags at the moment. Many of them have been very generous to donate their time ant their talents, but one of my main goals is to create an ethical work place, and that means hiring people at a fair wage. 

I hope to raise enough money to to take the brand from home-based hobbyist to a real business. To pay the people who helped me so far, hire local crafts people and also add more styles and colors into the collection.

 [ EARLY BIRD ] : All the orders will be delivered to your door at Oct. 2014. 2 colors are available, black&white or pure black. 

[ CHRISTMAS SPECIAL ] : If the project get funded, I will offer more colors (color panel as below) for the christmas special.

The Last Perk is the Collector's Special: The original Geometry collection process book with all the original ideas, researches, sketches and the process of making sample bags.

This page is sooooooo long! but you are here, all the way at the bottom. I want to thank my parents, all my friends and especially you! Without your support I wouldn't have made it this far. If you like this project please share it with your friends and spread the word. Please help me bring these designs to market!

I will do the best to minimize the risks and challenges in this project.

I only offers a limited amount of bags because handcrafted bags take a long time to perfect. The delivering time is spread out over September through December. That gives me enough time to balance all the work.

I plan to hire people from my local community to help me fulfill orders. Living near SCAD I have access to a number of tremendously talented individuals with both the skill and the passion to help me in this endeavor.
story_txt:
Hi! I'm Ellia! I design and craft high-fashion bags at accessible prices. I worked as a designer in China for nearly 7 years before finally deciding to come to the United States, study design management and open my own brand. Taking control of not only the quality, but the conditions in which employees work, the materials and creating bags in a safe, ethical way is my ultimate dream. This year I am excited to launch my first original collection: The Geometry Collection.This collection is inspired by paper sculpture and the interaction of light and form. The possibility of paper inspired me to create something different from the structure of bags; to create something that transcends the tradional handbag styles. Each bag was designed from the ground up. I began by studying origami techniques, then design ideas, paper samples, revisions and finally leather samples. Each bag went though a revision process. I made at lease 3 different pattern sets and samples for each in order to tested out the best structure and ensure a look that is unique and functional.Each of bag is made of high-quality Italian Calf leather. The texture is subtle, creamy and smooth.  It's also strong and durable without being hard to the touch.I use high quality gold-tone hardware for the whole collection and keep the decor to a minimum. Half-sphere studs are the decoration. Anti-scratch magnetic snaps are extra thin just to match the style. Only non-toxic, water based glues are used in production.Currently I'm working out of my guest bedroom, and it's stuffed with machines, tools, materials, also the business plans are posted on the wall. Having an actual studio and/or retail space would greatly improve my workflow and facilitate the design process.I'm working on everything myself: designs, sampling, web design,  marketing, procuring materials, graphic&photos, business planing, packing and shipping, paperwork and everything else that goes into a small business. While there are a tremendous number of very talented people nearby, I can only pay them in handbags at the moment. Many of them have been very generous to donate their time ant their talents, but one of my main goals is to create an ethical work place, and that means hiring people at a fair wage. I hope to raise enough money to to take the brand from home-based hobbyist to a real business. To pay the people who helped me so far, hire local crafts people and also add more styles and colors into the collection. [ EARLY BIRD ] : All the orders will be delivered to your door at Oct. 2014. 2 colors are available, black&white or pure black. [ CHRISTMAS SPECIAL ] : If the project get funded, I will offer more colors (color panel as below) for the christmas special.The Last Perk is the Collector's Special: The original Geometry collection process book with all the original ideas, researches, sketches and the process of making sample bags.This page is sooooooo long! but you are here, all the way at the bottom. I want to thank my parents, all my friends and especially you! Without your support I wouldn't have made it this far. If you like this project please share it with your friends and spread the word. Please help me bring these designs to market!


I will do the best to minimize the risks and challenges in this project.
I only offers a limited amount of bags because handcrafted bags take a long time to perfect. The delivering time is spread out over September through December. That gives me enough time to balance all the work.
I plan to hire people from my local community to help me fulfill orders. Living near SCAD I have access to a number of tremendously talented individuals with both the skill and the passion to help me in this endeavor.

story:
Hello there! I'm Karolina and I've dedicated the last few years of my life to sewing bras and knickers.  I just graduated from De Montfort University's Contour Fashion degree - during my time there I started my lingerie brand to help fund my studies. 'Karolina Laskowska' has now been running as a brand for over 2 years - in this time it's been more successful than I could have ever imagined, and now that I'm free of my studies, I would like to take it to the next level.

I have big plans for the brand - currently I'm sewing nearly all of my designs myself, which isn't really the best use of time. I'm pretty much constantly overrun with customer orders, which doesn't really leave time for things like new designs or looking for stockists. I would like that to change.

The Sayuri set from AW14. I'm hoping to repeat these garment shapes but in more affordable fabrics.

My aims for the next year are to get some of my designs into production (especially those pesky wired bras!) and to exhibit at my first trade show and hopefully get my designs into some boutiques around the world - so that people can see and try things on in person, rather than relying on small internet photos!

Unfortunately, to take things to this next level, I need a pretty serious cash injection. I don't qualify for most graduate business schemes as I started my business two years ago, and although I could look for investors, I like that Indiegogo keeps everything within its own community.

Last year I had a successful campaign to raise the funds (£3000) for my first round of manufacturing.  This campaign was an extremely valuable lesson, teaching me many important knicker life skills - one of the biggest that £3000 (plus £2000 of my own money) is not enough to manufacture, photograph and launch a lingerie collection. I was able to have small quantities of my AW13 collection made, with a lot of hurdles along the way. The quantities weren't enough to sustain production, so for the past few months I've had to go back to sewing things myself.

Since my last campaign, I've found a new factory that specialises in lingerie. I want to start by getting a few key styles made there, to help bring down the cost and make my designs more easily accessible. Unfortunately, their minimum order quantities mean that getting just a single bra style sewn would be around 1000 euros. This doesn't even cover material costs (and I tend to use beautiful if a tad expensive fabrics - most of the lace that I use averages around £45/m). Consequently, going into production just isn't possible right now - but it can be with your help. Without the funds that this campaign will raise, I will struggle to make the new collection a reality - there are so many costs to cover that unless you're in the business, you wouldn't even consider.

And more to add to my list of ambitious steps: I'm soon going to be moving out of my room and into an actual studio, plus I'm also going to be exhibiting at my first trade show, The Lingerie Edit, this January. This comes along with its own costs that I'm struggling to afford, but will hopefully be an opportunity to meet new buyers and find new stockists around the world. 

In short: I need your help to push my brand to the next level.  With your money, I'll be able to afford sampling the new collection, pay for the collection photoshoot and retouching, pay for manufacturing costs (including sewing and fabrics), with leftover funds helping to make my first trade show as big a success as possible.

But what will you get in return for your generous contributions?  I have of course devised a whole range of fantastical perks for you to choose from... Limited edition harness and lingerie designs, hefty discounts on new designs, gift cards, post cards, prints and lots more. I'll also be offering my staggeringly popular 'creative freedom' offer - where by paying for the cost of basic bespoke lingerie and leaving all design decisions to me, you'll receive a fantastically unique and intricate set that would normally cost much, much more.

Thank you for reading and I hope that you're able to help me take the next step in my lingerie journey!

PERKS

£5 - BTS Blog access

Once this campaign gains momentum, I'll be launching a special password-access-only blog, documenting my journey in the world of kinky sexy pants of joy for the contributors to this campaign. 

£10 - Kimono silk hair bows


Have you seen any of my MASSIVE collection of vintage kimono silks? I'll be using pieces of these to make cute little hair bow clips, with each one being totally unique! These won't be available once the campaign has finished. 

£15 - postcards & gift card pack

My designs have been included in some absolutely beautiful photoshoots (even if I do say so myself!) - this perk will see you sent a random selection of gorgeous postcard prints, as well as a £5 gift voucher for my online shop and a handwritten thank you!

£35 - Indiegogo frame knicker

Limited edition, just for this campaign - a satin elastic frame knicker (i.e. frontless, backless, crotchless!), with silver toned components and finished with a little beaded charm at the back (depending on the contents of my bead box - likely freshwater pearls!)

£40 - Celestyna harness


A new harness design for next season, featuring symmetrically hand cut eyelash lace and embellished with a satin bow. Will  be using a different style of lace to the prototype but I can safely say that it will still be gorgeous!

£40 - Indiegogo nipple pasties

Whilst I have yet to decide exact design specifics, these nipple pasties will only be available through this campaign. Expect metallic leather and Swarovski crystals!

£65 - Mystery tie side knicker


I'm the first to admit that I'm a total fabric hoarder, but in this instance this can work to your advantage! If you contribute £65 I'll make you a beautiful pair of tie side knickers in one of my many beautiful silks or laces - sumptuously unique underthings only available through this campaign!  The photo above shows just one of the many possibilities...


£65 - Bumper harness pack

Save save save on my best selling designs! For this perk you can choose two out of three harness options to call your own - Kordelia, Lidia or the brand new Celestyna (shown above). These all retail between £40-45 each so you'll be making a significant saving (postage is included!).  

£75 - £100 shop voucher

Pay £75, get £100 to spend in the shop. 'Nuff said.

£100 - Creative freedom knickers 

For £100, I will go crazy and create you some fantastically unique knickers that would normally retail for *well* above £100! And with my expensive tastes in fabrics and Swarovski crystals you're pretty much guaranteed to end up with something exciting...

£115 - Serafina playsuit pre-order

An updated version of the bestselling 'Elzbieta' playsuit, now featuring a built in demi bra... Pre-order at a discounted price (normal retail £150 + p&p) in sheer mesh and stretch lace.  Only 10 of these will be available during this campaign so be quick! 

£200 - Creative freedom bra

Pretty much the same concept as the Creative freedom knickers - a super shiny and unique bra made with delicious fabrics and detailing that would normally cost much, much more.


None of these perks taking your fancy? Have any suggestions? Leave a comment and I'll see if I can accomodate!

story:
Wunsch-Uhr ein Paradies für Uhrenliebhaber.

Ich möchte der Händler für Armbanduhren und Preziosen werden. Ansprechpartner für Fragen rund um Juwelen und Luxusuhren. Vertrauter und Partner meiner Kunden. Ich will den Handel mit getragenen Uhren auf eine neue Ebene bringen. Aufklärungsarbeit leisten und auch für Sammler ein Anlaufpunkt sein. Ich will, das jeder seine Uhr bei mir findet. Berater für geschmackvolle Geschenke sein und helfen die richtige Tresoruhr zu finden.

Ich bin seit Jahrzehnten im Bereich Luxushandel beschäftigt. Habe eine kaufmännische Ausbildung. Besitze mehr als Gemmologische Grundkenntnisse und Bilde mich stetig weiter. Habe Schulungen zur Erkennung von Fälschungen und Merkmalerkennung  von Originalen. Nehme regelmäßig an Tagungen teil und besitze weltweite Kontakte. Bin Mitglied in allen wichtigen Gemeinschaften und habe einen hervorragenden Leumund.

Der Bedarf an Luxusartikeln wird nicht einbrechen.
Für den einen ist es der Wunsch nach einer Rolex, für den anderen eine Wertanlage.

Die Uhren namenhafter Hersteller aus zweiter Hand ist preislich wesentlich Interessanter als ein Neukauf. Viele Wissen diesen Vorteil zu schätzen. Uhren der Hersteller Rolex, Breitling, Cartier, Jaeger LeCoultre, Audemars Piguet, Lange&Söhne usw sind extrem gefragt.

Es gibt im Onlinebereich nur wenige Händler mit namenhafter Größe. Viele kleine und wenig vertrauenswürdige Anbieter machen die Masse aus.
Die meisten Juweliere geben sich in ihrem Bereich um ein Ladengeschäft zufrieden und sind nicht Marktaktiv. So gibt es keinen richtigen aktiven Wettbewerb.

Auch ich stand vor der Frage, wie groß soll die Selbstständigkeit werden. Wie viele Mitarbeiter brauche ich? Wie groß soll das Büro sein? Oder soll es gleich ein Ladengeschäft werden?
Ich habe mich dazu entschlossen, mich voll und ganz auf den Einkauf und Verkauf zu Konzentrieren. Dies hauptsächlich im Bereich Onlinehandel. So werden die Uhren von einem Uhrmachermeister und Juwelier geprüft und ggf. instand gesetzt. Ein Goldschmiedemeister kümmert sich um die Preziosen und die Aufarbeitung der Uhren. So entstehen keine Personalkosten und auch keine Ausfälle, welches für mich besonders in der Anlaufphase wichtig ist.

Auch in Zukunft wird es wohl Bedarf an Luxusuhren geben. Gedanklich möchte ich am Onlinehandel festhalten und diesen Bereich weiter ausbauen und durch Dienstleistungen erweitern. Wie man in 4 bis 5 Jahren sich orientiert und ob man sich doch durch ein Ladengeschäft örtlich bindet und sein Portfolio erweitert oder eine exclusive Einkaufslounge im Bürobereich schafft ist noch nicht ganz greift. 

Eindeutige Zielsetzung ist eine Monopolstellung im Onlinehandel.

Gerne sende ich Ihnen einen ausgearbeiteten Businessplan.

Für Ihre Fragen und Anregungen stehe ich Ihnen gerne zur Verfügung.


Desire-Watches a paradise for watch enthusiast.

 I would like to be the dealer for watches and jewels. Contact for questions about jewelry and luxury watches. Confidant and partner of my clients. I want to bring trade in worn watches to a new level. Raise awareness and be a starting point for collectors. I want that everyone finds his watch with me. His advisor for tasteful gifts and help to find the right Tresoruhr.

I'm busy in the luxury trade for decades. Have a business education. Gemmological have more than basic knowledge and picture me constantly. Have training counterfeit detection and feature detection of originals. I regularly take part in conferences and possess worldwide contacts. I'm a member of all major communities and have an excellent reputation.

The demand for luxury goods will not break.

For some it is the desire for a Rolex, for others a store of value.

The watches from renowned manufacturers from second hand is priced much more interesting than purchasing a new one. Many knowledge really appreciate this feature. Watches manufacturer Rolex, Breitling, Cartier, Jaeger LeCoultre, Audemars Piguet, Lange & Söhne etc are extremely in demand.

There are only a few in the online sector traders from renowned size. Many small and not very trustworthy vendors make the mass.

Most jewelers give in their area to a retail store and are not satisfied active market. So there is no real active competition.

I also had to decide how big you want the independence to be. How many people do I need? How big is the office be? Or should it be equal to a shop?

I have decided to me. Fully on the purchase and sale to Focus This mainly in online trading. Thus, the watches are checked by a master watchmaker and jeweler and if necessary repaired. A goldsmith takes care of the gems and reclamation of watches. So there are no staff costs and no failures, which is important to me, especially in the start-up phase.

In the future it will probably be a need for luxury watches. Mentally, I want to hold on to online trading and expand this area and extend through services. How is oriented in 4 to 5 years and whether it locally attached by a shop and expanded its portfolio or creates an exclusive shopping Lounge in the office sector is not yet fully engages.

Clear objective is a monopoly in online trading.

I would be happy to send you an elaborate business plan.

For questions and comments, I will be happy to help.
