story:
The NOWA Watch has already achieved its funding goal on Kickstarter. The Shaper collection is now available here InDemand  to encourage pledges at limited discount prices. The watches will be produced and shipped to all backers worldwide by August 2017.

 

 

 

“The Shaper by NOWA is a smartwatch that looks like a classic timepiece” 

Lulu Chang, Digital trends

“The NOWA Shaper is a more traditional hybrid smartwatch that takes a classic mechanical watch design and subtly sneaks in a few extra smarts”

Chaim Gartenberg, The Verge

“Shaper is a great looking traditional watch with essential smartwatch features”

Synthesis, Gracious Watch

“A skinny hybrid watch that keeps things simple”

Sophie Charara, Wareable

"$65,898 pledged, 188% funded, 480 backers"

Kickstarter

 

Watch the VIDEO from iReviewWatches

Pilot run working sample full review

 

 

We are an independent brand with a design studio located in the creative heart of Paris.

In an era of bulky wearables and connected watches, NOWA retains a particularly elegant and minimalist touch with the launch of Shaper.

We are pleased to introduce our first collection of inspired watches for active men and women who travel, work and embrace life! 

NOWA redefines watchmaking standards and smartwatches with the slimmest intelligent watch ever made!

 

 

 

No matter where you go, NOWA conveniently adjusts to your time zones. The NOWA watch always displays the precise time for your location, anywhere in the world! It automatically syncs the watch hands to the time zone of your phone.

 

 

Watch the VIDEO

How to connect your watch for the first time!

 

 

The NOWA watch is beautiful and connects to your smartphone for automatic time zones, activity, sleep tracking, and more. No charging is required.

PUT ON YOUR WATCH, PACK YOUR THINGS AND GO ANYWHERE!

 

 

 

The NOWA watch tracks and records your activity (steps, distance and calories burned) and sleep quality for a healthier lifestyle! Results are recorded and displayed in a simple, useful calendar for goal tracking. 

 

Your fitness data will be automatically recorded in your fitness secured cloud: Apple Health or Google Fit.

 

 

When receiving a call, you are notified by a discrete light flash on your watch. You can immediatly reject the call by a short push on the crown.

The NOWA watch also helps you to take distant photos, for the convenience of perfect selfies with friends!Open the camera using the app and push the crown to take a shot!

If you can't find your phone, double push on the crown to make it ring within the bluetooth range.

 

 

The NOWA Shaper watch is beautiful and smart. It connects to your smartphone for automatic time zones, activity tracking, and more.

 

 

The NOWA watch works up to 8 months on a single standard CR2025 battery and does things that other traditional vintage style watches can't do!

 

 

 NOWA Watch App is already on App store and Google Play.

 

 

NOWA watch bands are made of genuine italien leather with nubuck lining (or striped nylon with calf leather lining). As a result, the watch sits on your wrist like a second skin. 

 

Each NOWA strap features quick-release pins for easy replacement! If you want to mix and match from the strap your NOWA Shaper comes with, buy an Additional Strap pledge and go wild!

 

Finding his inspiration in the Contemporary Decorative Arts, Eric Gizard designed the Shaper collection with the desire for the perfect balance between beautiful and technical.

 

 

The simplicity of the watch face, the slim case for practical, comfortable daily wear and the understated yet refined look have made the NOWA watch a unique timepiece that is the very definition of excellence. 

 

 

Less is more. A classically designed watch reimagined for modern lifestyles. NOWA is fashionable beauty that fits any style.

 

Just 9.75mm Thick

 

People like us are already wearing the NOWA watch! 

 

 

NOWA Shaper is more than just a timepiece, it is a work of art that pays respect to the traditions of watchmaking. 

NOWA watches are crafted using only the finest materials and unwavering attention to detail: Swiss parts movement, Italian calf leather strap, durable stainless steel and Sapphire coated glass…

 

 

 

Simply the best minimalist watch under $150! 

 

The Shaper watch is a simple yet clever hybrid smartwatch that elegantly combines fashion and technology. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
Product specifications:
 
  • Minimalist world traveler watch
  • Designed by Eric Gizard and powered by Smartime
  • Genuine Italian Leather strap with Nubuck lining
  • Striped fabric strap with genuine leather lining
  • 20mm width at lugs - Interchangeable strap
  • Fits any wrist from 165 mm to 215 mm circumference
  • Ronda Swiss Parts Quartz movement (2 hands)
  • 40 mm diameter analog watch, 9.75 mm thickness
  • 316L stainless steel case - silver finish - 3 ATM water resistance
  • Flat mineral glass with sapphire coating for better durability
  • GMT watch: Automatic time zone sync to phone
  • Activity tracker watch (steps, distance and calories burned) 
  • Sleep quality monitoring
  • Camera control for selfies
  • Call notifications through the light indicator at 12 o'clock
  • Reject call at a push of the crown
  • Find your phone at a double push of the crown
  • Connects wirelessly to smartphone for Settings and Activity History
  • One week memory without having to sync to the NOWA Watch app 
  • Connect to Apple Health and Google Fit
  • Compatible with IOS8 / Android 4.3 and above versions
  • CR2025 - 8 months battery life under normal use. No charging required
  • CE, FCC and RoHS certified - smartwatch 2017

 

 
Every NOWA watch is created without compromise and engraved with a unique identifying serial number.
 
 
We are proud to cooperate with Cypheme, a talented French startup that specializes in unfalsifiable authentification digital solutions. Using Cypheme authentification technology, you can now be assured that all watches from NOWA are genuine and authorized.
 
 
 
 
 
Shaper watch works up to 8 months on a standard CR2025 watch battery. NOWA watch does not need to be charged. To replace the battery, take your NOWA to a qualified specialist. It will cost you $5 to $10 for replacement.
 
 
 
 

The Shaper collection is NOW ready and under intensive evaluation by reviewers, influencers, journalists and fans.

The most difficult processes are done : Product design, factory tooling, iOS & Android apps and packaging are all completed.  We just shipped the first 100 pieces pilot run to journalists, reviewers and influencers. 

 
 
 
 
 

The NOWA Circle of Excellence is a free community of watch enthusiasts sharing their passion for perfection, travel and life. 

 
 

 

Join us and share your life's journeys within the NOWA Circle using the hashtag #NOWAWATCH.

 
 
 

Please check our FAQ at the top of the page. 

If you can’t find your answer, email us HERE.

 
FAQs

 

Q: I live outside USA. Can I order a NOWA watch?

A: Yes, we ship worldwide.

 

Q: How long is the watch warranty?

A: The NOWA watch comes with a limited 1 year warranty. Any issue, contact us at contact@nowa.watch.

 

Q: Does the price include import duty and VAT?

A: No, the import duty and VAT are not included in the price! We are delivering the NOWA watch worldwide from our HK warehouse to your door at our cost except duty or tax of importing country. 

 

Q: What's the battery model and life?

A: The NOWA watch is powered with a single standard CR2025 e-cell and can work for 6 to 8 months in normal conditions of use. The NOWA watch does not need to be charged.

 

Q: How often and how do I change the battery?

A: The NOWA watch runs up to 8 months with a standard CR2025 e-cell. You just need to go to any watch shop and ask them to replace the battery like for any other slim quartz watch with clipped case back.

 

Q: How wide is the watch strap?

A: The strap width at lugs is 20 mm. It features quick release bars for easy replacement.

 

Q: Can I change the watch strap?

A: You can easily change the strap without using any tool.  Each NOWA band features a quick release spring bar for easy replacement.

 

Q: What is the size of NOWA shaper?

A: The strap width at lugs is 20 mm. It features quick release bars for easy replacement.

 

Q: What is the size of NOWA shaper?

A: The NOWA watch diameter is 40 mm for a thickness of 9.75.mm. The NOWA watch is the slimmest hybrid watch ever made, perfect for men and women.

 

Q: How does the NOWA Shaper watch connects to my phone?

A: The NOWA Shaper watch uses Bluetooth Low Power (4.0) to connect and sync to the NOWA Watch app. The NOWA watch app is free in Google play and App store. 

 

Q: Does the NOWA Shaper watch features a LCD screen?

A: No, the NOWA Shaper watch does not have any LCD. The NOWA Shaper has a classic analog face.  All information are displayed and available in the NOWA watch app.  

 

Q: Does the NOWA Shaper watch features phone notifications? 

A: The NOWA watch features call notification through lighting. When receiving a call, you can reject by pushing the crown.

The NOWA watch doesn't feature other notifications except for call. We minimized the smart features to achieve the slimmest hybrid watch ever made.

Important note: The NOWA watch doesn't have a vibrator.

 

Q: Is it necessary for the watch to be connected with the phone all the time?

A: The NOWA watch connects to your phone for using smart features : time setting, automatic time zone, daily goal setting camera control, call notification but also to download activity and sleep tracking data to your phone. 
You don't need to connect your watch to your phone all the time. When the NOWA is disconnected from your phone, it works like all other watches with quartz movement.

 

Q: Is the NOWA Shaper watch waterproof?

A: The NOWA watch is 30 m waterproof. 3 ATM water resistance. 

Important note: For sport & fitness use, we recommend to switch the original leather strap by a 100% fabric nato strap.

 

Q: Does the NOWA Shaper watch & app connect to other fitness apps?

A: Yes, the NOWA watch app can connect with Health-kit and google fit. When syncing your watch to NOWA Watch app for downloading your fitness data, it will be automatically recorded in your fitness cloud.

 

Q: Does the watch has memory to collect activity and sleep data when it is not paired with the app?

A: Yes, the watch can record your fitness data during about one week without having to connect and sync to your phone.

The NOWA Watch has already achieved its funding goal on Kickstarter. The Shaper collection is now available here InDemand  to encourage pledges at limited discount prices. The watches will be produced and shipped to all backers worldwide by August 2017.   “The Shaper by NOWA is a smartwatch that looks like a classic timepiece” Lulu Chang, Digital trends“The NOWA Shaper is a more traditional hybrid smartwatch that takes a classic mechanical watch design and subtly sneaks in a few extra smarts”Chaim Gartenberg, The Verge“Shaper is a great looking traditional watch with essential smartwatch features”Synthesis, Gracious Watch“A skinny hybrid watch that keeps things simple”Sophie Charara, Wareable"$65,898 pledged, 188% funded, 480 backers"Kickstarter Watch the VIDEO from iReviewWatchesPilot run working sample full review  We are an independent brand with a design studio located in the creative heart of Paris.In an era of bulky wearables and connected watches, NOWA retains a particularly elegant and minimalist touch with the launch of Shaper.We are pleased to introduce our first collection of inspired watches for active men and women who travel, work and embrace life! NOWA redefines watchmaking standards and smartwatches with the slimmest intelligent watch ever made!   

No matter where you go, NOWA conveniently adjusts to your time zones. The NOWA watch always displays the precise time for your location, anywhere in the world! It automatically syncs the watch hands to the time zone of your phone.

story:
ZOURI is an eco-vegan footwear project that uses plastic trash from the Portuguese coast in the production of a sneakers collection.  

 

 

 

 

ECO-VEGAN & ORGANIC SNEAKERS

Over the last two years, Zouri worked and researched for the best eco-friendly and vegan materials.

The plastic trash is being transformed into raw material, mixed with natural materials like organic cotton, natural rubber and pineapple leaves fabric - Pinatex.  

All raw materials are sustainable.  The natural rubber and organic cotton are completely natural and organic. We wanted since the beginning to step aside from microfibers, leather and synthetics. 

Now we are presenting the MOST ECOLOGICAL AND VEGAN SNEAKERS EVER MADE.

All models are made with organic cotton, natural rubber, Pinatex (pineapple leaves fibers fabric) and plastic litter from the ocean. Plastic collected April 2018, Esposende Portugal by 600 volunteers.

Comfortable and Stylish Vegan Sneakers  

Sizes: 35-45

 

PLASTIC FREE MOVEMENT

Together with local organizations and volunteers, we are collecting plastic debris from our ocean and beaches. With the first clean up initiative, we collected 1,5 tons of plastic debris in 11 beaches of Esposende, Portugal. 

 

ETHICAL & FAIRTRADE

It is in the heart of Portugal, Guimarães, that all ZOURIs are produced. Fair and Ethical production.

Our factory in Guimarães guarantees that every pair of sneakers has the same detail and perfection. When you receive your sneakers you will see a letter with all the materials used in the sneakers, quantities, and location of plastic also the name of the persons that made your Zouri.

 

HOW TO CHOOSE SIZE

A. Put a sheet of paper on the floor and place it so that one end touches a wall.

B. Put your foot on the sheet making sure that the heel is against the wall.

C. Mark where your foot ends.

D. Measure with a ruler in cm. the distance between the heel and the tip.

E. With the measurement look at our table to know what is your perfect size.

 

YOUR SUPPORT IS IMPORTANT.

We are starting the production and we need to invest in materials and support the costs of transportation of the plastic litter from the beaches.

We offer a special product price for everyone who supports ZOURI in this phase.

story:
Why?

  • The weight room is getting dated
  • We need better equipment to get better
  • We need new equipment to increase our safety

How?

  •  It builds a communitee when people lift together
  • It helps keep people out of trouble
  • It lets you set goals and strive to achieve them
  • It helps everybody live longer because they learn to stay active
  • It lets people try something they might enjoy

As a student athlete I’ve seen first-hand the importance of the weight room in both academics and in athletics. I’ve gained many friends in the weight room from all sports, and it has become a community. Being in the weight room teaches you life lessons like drive and how to deal with your emotions. Personally, the weight room helps clear my mind and focus my anger into something positive. Being active keeps kids out of trouble and be in a safe place. Physical activity is also strongly associated with academics; as proven by Dr. Amika Singh. She concluded that increased daily exercise “1. Increased blood and oxygen flow to the brain. 2. Increased levels of norepinephrine and endorphins resulting in a reduction of stress and improvement of mood. 3. Increased growth factors that help to create new nerve cells and support synaptic plasticity.” It can be concluded that an increase in exercise increases brain function and produces increased academic success.

Augusta High School is located in rural Wisconsin in an area with few resources outside of the school district for athletes to improve on their skills and techniques. It is a low income area where 53.8% of the 160 students qualify for free or reduced meals. Many students also lack transportation and are unable to get the 30 minutes to the nearest quality weight room. Our current weight room is out dated! We are in need of new weights, benches, bars, etc.  With this equipment the weight room would be a safer and better place to grow as a student and an athlete. We would be very grateful for any donations.

story:
Hey Indiegogo! 

We are here because we need your help to promote, sustain, and develope our student-run business. Students around the country have the right to ethical fashion, and need to learn about what socially responsible fashion means. We are here to fulfill this mission. 

Come check out our website!

About Us

We are a student-owned business based on the Georgetown University Campus. We are not affiliated with the University. However, we are committed to bringing affordable, socially responsible and ethical fashion apparel to Georgetown. We are also committed to educating the Georgetown community about why these issues are important.

Below you can see some Georgetown Students rocking their Bureh Belts, one of the products that we offer. 


Who Do We Work With?

We are currently partnered with three companies: Bureh Belts, Lallitara Apparel, and Jamela Oil. We work closely with these companies that all embody the ideals, characteristics and social responsibility that Hoya Storefront strives to bring to our consumers. These companies support the economies of low-income countries, provide fair wages, and give their employees sustainable career paths. We look forward to developing additional partnerships as we grow. 

What's Our Mission?

Our main goal is to test and develop a sustainable business model that can be replicated on university campuses nationwide. We want to give other students the tools and guidance we have discovered in order to distribute socially responsible products to their peers, thus creating and sharing prosperity in low income countries. 

We are committed to helping the communities in which our products are sourced. The companies we work with are hand selected to represent the highest quality products with the greatest positive social impact. With this model, our customers can feel comfortable that what they purchase will not only look great, but will also make the world a better place.

Where Will Your Money Go?

Your money will be seen by everyone on the Georgetown campus—in the form of promotions, advertisements and new merchandise. 

Not only will your donation help us to pay for our website and the different promotional materials we need to continue spreading our name around campus, it will also go towards purchasing more products for us to have in stock on campus. This money will also give us the ability to host talks and events for Georgetown students where we can have guest lecturers talk with students about the importance of socially responsible fashion. We look forwarding to having the ability to begin our own Hoya Storefront Lecture Series. 


Meet Our Team

Jacob Maxmin—CEO and Founder. Jake is from rural Maine and is an undergraduate at Georgetown University.


Joy Jackson—Director of Social Media Outreach, Promotions Planning, and Activities Manager. Joy is from Georgia and is an undergraduate at Georgetown University. 


Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please share our campaign!
  • Like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter! Social media is the best way to get our name out there and find new companies to partner with.

Thank you so much Indiegogo!

Joy is from Georgia and is an undergraduate at Georgetown University. Other Ways You Can Help
Please share our campaign!
Like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter! Social media is the best way to get our name out there and find new companies to partner with.
Thank you so much Indiegogo!

story:
Craft Tales

A failed romance with a Spaniard left me with a pair of sandals on my feet. And this is how I discovered the abarcas in all their pleasant comfort. 

Abarcas are traditional Spanish peasant sandals made from leather with recycled rubber soles originally handmade in the Balearic Islands. Today they are deeply rooted in Spanish culture with even members of the Spanish royal family sporting them.

Taking the abarca as the starting point and experimenting with the front leather part gave birth to five KINA sandal styles: UNO, DOS, TRES, CUATRO and CINCO (numbers one to five in Spanish). 

DOS, the traditional abarca, tells the story of handcrafted inspiration. The collections of DOS styles are the Kina VOYAGE lines.
UNO, TRES, CUATRO and CINCO are trendy redesigns of the basic style. 

All sandals are handmade in Spain with hand-worked fabrics from different parts of the world, and Spanish quality leathers and raw materials. But most importantly, they're made by master artisans devoted to pursuing excellency in their crafts.

With almost ten years of experience in the field of fashion, I have designed and managed the production of bags and belts of renown Lebanese-American designer Johnny Farah, as well as createdKinza Designs, my own belt brand.

Over those years I have developed a passion for crafts and a genuine concern for their disappearance, which led me to collaborate with talented artisans to create KinaMania, a brand rooted in craftsmanship and cultural heritage. 

  • Voyage to Spain is a collaboration with the prestigious Spanish tailor of bullfighters, Daniel Roqueta (established since 1984) > picture on the left.
  •  Voyage to the Orient/Embroidery is a collaboration with Inaash association for the preservation of the rich heritage of Palestinian embroidery (established since 1974) > middle picture.
  • Voyage to the Orient/Crochet is a collaboration with L’Artisan Du Liban for the safeguard of Lebanon’s cultural heritage (established since 1979) > picture to the right.
  • All Kina sandals are handmade in Spain by artisans specialized in making the abarca, and wherever the uppers of the Voyage lines are made, they are sent to Spain where the sandals are constructed.

And here I am today asking for your support through the Indiegogo platform to
help Kina sandals take their first steps, and make all those Voyage collaborations and more come to life. 

I need your help to:

Stores start putting spring/summer 2015 footwear on their racks as early as February, and store buyers make their purchases between June and September for delivery in February 2015. We will be presenting KinaMania sandals to boutiques and department stores during that term, and the product alone is not enough. We need to:
  • Create the packaging design
  • Create display items
We have unusual yet simple designs that we would love to have on time for the meetings. The packaging is also a must for the online sales, starting from the Indiegogo campaign.

Other many reasons why we need your help:
  • to place an order of sandals to launch KinaMania's online sales
  • to carry out the next KinaMania Voyage lines
  • to set up a KinaMania office/showroom
  • to rent a space at a trade show during fashion week in September
The list is endless for a start-up, and whatever funding you help us raise will be like a breath of fresh air.

To support ​the launch of KinaMania​, your contribution can range from $10 to $450. ​In return, you could get a shout-out on facebook, a pair of Kinas, ​​a
Kina beach bag, or support our next Voyage​.​ Check out the 'perks' to the right side of the page.
 
*Pictures of the perks are also available in the gallery tab. For any extra information on the perks, don't hesitate not even for a second to send us an email at info@kinasandals.com, or a message on kina's facebook page.

You can always visit www.kinasandals.com for clear product pictures, and the our photo gallery for lifestyle pictures.

The Impact

If you consider as much as we KinaManiacs do, that cultural heritage is transmitted through crafts, and that it is important that our generation acquires the wealth of knowledge and skills from their elders: Help KinaMania raise the visibility of craftsmanship.

>> By putting crafts in the spotlight and on the global fashion industry map, you'd help safeguard cultural heritage and time-honored skills and ensure the well-being of artisans.

Other Ways You Can Help

Any contribution is welcome!   

Help us spread the word by sharing it along with the Indiegogo link on your social media. Talk about the brand to your entourage. And if you know of any journalists or bloggers, tell them about the KinaMania story.

Follow KinaMania on Instagram

Follow KinaMania on Facebook

Follow KinaMania on Youtube

Email us at info@kinasandals.com

story:
Short Summary

Today the USA Olympic Hockey Team was announced. I am so proud of my little cousin, Kacey Bellamy, earning her second trip to represent team USA in the Olympic games. My wife and I designed and manufactured these sweater that are reminiscent of the Olympic hockey jerseys from the 1980's. They are a lightweight wool/poly blend. We have copper reinforced rings to support the draw string. The sweater has an over-sized hood comfortable for any size hood (even with a hat on). We will have sizes Small-XXL.

When will the good come in?

SWEATERS-Manufacturing clothing requires a minimum amount to produce. We have ordered and are expected to pick up our bulk next week. We will be able to distribute these so everyone will have them in time for the Olympic games. 

WE HAVE SOLD OUT OF OUR CURRENT STOCK AND HAVE MORE SWEATERS CURRENTLY BEING MANUFACTURED.


TANKS (the white ones only)  & HATS- These are already in and ready to go!


Size Chart on Sweaters:



A Large Portion of the Funds...

From these awesome sweaters will be going to the Bellamy family to help minimize the financial burden as they travel to Sochi, Russia next month to support their daughter and the rest of team USA!

Shipping

Shipping within the USA is free. Please ask about international shipping costs.

story:
BLACK BOX DRIVING FREEDOM PROJECT

I own a small business, AIRMIKA, Inc., located in the Sandhills region of North Carolina.  We make the AUTOcyb™ – the automotive cyber security lock.  Our product was recently chosen as a 2013 Technovation Selectee at the Consumer’s Electronics CEweek in NYC.

I'm also a global expert in automotive black box technologies and advocate for fair usage.

My goal is to build this company at meteorite speed by offering crowdsharing donors the product and using the funds to manufacture and market additional units. 

THE ISSUE

The U.S. is proposing mandating automotive black boxes, commonly termed ‘event data recorders’ (EDRs) in cars and light trucks by September 2014, that you cannot turn-off, disable, or remove. 

The information collected may include a vehicle's speed and acceleration, whether air bags were deployed, if brakes were applied, and whether seat belts were engaged. 

Even if they do not proceed with federal regulation, the USA Today recently reported that more than 130 million vehicles are now equipped with EDRs and 96% of all new vehicles would come standard with an EDR.  

Overall, privacy and consumer protection is woefully lacking and we’re doing something about this right now, not waiting for Congress, Federal regulators or State legislators  to act (if at all). 

When you purchase a vehicle you own more than just the vehicle – you own the electronic data the vehicle creates and stores. No amount of legal sophistry will undermine this right if it is properly executed.  We provide a means for vehicle owner’s to rightfully do so.

WHY YOU NEED THIS PRODUCT

Your vehicle's cyber security is important.  From the standpoint of consumer protection most consumers are unaware that their vehicles are recording data that not only may be used to aid vehicle and highway safety analysis, but also has the potential of being used against them in civil and criminal legal proceedings, or by their insurer to determine rates.

Increasingly data from black boxes have been used in court cases nationwide, including ones dealing with vehicular homicide in which speed was an issue.

OUR SOLUTION

The vehicle owner can control access to this data, to prevent tampering and misuse with a simple, inexpensive  product, the AUTOcyb™ – the world’s first automotive cyber security lock, a vehicle connector lockout to safeguard access to in-vehicle electronics networks. 

The AUTOcyb™ is U.S. patented and globally standardized by the world's largest professional organization, the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) as IEEE-1616a.

This device helps to protect you against unlawful search and seizure and furthermore demonstrates that the vehicle owner is actively exerting an expectation of privacy. 

Our product is designed for post-1996 light vehicles (cars and light trucks) that contain a Diagnostic Link Connector (DLC) which is accessible and in good working condition.

It attaches to the vehicle’s DLC, normally located under the dash, and can be removed for vehicle maintenance, inspection, or emissions testing.

This connector lockout gives the reassurance of knowing that you have control of crash data access. The black box / EDR will still work exactly as it is designed to.

You determine when and who sees the data (within State law) and thus, control how it is used.

The AUTOcyb™ is simple to install and remove and protects the security, integrity and authenticity of the data. 

You hold the key, not automakers, law enforcement or insurance companies.

If others want to access your crash data they will have to seek your permission or use legal process to do so.  Basically, this device protects your interests.

WHAT WE NEED FOR OUR COMPANY AND WHAT YOU GET FOR DONATING

I have tooling to manufacture 800,000 units but need funding for materials.  

3900 units are ready to ship. All we need is your pledge and address.

The initial 3900 donors of $33.00 to this project will receive one (1) AUTOcyb™ - Automotive Cyber Security Lock.   I will ship by September 10, 2013 USPS First Class in the USA. 

The product currently does not ship outside the USA. 

I offer a postcard thank you perk for $10 and product perks based on 1 each-$33, 2 each-$66, 3 each-$99 donations.

If the project exceeds the 3900 stock inventory I will send these donors a product as soon as it is manufactured.

story:
Hi there, my name is Ron Woodleigh and back in 2007 my dear friend Mike came up with a very unique concept for an Automatic Fish Catcher and we now need your HELP to Officially launch the product and support Manufacturing, which is now in place to commence. PLEASE NOTE: this is nothing like the product commonly known as the Yo-Yo

A Proto-Type was produced and taken to the International Inventors Convention in GENEVA where we won the Gold Medal.

Due to the response we received, and as I was a Design Engineer I took up the project with 100% commitment to Design and Develop it into a fully functional product, in the beginning using a Poly Styrene Float and a Lead Sinker at the base to keep it upright.

 With completion of the first batch of product toward the end of 2007 I then proceeded to carry out extensive Market Research Internationally, One to establish a need for the product and second to establish the reliability of the product.

It proved overwhelming successful in that during the 24 month campaign we Unexpectedly sold over 20,000 pieces with a 95% success rate,  and having no returns or Warranty to this date. (Which helped Fund us in bringing the product to this stage).

During the course of my Research I found that we could be vulnerable Environmentally with using Poly Styrene and Lead (especially around Children) so I proceeded to Re-Design and Manufacture Dies & Tooling for an Injection Moulded Float and a Bronze Sinker to the base of the unit. Other unique changes and settings were applied also (Undisclosed), to further ensure the efficiency and reliability of The Fisherman's Mouse Trap.

We have developed the product primarily for the Social Fishing Market, and especially for Mom & the Kids, who have difficulty from time to time in jagging a Fish the conventional way and all of a sudden can participate as a Family on Fishing outings, enjoying each others company,  even though we have had some Professional Fishermen trying the product with great success.

The Fisherman's Mouse Trap has not just been designed for surface fishing, and with the S/Steel Trace Line at the TOP allows for a Sinker to be attached to do Bottom Fishing.

Please view our Website at www.fishermansmousetrap.com for more detailed information on the one and only Fisherman's Mouse Trap which is protected by Patent and Registered Trade Mark.

  DON'T FORGET TO CLICK ON OTHER VIDEO'S ON THE GALLERY LINK ABOVE

story:
Short Summary

Hi All, my name is Ellen Wagner. I am originally from St. Louis, Mo., but left at the age of 17 to attend Clark Atlanta University in Atlanta, majoring in Fashion Design/Merchandising. Shortly after that, I went back to art school to study Art Direction at Creative Circus in Atlanta, which eventually led me to New York. I worked in Advertising for about 7 years full-time until I realized that I wasn't truly fulfilling my dream. That's when I took a leap of faith, and decided to focus on fashion and design. My brand name is Eldenwa Designs and I specialize in handmade fabric accessories made from recycled (up-cycled) jersey cotton.  I make every single piece myself by hand, and all of my designs are available in a large range of colors and color combinations, which makes my collections very unique.

My mission is to provide high-end fashion that is attainable for everyone... I am making something beautiful and unique out of one of the most basic staples in every ones wardrobe, a t shirt! I am taking something that is no longer wanted and turning it into a beautiful FUNctional piece of art.

This campaign will provide me with the funding I need to really take my brand to the next level so that I can move from a one-woman-show, to a small sustainable design company. I have so many design ideas that I have not been able to share with the world simply because I do not have a team to help me with production and the day to day work that comes along with running a successful business. 

Give a little...Get a lot!

My goal is to raise $10,000.  With these funds, I will be able to hire staff to help with production design and inventory. I will also be able to purchase equipment/materials needed in addition to being able to expand in other categories such as clothing.

Here's a high-level break down of the use of funds ~

Equipment: Dress-forms, sewing machines, tools, and tables

Rental Space: I want to rent out a small space for production of goods. I have out grown my apartment ;) therefore; I need a designated area for production.

Staff: I would like to hire 2 staff members. A designer to help with production and an executive asst./social media guru to help with the day to day routine such as inventory, emails, and social media.

If for some reason I do not raise all the money that is needed, whatever funds that are raised will go towards acquiring some of the equipment I will need to gear up larger scale productions of Eldenwa Designs, as well as acquiring a design asistant.

To thank you for your help, I plan to offer some awesome deals and gifts from Eldenwa Designs. You can check out some of the styles in my photo gallery to get a better idea. Stand out in the crowd, and help me to bring more sustainable unique fashions to the world!!! 

The Impact

They say one man's trash is another man's treasure...I never knew how true that statement was until I started Eldenwa Designs. I stated earlier that I make all of my designs from recycled jersey cotton. I want to go into a little more detail about this process. I basically deconstruct t-shirts and I use every single piece of fabric from the collar to the base seam of the shirt. The more I started creating, the more I realized I needed more resources for shirts, but I wanted to keep it all recycled and I knew I had limited capital.  So I had to come up with a way to get the materials I needed at the lowest price possible… then I had an AHA moment.

 After making my first piece from scraps of t-shirts, I knew I could use them as a fabric source for all my accessories. What better place to get t-shirts you are going to cut up anyway but thrift stores. I did my research and found out where all the Salvation Army locations were in the city. I found them to be a gold mine for fabric with a wide range of colors and sizes. The possibilities were endless. The most amazing thing about it is that I would find brand new shirts in bulk. It’s basically the first place people drop of the leftovers from there family reunion shirts and work picnics. Needless to say this became my new favorite store. Not only was I able to bring costs down significantly, I am also able to call my product eco-friendly because of the recycled fabrics. This approach also makes my brand economically friendly; because of the low overhead, I can keep my price point as an independent designer at attainable prices for everyone. WIN WIN!!

Your contributions will help me to bring more of my sustainable eco-friendly creations out to the world on a larger scale. Remember, Green is the new Black!!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Just spreading the word about my campaign can help tremendously. So please pass this along and remember to use the share tool!  Every little bit helps.

THANKS AGAIN!!!

I stated earlier that I make all of my designs from recycled jersey cotton. I want to go into a little more detail about this process. I basically deconstruct t-shirts and I use every single piece of fabric from the collar to the base seam of the shirt. The more I started creating, the more I realized I needed more resources for shirts, but I wanted to keep it all recycled and I knew I had limited capital.  So I had to come up with a way to get the materials I needed at the lowest price possible… then I had an AHA moment.
 After making my first piece from scraps of t-shirts, I knew I could use them as a fabric source for all my accessories. What better place to get t-shirts you are going to cut up anyway but thrift stores. I did my research and found out where all the Salvation Army locations were in the city. I found them to be a gold mine for fabric with a wide range of colors and sizes. The possibilities were endless. The most amazing thing about it is that I would find brand new shirts in bulk. It’s basically the first place people drop of the leftovers from there family reunion shirts and work picnics. Needless to say this became my new favorite store. Not only was I able to bring costs down significantly, I am also able to call my product eco-friendly because of the recycled fabrics. This approach also makes my brand economically friendly; because of the low overhead, I can keep my price point as an independent designer at attainable prices for everyone. WIN WIN!!
Your contributions will help me to bring more of my sustainable eco-friendly creations out to the world on a larger scale. Remember, Green is the new Black!!
 


Other Ways You Can Help
Just spreading the word about my campaign can help tremendously. So please pass this along and remember to use the share tool!  Every little bit helps.
THANKS AGAIN!!!

story:
What is a trip? Going to Hawaii or taking your daily bus? We see every situation in life as an adventure and excuse to live life to the fullest and that's why created Pathfinder.

The sneaker designed for your day to day. You can have a meeting at 12:00, after-work drinks at 7 PM, and catch a red-eye for a weekend getaway.

Pathfinder is designed to be the ultimate footwear companion regardless of the situation. One day or day one. it's up to you.

NEW COLOR ADDED: 

The best features that a sneaker can offer >

> 10 times flexible.

> Water resistant.

> Strong and durable.

> Perfect grip in all situations.

> 20% more breathable than our previous models.

Probably you're wondering what a “All day sneaker” means. 

The concept is easy but also awesome. Imagine a sneaker that you can use at the office while you're having a meeting with your boss and also for those beers with friends after work, a sneaker that can fix no matter the situation with the maximum comfort and the last technology in sports performance, well, that´s Pathfinder.

But this doesn't stop here. This design is the result of the feedback from over 50.000 users that filled out over 25 surveys last year. At Muroexe we love to stay in touch with our community and creating with you.

But, what makes Pathfinder different from other sneakers?

  • First of all, the ultimate knit technology, ultra-breathable but still water repellent.
  • This is not a typical “Quick dry” sneaker, this is a “never wet” sneaker. It repels water in an extraordinary way thanks to the latest technology while keeping the sneaker cool.
  • Antibacterial insole > Because we want to protect all kinds of animal life on earth, but not in our shoes.
  • TPU insole > An improved version of the memory foam technology.Much more durable with high traction and excellent tear resistance.
  • Better EVA outsole > Extremely comfy and ready for any situation with a better cushioning.
  • Anti-slip rubber piece: nothing, even the rain, can stop you now.

Once we collected all the feedback we worked closely with our biomechanical engineering team and that’s how the Pathfinder was born > the ultimate everyday sneaker.

Designing the Pathfinder with eco-friendly materials was always very important to us. Each pair is made from 10 recycled plastic bottles. This is the only planet we can live in.

The material we use is PET > polyethylene terephthalate (yes, we also have some troubles to pronounce it). The plastic is used to make water bottles but also the cover of the toilet paper (disgusting). When recycled, PET goes through a cleaning, grinding, and melting process after that, we can give a second life to this plastic and help to save our planet.

The quality of all this product its simply awesome making each pair of pathfinder the most comfortable and stylish sneaker. Depending on the size, each pair of Pathfinder contains around 10  recycled PET bottles.

Also, the company that is our PET supplier is accredited by the "Recycled Global Standard" certification, this means that all the processes count with the highest standards of quality always working in an eco-friendly way. 

The Pathfinder is 100% vegan PETA approved.

We'll email you a survey after the campaign ends to collect our color and sizing preferences.

NEW COLOR ADDED:

Also, in our Kickstarter project, we designed this technical shoe bag to make even easier your next trip. It's totally breathable but also durable (as our Pathfinder). And yes, 100% animal-free. So now, when you're packing your bag, you will not have to worry about dirtying your fresh clothing (Win win).

 The media are talking about us >

 

You can add any of these awesome extras onto your chosen reward by simply adding the amount of the add-on to your pledge. For example, if the reward you'd like is 3x Pathfinder and you would like to add an extra Container Bag, instead of pledging the normal €229, you would pledge manually €274 (€229 + €45). It's as easy as that! 

The perfect sneaker for the perfect traveler.

The pathfinder has been designed to solve all the problems that a traveler can find on the way. No matter if you're on a weekend getaway or a summer holiday, you will always need the best on your feet: Optimal grip, lightness, breathability, water resistant and of course, comfort > With Pathfinder, we have broken our limits, we have designed the most comfy sneaker in our history.

What is your size?
                    To know what is your size just follow this easy steps.

                    1º Tape a piece of paper down on the floor.
                    2º Place your foot on top of the piece of paper.
                    3º Draw the outline of your foot all the way around.
                    4º Mark the length and width.
                    5º You got it! Now you´re ready to select your size!

We believe that good work conditions makes good products. That´s why we choose our factories caring about everything. Our people means the world to us.

The materials are also something that we take it seriously. We select our materials with the latest features in sports performance. We build the footwear of the future.

Muroexe was born in September 2013. Today we are a team of more than 20 people in addition to an extensive network of collaborators that include agents, distributors, photographers, communicators and brand ambassadors scattered throughout the world.

Our values > The balance between functionality and aesthetics.

Simplicity and minimalism, because we believe that less is more. We believe that it helps us to create the best product by incorporating our users into the design processes. Experimentation, innovation and the future in each of our products.

We like to manufacture in places with happy people and in good working conditions. Muroexe is always looking for the best minimalistic product but with the highest sports performance. We think that a sustainable, unique and stylish product is possible.

We don't want to change the world, we just want to wear it.

 

 Do you want our media kit? Email: Steven@muroexe.com

story:
We're now taking pre-orders from our online store!

Although our IndieGoGo campaign finished, we're still taking pre-orders through our online store: Wag N Shop.

Thinking of Wag N Go for your shop or doggie day care?  email: Trade for pricing details.


Our campaign is over! But we're just beginning!

Thank you for helping us to hit $2,692 - an amazing result!

We're currently working our butts off so that we can begin delivering our Wag N Go bags and gifts .  We're keeping our supporters up to date via our supporter email list, and check in with all the doggie names for the Wag N Go bags.

Many thanks to all our backers for your support!! If you missed out on our Indiegogo campaign head to Wagngo.com You can also follow us on twitter @wagthedoguk and on Facebook/wagngo to stay up to speed on our activities.

Wagging regards,
Trina + Maggie





Wag N Go provide an elegant and durable solution to your dog's essential needs while away from home. Wag N Go was designed by a pet traveller and dog lover, just like you and wanted a solution that was easy to use but gave everything a dog needs while on the road.


 The Wag N Go bag carries all your doggies essentials.
  • Two Fresh-Seal containers - Can hold up to 7 cups of kibble each or use one for treats & toys. Dishwasher Safe
  • Silicone Travel bowl Perfect for meals, easy to store, easy to clean
  • Large Sleeping Blanket - Our round double fleece nap blanket with nylon trim is your dog's personal blanket from home. Washable
  • Roomy zip pockets for your entire dog’s gear or even your own stuff. Integrated poo-bag dispenser.
  • An important factor to make your dog feel like home. Washable
  • All packed up in a slim line bag that you just pop over your shoulder.
  

For The Dog On The Go


The Wag N Go bag is designed for use by the larger dog that just can't fit into a dog carrier bag. It's for dogs that use their own paws while out and about. They need bigger containers for their food, and a good size blanket to snuggle down with. There all dog!

Why you may want a Wag N Go Dog Travel Bag

Think about every time you've packed up your dog for:

  • A Vacation
  • Off to the pet-sitter
  • Sleep overs at family or friends
  • A day at the office
  • Or even trying to check in at the airport or boarding a train.
The bags that I found on the market, just didn't do the trick, I still needed good containers for food, that I could freeze, and something that Maggie could sleep on and feel content. I wanted pockets for her paper work; I wanted it light and packed smartly. It should be a bag that's packed up and ready to go.

I made the bag with the dog traveller in mind:


  • Provides your dog with a place to sleep and large fresh seal containers for food and treats
  • makes your life easier
  • Looks good and a breeze to carry

Traveling with my dog use to be:

Dragging a big fat dog bag up stairs, across the garden or trying to fit it in the car...it drove me crazy! Poor-quality bags that spilled my dog's food made my head spin, regardless how much my dog wanted to help clean up the mess. I felt like I was always digging around the bottom of that bag to find that treat that Maggie was craving (it's always on the bottom).

Make it easy for the dog on the go...
  • Think about that time you wanted to keep your dog happy with his own blanket, food and treats. It’s a fact that dogs are more content away from home when they have things that are familiar to them.
  • Think how much of easier it will be with your dog’s personal paw-bag ready to go when you are.
  • Have containers that hold a good deal of food which I can take from freezer to bag and even use them as bowls.
The Wag N Go dog bag makes taking your dog out easy and breezy, without frustration. You’re packed up and ready to go!  
When I started all this, my quest for the perfect travel bag for dogs, I have to admit I knew nothing about birthing a bag. So I sat down over the last couple of years discussing, sketching, investing & prototyping. I talked to real cool people in the industry and worked out a plan to have a bag that would be affordable, with form & function. I have a bag I'm so proud of; and more importantly, that other dog travellers told me they need!

How we give back to the community

Wag N Go has always made efforts to give back and we believe that all animals need care. Support is needed for charities, volunteers and helpers who care for animals in need. Ten percent of your contributions to this campaign will go directly to helping fund our animal charities. Our Charities

How You Can Help And Get Involved

To achieve the minimum order quantity at the ethical factory we're working with, we're asking you to get on board.
We are launching Wag N Go on Indiegogo to raise a minimum of £2500 because we have received amazing feedback from our wagging community of dog lovers.

Dog lovers just like you who know how travelling with a dog is an amazing way to see the world!

Why?

We want and need to use the funds towards:
  • Paying for our first run of the Wag N Go bag and have it shipped.
  • Start a second-edition run of the Wag N Go bag.
You = crucial funds for first production run!
We stand behind the stuff we make: Our Pledge We have completed final production for the Wag N Go bag and it is ready for immediate release.
Check it out!

We have some paw-some Rewards for you and your dog!

Want it all?

How about a Perk for a whole pack of traveling dogs! Perfect for your shop, hotel or Doggie Day Cares.


Other Ways You Can Help:

We know your busy and that you value your connections, but we'd be wagging happy if you could share our campaign with your network!
  • Just use the handy-dandy share button at the top!
 

Got A Question?

We'd love to hear from you! So give us a howl!


My primary consideration for the Wag N Go bag and the entire Wag N Go product line was to ensure our products would be sturdy, with quality and that our customers could use with confidence over and over again!

I wanted a bag with form and function! Happy dog and Happy dog lover. The outer bag of Wag N Go is made with Nylon and when it comes to strength, nothing beats it durability! Nylon is also well known for its ability to stretch without breaking and return to its original shape, so if your Wag N Go bag end up in the paws of rough and tumble types, our bag should stand up to the challenge. UV resistant, mildew resistant and dries quickly, which makes for a great material for a travelling dog.



  • Our fresh seal bowls are dishwasher safe and if treated with reasonable care, should last a lifetime.
  • Our sleeping blanket is made with double fleece nap with a spandex trim and machine washable.
Every Wag N Go bag will carry a 2 year warranty against breakage. If your bag should rip, tear, or break, we will gladly replace it at no cost to you.

Risks and challenges

I'm very excited to get our first manufactured bags off the ground and to the UK as soon as possible, in fact I'm just a phone call away! I predict very few bumps in the road after Indiegogo funding closes. Our Wag N Go bag after over a year and a half of research, development and testing is complete and ready for immediate production. I've sourced our supplies, worked out transportation and are ready to distribute. I'll make every reasonable effort to exceed current delivery expectations. Regarding our new design Wag N Go Bed, we intend to proceed with the same level of attentive testing toward its development as we invested in development of the Wag N Go bag.



If you want to help, please head back to the top and donate any amount you want - there's no limit or restrictions - and / or share this project with all your dog loving friends! Bigs Wags and Hugs Trina & Maggie

Also, a big wagging thank you who've taken an interest already:

Here is what our early adopters say about Wag N Go!

"If you’re looking for a nice travel bag for your dogs howliday essentials you can’t go wrong with a wag n go travel bag. Hard wearing outer bag and a nice fleecy bed and foodables holders and a bowl too. Even got my name on mine…….paws up for wag n go (“”) (“”). ~ Amanda

story:
Hey Everybody,

Thanks for checking out our project. We really appreciate it!
Our dream started out with the question, “Is it possible to create a fitness apparel line manufactured on U.S. soil?”

We are two guys, both husbands and fathers, who have big dreams and believe that dreams still do come true! Gabriel hits the pavement in the morning taking his kids to school and then working his e-commerce sales day job. Scott is a stay-at-home dad, taking care of his budding toddler and ever curious 3-year old. In 2010, we launched a small fitness & lifestyle apparel company, with hopes of making product here in the heart of Los Angeles. We have partnered with local fabric and sewing houses to create exceptional product and bring back integrity to clothing made in the U.S.A. We are working hard to keep jobs on U.S. soil while empowering small business in our country.

Through this process, it has been an eye opening experience to see that 98% of all fitness apparel is made overseas and that sourcing certain fabrics here on U.S. soil is almost impossible at times.

 We want to make a dent in that 98%. We want to make a difference by expanding our product line that will keep jobs here in the U.S. It has been a fun and wild ride and we are so grateful to those who have supported us up to this point. But, we have much more that we want to do. We are willing to take on the big companies who have millions of dollars behind them. Can we do it? We think its possible!

Please supports at whatever levels you’re comfortable with.
Thanks a million – Gabriel & Scott

Here is a small glimpse of what we have accomplished so far:

Women's Crop Pants are made out of 4-way stretch material providing both support and mobility in any movement . They also provides excellent coverage during squats or other movements that will put strain on the fabric.. (aka: no show and tell)
Women's Running Shorts made out of 4-way stretch material providing both support and allowing freedom of movement. With a built in moisture wicking liner and continuous drawcord that won't come out in the wash, they are the ultimate universal short for an
Premium compression pants that deliver optimal flexibility and movement while increasing circulation for a faster recovery. The stitching follows the muscle line to support hamstrings, quads, abductors, gluts and calves which reduces muscle fatigue and he
An amazing cross-training short that features a 4-way stretch technology. The fabric stretches four ways to make it the most comfortable and mobile short around.
This ultra soft racerback and T-shirts that are perfect for any type of workout. A new addition are the Cool Tech RacerBack tanks that are constructed with moisture wicking properties which pulls sweat away from the body.

So What's Next? 

We start with the basic and actually create an entire line of product for both men and women on a seasonal basis. All made in the USA and from the highest quality fabrics.
COLOR! Lots of it! We want to allow men and women to be able to create entire outfit that match and complements each other.
Then create fun stylish outifts that can be worn working out or just throughout the day

What happens if we are able to raise more funds beyond the $30,000?

Well, ever since we started this company we were big dreamers, so the more we raise the further we will take WOD Gear into all areas of fitness. We already have designs and patterns in place to not only create an entire apparel line, but also dive into areas like cycling, triathlons, and much more!

For more info or questions, please contact us at: info@wodgear.ner
subject line: Kick Starter

Thank you for all of your support,
-WOD GEAR
story_txt:
Hey Everybody,Thanks for checking out our project. We really appreciate it! Our dream started out with the question, “Is it possible to create a fitness apparel line manufactured on U.S. soil?”
We are two guys, both husbands and fathers, who have big dreams and believe that dreams still do come true! Gabriel hits the pavement in the morning taking his kids to school and then working his e-commerce sales day job. Scott is a stay-at-home dad, taking care of his budding toddler and ever curious 3-year old. In 2010, we launched a small fitness & lifestyle apparel company, with hopes of making product here in the heart of Los Angeles. We have partnered with local fabric and sewing houses to create exceptional product and bring back integrity to clothing made in the U.S.A. We are working hard to keep jobs on U.S. soil while empowering small business in our country.
Through this process, it has been an eye opening experience to see that 98% of all fitness apparel is made overseas and that sourcing certain fabrics here on U.S. soil is almost impossible at times.
 We want to make a dent in that 98%. We want to make a difference by expanding our product line that will keep jobs here in the U.S. It has been a fun and wild ride and we are so grateful to those who have supported us up to this point. But, we have much more that we want to do. We are willing to take on the big companies who have millions of dollars behind them. Can we do it? We think its possible!
Please supports at whatever levels you’re comfortable with.Thanks a million – Gabriel & Scott
Here is a small glimpse of what we have accomplished so far:

Women's Crop Pants are made out of 4-way stretch material providing both support and mobility in any movement . They also provides excellent coverage during squats or other movements that will put strain on the fabric.. (aka: no show and tell)

Women's Running Shorts made out of 4-way stretch material providing both support and allowing freedom of movement. With a built in moisture wicking liner and continuous drawcord that won't come out in the wash, they are the ultimate universal short for an

Premium compression pants that deliver optimal flexibility and movement while increasing circulation for a faster recovery. The stitching follows the muscle line to support hamstrings, quads, abductors, gluts and calves which reduces muscle fatigue and he

An amazing cross-training short that features a 4-way stretch technology. The fabric stretches four ways to make it the most comfortable and mobile short around.

This ultra soft racerback and T-shirts that are perfect for any type of workout. A new addition are the Cool Tech RacerBack tanks that are constructed with moisture wicking properties which pulls sweat away from the body.
So What's Next? 

We start with the basic and actually create an entire line of product for both men and women on a seasonal basis. All made in the USA and from the highest quality fabrics.

COLOR! Lots of it! We want to allow men and women to be able to create entire outfit that match and complements each other.

Then create fun stylish outifts that can be worn working out or just throughout the day
What happens if we are able to raise more funds beyond the $30,000?

Well, ever since we started this company we were big dreamers, so the more we raise the further we will take WOD Gear into all areas of fitness. We already have designs and patterns in place to not only create an entire apparel line, but also dive into areas like cycling, triathlons, and much more!
For more info or questions, please contact us at: info@wodgear.nersubject line: Kick Starter
Thank you for all of your support,-WOD GEAR

story:
Hi I’m Gloria founder of gloTot.

gloTot is a toddler clothing line aimed at the active toddler and budget conscious parent.  Inspired by vibrant color and a passion to help others my focus of sustainability is not limited to materials used but extends to the users.  I believe that these fun and energetic patterns should be shared.  In keeping with that model for every product purchased one will be donated to a child in need through my charity gloLight.  I believe that we are a part of this world and if we have the ability to help, then we must.

What is gloLight?

gloLight brings light to the end of the tunnel for struggling Moms. It is a charity that was inspired by my Mom.  Coming from a family that struggled, I was able to witness first hand the challenges that a single mother faces while working 2 jobs and raising 2 kids on her own.  My Mom is deceased now.  gloLight will live on in her memory to help those wonderful beautiful women that are just like my Mom that need some help and a reminder that they are wonderful too.

You're making a difference by:

Contributing clothing to those in need through gloLight.

Kick starting my fun and hip clothing business. 

Funding Production costs such as:

Sewing machine

Screen Printing machine

Software to create prints

Fabric & trims

 

What you get by joining the cool Party!

A warm hearted Thank you.

Cool Promo canvas bag.

A feel good donation to children in need through gloLight.

A choice of any garment for your kid!

Low on Cash.... but still want to help?!

Help spread the word with your friends, family, and nearby community. Your efforts through Twitter, Facebook, Pintrest, Linkedin, and any other social media always greatly helps!! 

Girls!!

Boys!!

Promo Canvas Bag

story:
Hello!

I'm JC, an illustrator based in the Philippines. I started NTKL in 2017 as a way to venture into making original art, and since then it's been a steadily growing online brand. I'm perhaps best known for my enamel pin designs, particularly the White Rabbit candy pin!

MY SOCIAL MEDIA:  
Twitter: @nautikalmiles | Tumblr: @nautikalmiles | Instagram: @nautikalmiles
 

What started out as a silly idea of a pin went viral on Twitter recently (with over 4.7k retweets and 19k likes as of writing this post). It was even featured by a local media website, Interaksyon.com, in their article about Danish cookie tins.

With this warm and widely received attention, I'm now trying to make the pin into a reality! 

The hinged pin measures approximately 1.3 inches (3.3 cm) hard enamel with gold plating, 2mm in thickness per layer for a total of 4mm. There will be a logo embossed on the back of the bottom layer. By default, it comes with two pin fixings and rubber clutches. Every enamel pin will come packaged with a backing card. 

I'd also like to implement a pendant loop instead of the pin fixings, so it can be worn as a necklace. 

Because of the folding mechanism, production costs are much more expensive than normal; hence why I opted for crowdfunding. With your help, we can make this pin tangible! Perfect as a gift for your sewing friends, for mom, or even for grandma!

I already have quotes from multiple manufacturers, so an estimate of the needed funding is set. As this is my first time making a hinged pin and crowdfunding, the campaign goal is set to what I feel is most feasible for the project to take off. 

The main goal will cover the pin's production costs. Pledgers can get the Danish Biscuits pin exclusively for $18! Any extras remaining outside of this campaign will be sold at my online store for $20. 

 

  • 70% will go towards production of the rewards.
  • 20% will go towards shipping. 
  • 10% will go towards fees. 

Since the pin involves a folding mechanism, it may take longer during the production phase.

A hinged pin is also heavier than most normal pins. To ensure its safety during transit, it will be securely packed with bubble wrap.

 

Funding this project would be a great milestone and I hope you guys can help me! Even just sharing this with your friends would be greatly appreciated! 

Other posts you can share: Twitter | Tumblr 

Thank you for looking! :) 

 

Hello! It's been a while since fulfilment has finished. I actually forgot to update the campaign's status, since this is my first time using Indiegogo. ? In any case, here are photos of the final product!

 

(These weren't even all of the orders yet... lmao) 

 

Again, thank you to everyone who participated in the campaign!! I can't express my gratitude enough for all the enthusiasm and support. I hope you guys enjoy your pins!

story:
Who is Darion Cortez?

I am Darion Cortez, 22, born & raised in St Louis, Missouri. I have had a love for drawing ever since I could pick up a crayon. I started out drawing just random things that came to my mind & as I grew up it slowly progressed. In middle school I found I was pretty good at drawing tattoos, & I drew them for years & years. In July 2011 a friend of mine asked me to draw her a pair of shoes, I had never attempted to draw a shoe before so it was pretty scary & exciting at the same time. She only asked for one pair & I drew 24 lol & I haven't stopped. Just like my other are it took a while for it to progress but I really got the hang of it. I learned so much about the anatomy of the high heel & what it takes to design a good shoe. With my active imagination i designed shoes that were a little out there, so again I had to learn what makes a shoe company survive. I asked around & another friend of mine told me staple shoes set the tone for the company. I took his advice & created my staple pieces. I started to talk with a manufacturer & I had to learn how to give my shoe designs the right proportions so they can accurately bring my idea to life. Along the way of doing all these designs I started to wonder what my shoes would look like if they were real. I asked a friend who I met through YouTube if he could digitally render my designs & luckily he said yes. When I saw them digitally rendered my mind was blown & I was speechless. I asked him to be apart of my company & graciously enough he said yes. He is the one who rendered all of my shoe designs you see below. Designing shoes are my passion & it's what I would love to do for the rest of my life. The shoe industry is a never ending education, & I am ready to learn everything I can to make sure my brand goes in the right direction.

What will I do with the money?

The money will go towards the manufacturing of the shoes & shoe boxes. I plan to use the money to fully 100% fund the Darion Cortez brand to provide original designed shoes to women, & in the future to men as well with the addition of sneakers. Also in the future I will be adding in handbags to the brand. 

Beautiful shoes need beautiful names for $25 I will give a shoe design from a future collection your name.

If you like the shoe you see & want a pair of your own for $100 I will send you a pair. (this option is limited)

Why support Darion Cortez Shoes?

This is more than just a project this is my dream & my passion. I LOVE designing shoes & if I could make my designs come to life it would be the most amazing thing to ever happen to me. Words cannot express how amazing it would be to be able to share my shoes with the world. I know that I can design really great shoes & really WOW you with what I can do. This is more than just a project to me for this this is my life & i want this to be my career, there is nothing else I want to do more than this. When I wake up the only thing I think about is what new shoe sketch can I do today, what can I do to make my brand stand out from the rest, what sketch can I do that has never been seen before. I truly can't put it into the right words how much your support would mean to me but I know with it I will not disappoint you. Starting with one of my staple shoes I believe that I can build a very well respected brand that provides high quality shoes at a great price.

(colors are not final)

Other Ways You Can Help

Other ways you can help is by spreading the word through social networks & getting other to contribute. You can follow me on Twitter (@TheDarionCortez) & ask me questions about the brand.

story:
Visit the new Smart Tracker 2 campaign!









Smart Tracker is a real time Smart GPS Tracker, it has many functions and features built to protect anything, anytime, anywhere.


  • Protect anything : people, car, pet, etc.
  • Protect anytime : real time tracking via phone or free web interface.
  • Protect anywhere : A-GPS technology, working even underground.
  • 20 more features (Panic button, Voice monitoring, geo-fence, etc.)
  • Track with Google maps, Android and iOS support.
  • Smart Tracker is accurate up to 5m. (High GPS accuracy).
  • Tiny GPS Tracker with a powerful recheargable  battery.
  • Swiss designed with innovative technology.

Real time tracking anywhere in the world, anytime.

Protect your family, pets or any goods with one of the smallest  GPS Tracker in the world. If a problem occurs, you simply have to push the panic button and it will automatically send a SMS alerts with your GPS coordinates. Also, you can keep an eye on your loved ones in real time whenever you want through a free web service or using your mobile. 















Our new Innovative Smart tracker provides discreet, waterproof GPS-aligned tracking with an added anti-theft feature designed to protect not only your belongings, family members and pets but you as well. Better yet, without the need for a professional installation, the customer or business owner can save an incredible amount of money while being completely in charge of their GPS device. 

This product is unique in its field: not only is it discrete, and virtually unnoticeable to the untrained eye when placed on a vehicle, bag, etc. But it also includes the ability to remotely listen in when desired by the customer for greater tracking information results. 



The customer is also able to use the device to be aware of movement of the person or vehicle outside of a pre-determined area, and can receive alerts via SMS text as well as call alerts when the device has detected that it has left the area. 

If the vehicle ever runs into inclement weather (take out often), or finds itself submerged more than the usual GPS tracker, our device has a high waterproof level.

This is a Policeman or Private Investigators dream, but it is great for everyday users as well. For customers intending to use this in plain sight, our Smart tracker includes SIM card insertion. This clever design makes it easy to install the device in a place that is easy for the user to reach, but which still prevents it from being detected as an actual tracking device. 



Some current market GPS tracking devices run into issues with playback, losing connection (and therefore losing memory) while tracking is in progress, and more. We wanted to create a product that could work itself through these obstacles. Our SIM card mount is self-locking, which drastically reduces the chance of vibrations or potholes knocking the memory card loose. 

All of these custom features can be tracked and monitored on a sleek, Google Map-compatible and free web-based tracking platform, which also supports 3rd party software. The platform is also supported on IOS as well as Android mobile platforms, giving customers the opportunity to remain in tune with their tracking device regardless of where they themselves are located. While our tracking platform looks great and performs even better, it won’t cost our customers additional monthly membership payments like many GPS systems require. 





*Headphones are included free according to the Strech Goal.






We have designed, built, and tested the Smart Tracker prototype and software. We have selected a well-respected production facility that we have previously worked with successfully. 

However, one of our biggest concerns was making Smart Tracker affordable to the largest amount of people possible, while still insisting on a rich feature set. In order to proceed, we need to create the tooling and order quantity necessary to keep the price reasonable for everyone involved. 

That is why you are our most important asset! By working together, we can all benefit from this. 

By donating to our indiegogo campaign, you are guaranteeing that customers looking for a quality, cost-effective magnetic  GPS tracker system can be served. As we are not relying on our own incomes to get this product line started, we can make sure that the price is considerably lower to purchase on the consumer side further down the line. 



By investing in our project, your pre-orders will help to fund the first production run in a quantity that keeps the price low for everyone. In return you get (besides our gratitude and sincere thanks!) a totally new kind of Smart GPS TRACKER at a highly discounted price.

More than that, you join us and make a statement about the importance of technology and security.

We have created several different perks to offer Smart Tracker at prices up to 60% off of retail price, as well as some special perks.


Stretch Goals :
We have developed a rigorous testing and quality control process to insure your Smart Tracker arrives in perfect condition. The packaging is designed and we have a partner waiting to produce it. We have investigated and secured the logistics partners needed for safe delivery worldwide. 




A NOTE TO INTERNATIONAL BACKERS:

Please note:  Backers will be responsible for any and all customs, import duties, and local taxes you may incur in your country of residence.  We recommend you ask your local tax authorities what you will incur based on the value of your pledge.  Please understand that we have no control over what your own country will charge you in VAT and import duties.  As a final note, we cannot misrepresent the customs information.  We appreciate your understanding in this matter.



GPS tracking devices have become incredibly important to daily life, both for individuals as well as for business. For companies who run primarily through delivery shipments and cargo, a GPS tracking device can ensure the security of the cargo, compare driver’s planned routes against their actual travel time, length of the trip, and more. Using a GPS device can also ensure that a wayward employee doesn’t wander away with a company vehicle without prior authorization from the company itself. 



Personal use of GPS tracking devices has also grown in scope and necessity, as well. From tracking a possible instance of infidelity, keeping an eye on a teenage driver (Smart Tracker has a Speeding alert), or protecting the safety of an older loved one suffering from memory loss, dementia, or Alzheimer's, using a GPS tracking device can mean the difference between love and loss, life and death. Finding a GPS unit that can accomplish all of these tasks, maintain a low profile, and remain affordable to both a business owner as well as a private consumer, while being user-friendly, can be difficult to find, especially all in one package. 



What is the timeline ?


Disclaimer

Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to our best efforts and not guaranteed. This is to set reasonable expectations for our contributors/donors. This disclaimer is required for accepting PayPal contributions.

Do I have to pay a subscription?

No,  you will benefit as customer of a free web interface lifetime. You can also track your Smart Tracker for free with your phone (Working with Google map, compatible Android/iOS/Windows Phone).

Do I need a SIM card ?

Smart Tracker has a BlackBox function, if you need passive tracking without real-time tracking you don't need a SIM.

However, if you want real-time tracking, you need to take a cheap sim (Smart Tracker only use a minimum data and is cost-effective). There is no miracle for this type of technology, Tracker without SIM only give you a coverage of maximum 1km. Smart Tracker works World Wide!

Does the product come with a Warranty?

1.    All orders will be in perfect quality, package condition and will be strictly checked before shipment. 

2.  All orders enjoy 12 months of quality warranty since shipment. We always offer free repairs, whether it’s within or outside of warranty period, but buyers need pay for the accessories cost and shipping cost.

What are the Shipping Costs?

There is an additional small cost incurred for international shipping, which varies depending of your country. Shipment does not include extra fees from customs, or additional costs associated with your country.

Will this Tracker work world wide? 

Absolutely!

Will you consider giving the option to choose a product without a logo or any other external feature that will apply that this is tracking device?

We can provide the Smart Tracker without the logo, it's not a problem but you should ask us so we note it. Color can be customized according to our Stretch Goal.

Can you provide the product specs? Can you provide images of the internal product (PCB)?

We still have some adjustments to do to the Smart Tracker and prefer not to give information that may change. However, we can guarantee all Smart Tracker will be shipped in June, we are improving some details of Smart Tracker.

Does it use a lot of data ?

No, Smart Tracker is very economic and any standard cheap sim would work without any problems for real-time tracking. If you don't use real-time tracking, you can still get position by simply sending an sms (no need of internet data).

Example :

You wish to track in real-time every 30 seconds:

Data used for one day is only 0.32mb and for one month only 9.6mb. 

Does it work in my country?

Smart Tracker works everywhere, for real-time tracking usage, you need a GSM network (ST uses GPRS signal). It can work anywhere in America or Europe for example.


Feel free to ask us any questions you may have, we will update our FAQ once we received more questions.




 

Win a Free Smart Tracker with a Simple Click

We are ready to offer you up to 10 Smart Tracker in exchange for you helping  to spread the word. When you share our project using the share button, it creates a special link designed only for you. With this link, we will be able to track the number of visits and sales that you are bringing to our project.
